BVIC.JK.summary: PT Bank Victoria International Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers various savings accounts; demand, time, and forex deposits; current accounts; bank guarantees; and loan products, such as home and car ownership loan, multi-purpose credit, implant banking credit, and domestic letters of credit, as well as commercial lending, small medium enterprise lending, and multi finance lending products. The company also provides investment products; foreign exchange bank services, including remittance, trade finance, and treasury and other interbank services; and clearing/payment, transfer, real time gross settlement (RTGS), bill payment, ATM, and internet and mobile banking services, as well as Sharia banking services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 92 offices consisting of 1 head office, 14 branch offices, 63 sub branch offices branches, and 8 cash offices. PT Bank Victoria International Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

BWPT.JK.summary: PT Eagle High Plantations Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates palm plantations in Indonesia and Singapore. It operates in two segments, Plantations and Manufacturing. The company offers palm products, including crude palm oil and palm kernel. As of December 31, 2019, its total planted area was approximately 124,218 hectares in Kalimantan, Sumatera, Sulawesi, and Papua. The company also engages in the palm oil mill and bulking, and investment holding activities. PT Eagle High Plantations Tbk was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

BYAN.JK.summary: PT Bayan Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the open cut mining and sale of coal in Kalimantan. It operates through Coal and Non-Coal segments. The company produces semi-soft coking, bituminous, sub-bituminous low-sulphur, and low-ash coal. It has rights to mine 5 coal contracts of works and 16 mining business permits with a concession area of 126,293 hectares. The company also owns and operates a Balikpapan coal terminal located in Balikpapan, East Kalimantan, as well as owns and manages two Kalimantan floating transfer barges located in East Kalimantan. In addition, it is involved in the provision of mining contractor, port management, shipping, construction, transportation, and trading services. PT Bayan Resources Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BYRA.F.summary: PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia, Singapore, Timor Leste, Hong Kong, and the United States. The company offers current and savings accounts; time deposits; vehicle, home, micro business, working capital, investment, food, warehouse receipt, partnership, franchise, and cash collateral loans, as well as loans for borrowers/debtors; and supply chain financing solutions. It also provides banking services, such as bill payment, deposit, online transaction, money transfer, and remittance services; investment products, such as pension and mutual funds, and government retail bonds and retail sukuk products; import and export services; letter of credits; and BRI RTE online system and money changer services. In addition, the company offers Internet banking and merchant services; credit cards; business guarantee and clearing business services; financial and institutional business banking services; and treasury, custodian, trustee, and cash management services. PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1895 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

BZG.F.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

BZG2.F.summary: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking products and services to individual, corporate, and small and medium enterprise customers in Indonesia and internationally. It offers deposits accounts, loans, transaction banking services, electronic banking services, cash management services, credit cards, bancassurance products, mutual fund and treasury investment products, credit facilities, standby LC/bank guarantees, export import facilities, local LC, and foreign exchange facilities. The company also provides investment financing, working capital financing, auto and multipurpose financing, operating lease, other financing activities, money lending and remittance, securities brokerage dealing and securities issuance underwriting, general or loss insurance, life insurance, Sharia banking, and venture capital services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,248 offices comprising 139 main branches, 874 sub-branches, and 235 cash offices; and 17,623 automated teller machines. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Central Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwimuria Investama Andalan.

CAKK.JK.summary: PT Cahayaputra Asa Keramik Tbk designs, manufactures, distributes, and sells tiles in Indonesia. The company offers wall and floor tiles for living room, kitchens, and bathrooms. It distributes its products in Europe, the United States, Canada, Australia, Africa, New Zealand, and other Asian countries. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

CAMP.JK.long_name: PT Campina Ice Cream Industry, Tbk.
CAMP.JK.summary: PT Campina Ice Cream Industry, Tbk. produces, markets, and distributes ice creams in Indonesia. It offers cake, cone, cup, pack, and stick ice creams. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

CANI.JK.summary: PT Capitol Nusantara Indonesia Tbk engages in shipping, and the provision of shipping agency and transportation services in Indonesia. It is also involved in the shipping of oil and gas; and rental of vessels. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Samarinda, Indonesia.

CARE.JK.summary: PT Metro Healthcare Indonesia Tbk operates and manages hospitals in Indonesia. It owns and operates 7 hospitals. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Metro Healthcare Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Anugrah Kasih Rajawali.

CARS.JK.long_name: PT Industri dan Perdagangan Bintraco Dharma Tbk
CARS.JK.summary: PT Industri dan Perdagangan Bintraco Dharma Tbk engages in the services, trade, workshop, property and real estate, industry, and companies investment businesses. It operates through Automotive and Financing segments. The company provides sales and after-sales vehicle services under the Nasmoco brand; automotive financing for corporates and individuals; and car finance for new or used vehicles. It is also involved in the trading activities; distribution of spare parts; and operation of car services shop. In addition, the company offers electronic system trading and management services related to automotive that are accessible through Website and software app with Android platform. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in South Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Industri dan Perdagangan Bintraco Dharma Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Ahabe Niaga Selaras.

CASA.JK.summary: PT Capital Financial Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in financial services and investment business in Indonesia. It offers management consulting, asset management, life and sharia life insurance, and Fintech peer-to-peer lending services, as well as engages in venture capital activities. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Capital Financial Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Capital Strategic Invesco.

CASH.JK.summary: PT Cashlez Worldwide Indonesia Tbk engages in the digital financial technology and payment services businesses in Indonesia. It creates mPOS (mobile point of sales) system, a concept of accepting payments using credit and debit cards or application-based debit cards on smartphones connected by a card reader through Bluetooth. The company provides applications that provide payment facilities, accepting payments using credit cards, debit cards, and digital payments, such as QR Code, Cashlez Link, OVO, and Go-Pay. Its products include Cashlez One, a payment instrument that can process various types of payment methods; Cashlez reader non printers; Cashlez reader printers; and Smartpoz, a POS application that facilitates business owners in running their business. PT Cashlez Worldwide Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

CASS.JK.summary: PT Cardig Aero Services Tbk engages in the ground handling, cargo handling, aircraft release and maintenance, catering, management facility, and aviation training businesses. The company's Ground Handling division offers passenger handling, including baggage and aircraft handling, ground support equipment usage, operation of business class lounge, and special assistance services. Its Cargo Handling division provides cargo buildup and breakdown, cargo documentation, cargo transfer and transit handling, cargo storage, and special cargo handling services. The company's Aircraft Release and Maintenance Service division provides repair and maintenance service for air transportation vehicles. Its Catering Services division offers food and catering services, as well as housekeeping, laundry, gardening, accommodation, transportation, and other services. The company's Management Facility division provides aircraft cleaning services, laundry services, security services, and other services to customers as per customers purchase order. Its Aviation Training division offers training facility services to provide flight simulators to aircraft pilot and other training services. PT Cardig Aero Services Tbk is also involved in management of airports; operation of restaurants; and investment activities. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia.

CBMF.JK.summary: PT Cahaya Bintang Medan Tbk, a furniture company, manufactures office and household appliances in Indonesia. It manufactures furniture with wood for household and office appliances, such as tables, chairs, benches, beds, cupboards, shelves, cabinets, and room dividers; furniture with rattan and or bamboo; and furniture with plastic materials comprising tables, chairs, and shelves. The company also processes furniture, such as restaurant decoration cart/food carts, supplementary materials for mattresses; spring mattress or filled/stuffed with other supplementary materials; and non-coated plastic/rubber mattresses. In addition, it trades in household furnishings; kitchen and cooking utensils; lights and fixtures; consumer electronics, such as radios, televisions, recorders, CD and DVD players, stereo equipment, and video game consoles; lighting equipment; porcelain tableware comprising glass, spoon, knife, and fork; wooden tools; woven goods; cork articles; wallpapers; and carpets, as well as retails furniture, such as tables, chairs, cabinets, beds, bookshelves, shoe racks, sideboards, mattresses, and pillows/bolsters. Further, the company offers coating, finishing, repair, and restoration services for home furnishings and equipment, office furniture, and self-standing furniture, as well as invests in other companies. PT Cahaya Bintang Medan Tbk was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Deli Serdang, Indonesia.

CCSI.JK.long_name: PT Communication Cable Systems Indonesia Tbk
CCSI.JK.summary: PT Communication Cable Systems Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells optical fiber cables in Indonesia and internationally. The company also produces submarine cables; indoor, outdoor, and special cables; HDPE pipes; and accessories. It serves Internet telecommunication, oil and gas, power utility, railway transport authority, and private industries. The company was formerly known as PT. Siemens Kabel Optik. PT Communication Cable Systems Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

CEKA.JK.summary: PT Wilmar Cahaya Indonesia Tbk. produces and sells vegetable and specialty oils in Indonesia. It offers specialty fats, including cocoa butter substitutes, cocoa butter replacers, cocoa butter equivalents, confectionary fats, icing and filling fats, milk fat replacers, ice cream fats, and spread fats, as well as bakery fats. The company was formerly known as PT Cahaya Kalbar Tbk. and changed its name to PT Wilmar Cahaya Indonesia Tbk. in May 2013. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Wilmar Cahaya Indonesia Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Sentratama Niaga Indonesia.

CENT.JK.summary: PT Centratama Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk leases and manages telecommunication towers and in-building DAS (distributed antenna system) sites for cellular networks in Indonesia. The company also provides fiber broadband and telephony Internet services for corporate and residential customers. In addition, it offers IP and digital products and services. The company was formerly known as PT Centrin Online Tbk and changed its name to PT Centratama Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk in 2013. PT Centratama Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

CFIN.JK.summary: PT. Clipan Finance Indonesia Tbk provides financial leasing, consumer financing, and factoring services. The company's products include used car financing; new or used house, shophouse, home office, and condominium/apartment financing; heavy equipment financing; and financing for marriage, home renovation, travel, religious travel, education, and other purposes. It serves customers through 45 branch offices and 75 marketing offices in Indonesia. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Clipan Finance Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bank Pan Indonesia Tbk.

CINT.JK.summary: PT Chitose Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel furniture for offices, hotels, hospitals, home, schools, and public facilities primarily in Indonesia. It offers folding-chairs; folding chairs + memos; hotel-banquet and restaurant chairs and tables; working and meeting products, including office and meeting chairs, desks and tables, racks and storage products, and lobby space products, as well as office shelves; school education and hospital items; and accessories. The company markets its products through a network of distributors and agents. It also exports its products to Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Thailand, South Africa, Sri Lanka, Brunei, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Malaysia, Singapore, Japan, Germany, England, Egypt, the United States, South Korea, Australia, and New Zealand. The company was formerly known as PT Chitose Indonesia Manufacturing Limited and changed its name to PT Chitose Internasional Tbk in 2013. PT Chitose Internasional Tbk was founded in 1979 and is based in Cimahi, Indonesia. PT Chitose Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tritirta Inti Mandiri.

CITA.JK.summary: PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk engages in bauxite mining activities in Indonesia. It offers smelter grade alumina. The company was formerly known as PT Cipta Panel Utama Tbk and changed its name to PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk in May 2007. PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Harita Jayaraya Inc.

CITY.JK.summary: PT Natura City Developments Tbk operates as a real estate in Indonesia. The company develops Serpong Natura City, a residential area covering approximately 210 ha. It also provides central business district, food court, market, commercial area, club house, and international school facilities. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Natura City Developments Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sentul City Tbk.

CLAY.JK.summary: PT Citra Putra Realty Tbk engages in the property and hospitality business in Indonesia. The company operates hotels. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Citra Putra Realty Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Citra Putra Mandiri.

CLEO.JK.summary: PT Sariguna Primatirta Tbk engages in the bottled water business in Indonesia. It operates through Bottle, Non Bottle, and Others segments. The company provides packaged drinking water under the Anda, Cleo Platine, S-Tube, Super O2, Vio 8+, and Cleo Pure Water brands. It also offers industry and trading services. The company was formerly known as PT Sari Guna and changed its name to PT Sariguna Primatirta Tbk in December 1988. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Sariguna Primatirta Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tancorp Global Abadi.

CLPI.JK.summary: PT Colorpak Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets printing inks, coatings, and adhesives in Indonesia. The company operates in five segments: Gravure, Film, Adhesive, Coating, and Plastic Resin. It provides flexible and cigarette packaging inks; environmental friendly inks; and PVC leather coatings. The company trades in films, such as bi-axially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), polyethylene terephthalate (PET) film, NYLON, MPET, Aluminium foil, and special films; and solvent base and solventless adhesives; and plastic resins. In addition, it offers various types of liquid inks, including Uniprint Series, a Polyurethane based ink; Cenote, an Ester and Alcohol based ink for PET and OPP; New Unicom for PET dry and extrusion; New Lamiop for BOPP dry and extrusion; D-Lamiop for OPP dry; Hunter for foil, paper, and paper board; Alpha for printing on PP and PE surfaces; Roto Shrink for sleeves PVC and PET; and Fantasy PP for woven bag PP. PT Colorpak Indonesia Tbk also exports its products to Australia and China. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Colorpak Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Ink Color International Pte. Ltd.

CMNP.JK.long_name: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk
CMNP.JK.summary: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, constructs and operates toll roads in Indonesia. It engages in implementing and providing consultancy services in the field of management, investment, information technology and telecommunications, transportation, project development, property management, and real estate; as well as sells product components of highway construction. The company operates the Simpang Susun Waru - Juanda toll road in Surabaya; Depok - Antasari toll road in Jakarta; Soreang - Pasir Koja toll road; Cileunyi - Sumedang - Dawuan Toll Road, and Sumedang Dawuan toll road. It also provides trading, development, procurement, contract, industry, land management, and other services. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

CNTX.JK.summary: PT Century Textile Industry Tbk engages in the textiles business in Indonesia and internationally. The company offers T/C, CVC, dobby, and oxford fabrics used for shirts and uniforms. It also exports its products primarily to the United States, Japan, and the United Kingdom. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia.

COCO.JK.summary: PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk manufactures and sells cocoa and chocolate products in Indonesia. The company provides cocoa powder, couverture and compound chocolates, spreads and fillings, and chocolate powder drinks. It sells its products under the SCHOKO brand name for food manufacturers, food services, and retailers. The company also exports its products to Asia, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, and the United States. PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk was founded in 2006 and is based in Bandung, Indonesia.

CPIN.JK.summary: PT Charoen Pokphand Indonesia Tbk produces and sells poultry feed, day old chicks (DOC), processed chicken, and other food products in Indonesia. The company offers broiler and layer poultry feed; and various poultry feed products for parent stock, duck, native chicken, fighting cock, and quail, as well as feed for cattle and swine under the brands of HI-PRO, HI-PRO-VITE, BINTANG, BONAVITE, ROYAL FEED, TURBO FEED, and TIJI. It also provides various types of DOC, such as broiler DOC; layer DOC; and other DOC, such as DOC for parent stock and male layer. In addition, the company sells various food products under the Golden Fiesta, Fiesta, Champ, and Okey brands. Further, it is involved in poultry farming and beverage activities; the trade of processed chicken; the production of plastic packaging products; the production and distribution of chicken feather meal; and the operation of restaurants and convenience stores. The company was formerly known as PT Charoen Pokphand Indonesia Animal Feedmill Co. Limited. PT Charoen Pokphand Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Charoen Pokphand Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Charoen Pokphand Indonesia Group.

CPRI.JK.long_name: PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk
CPRI.JK.summary: PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk engages in the property and real estate development business in Indonesia. It develops resorts; and meeting houses and office buildings. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Capri Nusa Satu Properti Tbk is a subsidiary of PT RDW Global Investasi.

CPRO.JK.summary: PT Central Proteina Prima Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated aquaculture company in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Feeds, Food Products, and Others segments. It engages in the shrimp farming and hatchery activities; cold storage and trading of shrimps; and production and sale of shrimp and fish feeds. The company also provides fry and pet food products; shrimp and processed food products; and shrimp and fish probiotics, as well as aquaculture chemicals. In addition, it offers medicines for shrimp and fish. The company sells its products through retail outlets, which cover hypermarts, supermarkets, minimarts, convenient stores, and traditional mom-and-pop stores; and supplies to hotels, restaurants, and cafeterias in Indonesia. It also exports its products to the United States, Europe, and Japan. The company was formerly known as PT Central Proteinaprima Tbk and changed its name to PT Central Proteina Prima Tbk in June 2014. PT Central Proteina Prima Tbk was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

CSAP.JK.summary: PT Catur Sentosa Adiprana Tbk, through its subsidiaries, distributes building materials and consumer products in Indonesia. The company sells building materials, including granite porcelain tiles; and chemicals materials for use in industries. It also distributes consumer goods, such as foods, daily necessities, and household goods. In addition, the company operates retail stores that offer home furniture and accessories; and develops warehouse area. PT Catur Sentosa Adiprana Tbk was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

CSIS.JK.summary: PT Cahayasakti Investindo Sukses Tbk engages in the furniture trading and construction service businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through two segments, Construction Services and Furniture Project. The company is also involved in the wood working, handcraft, household, timber processing, general trading, distribution, agency and representative, and franchising businesses. In addition, it undertakes building and general works, including residential housing, industrial area, buildings, factories, roads, bridges, waterways, irrigation, excavation, retaining, electric installation, telephone, plumbing, gas, and other related works; and provides planning, implementation, and supervisory services. Further, the company develops and manages real estate properties; and rents spaces in stores. Additionally, it acts as a distributor, wholesaler, dealer, supplier, and commission house. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Cahayasakti Investindo Sukses Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Andalan Utama Bintara.

CSMI.JK.summary: PT Cipta Selera Murni Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the fast food restaurant business in Indonesia. It offers french fries, honey butter biscuits, mashed potatoes, coleslaw, mixed salad, chicken soup, liver, and gizzard; spicy, white, and fried rice; and potato cutlets, chicken chunks, sphaghetti, spicy and original chicken tender, burger, and wraps. The company also offers mineral water; soft, bottled, and hot drinks; and ice creams. In addition, it trades in household appliances and equipment, consumer electronics, stereo equipment, video game consoles, lighting equipment, porcelain and glass drinking utensils, and other appliances, as well as spoons, knives, forks, tools made of wood, articles of plaiting and articles of cork, wallpaper, carpets etc. As of April 2, 2020, the company operated 37 outlets under the Texas chicken brand name. PT Cipta Selera Murni Tbk was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

CSRA.JK.summary: PT Cisadane Sawit Raya Tbk. operates oil palm plantations in Indonesia. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

CTBN.JK.summary: PT Citra Tubindo Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides pipes and accessories, and related services in Indonesia. It operated through three segments: Pipe Processing, Transportation, and Technical Support. The Pipe Processing segment engages in the finishing and threading of pipes, as well as manufacturing accessories; and heat treatment for seamless pipes. The Transportation segment offers logistics and other services. The Technical Support segment provides marketing and technical support services in connection with the supply of oil country tubular goods and accessories for the oil and gas industry. It also offers line and drill pipes; port management, container and cargo, warehousing, and open storage rental services; public transportation, expedition, stevedoring, and heavy equipment rental services, as well as cargo handling services. The company offers its products and services primarily to the oil and gas industries. It exports its products to the United States, Canada, Australia, the Middle East, Brazil, and other countries in Africa and Asia. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Batam, Indonesia. PT Citra Tubindo Tbk is a subsidiary of Vallourec SA.

CTRA.JK.summary: PT Ciputra Development Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties in Indonesia. The company operates through Real Estate, Rental, and Others segments. It develops and operates residential projects, including land lots, residential houses, shop houses, apartments, and strata title offices; and commercial projects, such as rental of commercial centers or mall, hotels, hospitals, golf courses, and water parks. The company was formerly known as PT Citra Habitat Indonesia and changed its name to PT Ciputra Development Tbk in December 1990. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

CTTH.JK.summary: PT Citatah Tbk manufactures and sells marble and marble handicrafts products in Indonesia. The company operates through Limestone and Imported Building Materials segments. Its products include slabs and tiles. The company also exports its products. PT Citatah Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Karawang, Indonesia.

D7V.F.summary: PT Mayora Indah Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells food and beverage products in Indonesia, rest of Asia, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Packaged Food Processing, Packaged Beverages Processing, and Financial Services. The company offers biscuits under the Roma Marie Susu, Roma Marie Susu Gold, Roma Kelapa, Roma Kelapa Cream, Roma Sandwich, Roma Malkist, Roma Malkist Abon, Roma Malkist Coklat, Roma Malkist Krim Keju Manis, Roma Malkist Krim Tiramisu, Roma Cream Creakers, Royal Choice, Better, Slai O Lai, Sari Gandum, Sari Gandum Sandwich, dll, and other brands names; candies under the Kopiko, Kopiko Cappuccino, KIS, Tamarin, dll, and other brand names; and wafers under the Beng Beng, Beng Beng Maxx, Beng Beng Share It, Astor, Roma Wafer Coklat, Roma Zuperrr Keju, Roma Choco Blast, dll, and other brand names. It also provides chocolates under the Choki-Choki and Drink Beng Beng brands; coffee under the Torabika Duo, Torabika Duo Susu Full Cream, Torabika 3 in 1, Torabika Moka, Torabika Cappuccino, Torabika Jahe Susu, Torabika Creamy Latte, Torabika Double Up, Kopiko Brown Coffee, Toracafe Volcano Chocomelt, Toracafe Caramelove, Torabika Milky Latte, and dll brand names; and health food products under the Energen Cereal, Energen Oatmilk, and Prima Cereal brands. In addition, it is involved in provision of financial services; and processing of coffee powder and instant coffee, and cacao beans. PT Mayora Indah Tbk was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DADA.JK.summary: PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk engages in the real estate business activities in Indonesia. It provides real estate agency and brokerage services, as well as real estate management and valuation services; operates as an intermediary for buying, selling, and leasing real estate properties; and holds real estate wills. The company also engages in buying, selling, leasing, and operating real estate, such as apartment and residential buildings, as well as exhibition halls, private storage facilities, malls, shopping centers, and other facilities; and the provision of houses and flats or apartments with or without furniture for permanent use. In addition, it is involved in the land sale, building development, and real estate lot division activities, as well as land and operation of residential areas for movable homes. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Depok, Indonesia. PT Diamond Citra Propertindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Karya Permata Inovasi Indonesia.

DART.JK.summary: PT Duta Anggada Realty Tbk. engages in the real estate development activities in Indonesia. It develops and rents apartments, office buildings, hotels, and shopping centers in Jakarta and Bali. The company also provides tourism hospitality services. The company was formerly known as PT Duta Anggada Inti Pratama and changed its name to PT Duta Anggada Realty Tbk. in April 1997. PT Duta Anggada Realty Tbk. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DAYA.JK.summary: PT Duta Intidaya Tbk operates as a beauty and health retailer in Indonesia. The company offers medicine, pharmacy goods, medical and wellness equipment, personal and skin care products, perfume and cosmetics, baby products, and general merchandise in stores and pharmacies. It also trades in food and beverages. In addition, the company acts as an agent, representative, sole agent, distributor, and purveyor, as well as a franchise and supplier of various traded goods. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated a network of 140 stores in Java and Bali Island, Kalimantan, Yogyakarta, Banten, Jakarta, Sumatera, and Sulawesi under the Watsons brand. PT Duta Intidaya Tbk also operates online stores at Shopee.com, Lazada.com, Blibli.com, and Bukalapak.com, as well as at Halodoc platform and bima+ App. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Duta Intidaya Tbk is a subsidiary of Total Alliance Holdings Limited.

DCII.JK.summary: PT DCI Indonesia Tbk provides cloud and carrier neutral data center infrastructure services in Indonesia. It offers dedicated and shared space colocation services; cross connect services; Flexspace, which offers units of working space services; onsite technical support services; CloudConnect, an interconnection for enterprises; and DCI Internet Exchange. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT DCI Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of DCI International Holding Pte. Ltd.

DEAL.JK.summary: PT Dewata Freightinternational Tbk provides freight forwarding, vehicle rental, distribution management, and construction services. It engages in trade and mining services; and provides cargo shipment services, including loading, unloading containers, repackaging, shipping door to door, storing hazardous and non-hazardous, and handling cargo that requires cooling storage system. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dewata Freightinternational Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bimada Paramita Adhyana.

DEFI.JK.summary: PT Danasupra Erapacific Tbk engages in leasing, factoring, and consumer financing activities in Indonesia. It offers financing for the purchase of used cars and new cars, pickups, trucks, and buses; housing facilities, home stores, home offices, condominiums/apartments, and small offices; and capital goods, such as heavy equipment for mining, plantation, forestry, barge, tugboat, and production machinery, as well as for various purposes, such as marriage, home renovation, travel, worship, education, and other consumption purposes. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DEWA.JK.summary: PT Darma Henwa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides mining contracting, general mining, and equipment maintenance services in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Mining Contractor and Other Services. The company is involved in various mining activities, including land clearing, top soiling, drilling, blasting, overburden removal and dumping, coal getting, coal rom, coal hauling, coal barging, vegetation, and rehabilitation activities, as well as engages in equipment rental and port service businesses. The company was formerly known as PT HWE Indonesia and changed its name to PT Darma Henwa Tbk in September 2005. PT Darma Henwa Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DFAM.JK.summary: PT Dafam Property Indonesia Tbk engages in the property development activities in Indonesia. It develops residential properties; and provides hotel management services. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Semarang, Indonesia. PT Dafam Property Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Pt Dafam.

DGIK.JK.summary: PT Nusa Konstruksi Enjiniring Tbk operates as a construction and engineering company in Indonesia. The company engages in the construction and engineering of building and civil works, including road way, irrigation, reservoir, power plant, rail road, and harbor projects. It is also involved in building, developing, and operating hydroelectric power plants; the mining construction works; and the development of real estate properties. The company was formerly known as PT Duta Graha Indah Tbk and changed its name to PT Nusa Konstruksi Enjiniring Tbk in August 2012. PT Nusa Konstruksi Enjiniring Tbk was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

DGNS.JK.summary: PT Diagnos Laboratorium Utama Tbk provides health services using laboratories. It offers clinical and genomics laboratory, inspection package, homecare diagnosis, SARS-COV-2 examination package, and examination panel services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

DIGI.JK.summary: PT Arkadia Digital Media Tbk operates as an independent and integrated digital media company in Indonesia. It operates Suara.com, a news portal; Matamata.com, a celebrity and entertainment portal; Bolatimes.com, a soccer and sports portal; and Hitekno.com, a technology and gadget portal. The company also operates Dewiku.com, a platform for females; Mobimoto.com, an automotive and motorsports portal; Guideku.com, a travelling, and food and beverage portal; and Himedik.com, a health and medical portal. In addition, it offers content for mobile phone subscribers through Arkadia Mobile; produces video content for clients ranging from government institutions to corporations; and provides event management services. The company was formerly known as PT Bukit Irama and changed its name to PT Arkadia Digital Media Tbk in February 2018. PT Arkadia Digital Media Tbk was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

DIIA.F.summary: PT Intiland Development Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manages, sells, and invests in real estate properties in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Real Estate; Rental of Office Building and Apartments; Industrial Estate; and Facilities. Its property portfolio includes mixed-use and high-rise developments, residential estates, and industrial estates and investment properties in the Greater Jakarta and Surabaya. The company also sells houses and land; develops hotels; operates and manages golf courses; and manages industrial and techno parks, fitness centers, sports clubs, and restaurants. In addition, it engages in the telecommunication business. The company was formerly known as PT Dharmala Intiland Tbk and changed its name to PT Intiland Development Tbk in 2007. PT Intiland Development Tbk was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DILD.JK.summary: PT Intiland Development Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manages, sells, and invests in real estate properties in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Real Estate; Rental of Office Building and Apartments; Industrial Estate; and Facilities. Its property portfolio includes mixed-use and high-rise developments, residential estates, and industrial estates and investment properties in the Greater Jakarta and Surabaya. The company also sells houses and land; develops hotels; operates and manages golf courses; and manages industrial and techno parks, fitness centers, sports clubs, and restaurants. In addition, it engages in the telecommunication business. The company was formerly known as PT Dharmala Intiland Tbk and changed its name to PT Intiland Development Tbk in 2007. PT Intiland Development Tbk was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DIVA.JK.summary: PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk sells electric vouchers and operates as dealer of telecommunication products in Indonesia. It develops Diva Smart Outlet, a sales force automation platform for retailers or distributors for managing businesses; and Diva intelligent instant messaging, an instant messaging platform for B2B customers in the telecommunication, banking, and travel and tourism sectors. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Distribusi Voucher Nusantara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT 1 Inti Dot Com.

DKFT.JK.summary: PT Central Omega Resources Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the mining and trading of mineral resources in Indonesia. It explores for nickel and copper ores. The company was formerly known as PT Duta Kirana Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT Central Omega Resources Tbk in 2008. PT Central Omega Resources Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Central Omega Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Jinsheng Mining.

DLTA.JK.summary: PT Delta Djakarta Tbk manufactures and distributes alcoholic beverages in Indonesia. The company offers pilsener and stout beers under the Anker Beer, Anker Lychee, Anker Stout, Carlsberg, Kuda Putih, San Mig Light, San Miguel Pale, and San Miguel Cerveza Negra brands. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1932 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Delta Djakarta Tbk is a subsidiary of San Miguel Malaysia (L) Private Limited.

DMAS.JK.summary: PT Puradelta Lestari Tbk engages in the real estate development business in Indonesia. It operates through five segments: Industrial, Residential, Commercial, Hotel, and Rental. The company sells commercial lots and commercial products, including shop houses; residential products, such as landed houses; and develops investment properties of rental factories and hotels, as well as provides clean water supply, waste water treatment, and estate management services comprising cleaning, security, repair and maintenance, and other services. It also develops and manages Kota Deltamas, an integrated township of 3,177 hectares consisting of industrial, residential, and commercial estates. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 18 residential clusters, seven rental factory units, and one hotel. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Puradelta Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of Sinarmas Land Limited.

DMMX.JK.summary: PT Digital Mediatama Maxima Tbk develops and provides a digital trade marketing and cloud advertising exchange platform. It offers hardware for advertising and operating systems; maintenance for hardware and infrastructure; advertising operating system; and advertising content management services, such as advertisement on back walls, digital posters, and signage. The company is also involved in the advertising infrastructure leasing business, which includes digital kiosks or signage leasing; maintenance of advertising infrastructure and advertising content; and operation of the Advertising Exchange Hub platform, a cloud-based commercial display platform. In addition, it operates B2B trade marketing program, which includes advertising and marketing promotions, and sales activation solutions; and sells airtime packages in the form of physical and electronic vouchers, as well as cellular phone starter packs. The company was formerly known as PT Digital Marketing Solution and changed its name to PT Digital Mediatama Maxima Tbk in January 2019. PT Digital Mediatama Maxima Tbk was founded in 2015 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DMND.JK.summary: PT Diamond Food Indonesia Tbk manufactures and distributes consumer goods in Indonesia. Its products include milk and cheese products, juices, chocolates, yogurts, ice creams, dressings, toppings and creamidor products. The company is also involved in the production and processing of dairy-based products and frozen food products; trading and distribution of food and beverage products, and non-food equipment and supplies; and retail of food and beverage products. PT Diamond Food Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1995 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

DNAR.JK.summary: PT Bank Oke Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers current and saving account, demand, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit; and offers working capital, investment, and consumer loans, such as mortgages and vehicle loans. The company also provides transfer of funds through RTGS and SKN, ATMs, telephone Payment, foreign exchange, safe deposit box leasing, and bank guarantee services, as well as internet/mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 19 branches. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Oke Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Apro Financial Co., Ltd.

DNET.JK.summary: PT Indoritel Makmur Internasional Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a fiber optic network provider company in Indonesia. The company operates in segments, Fiber Optic and E-Commerce Daily Deals. The Fiber Optic segment provides infrastructure, pay TV providers, and cellular telecommunication providers. The E-Commerce Daily Deals segment operates OgahRugi.com, an online business portal that offers daily deals discount vouchers from various merchants. The company is involved in the investment, general trading, and agency businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Dyviacom Intrabumi, Tbk. and changed its name to PT Indoritel Makmur Internasional Tbk. in June 2013. PT Indoritel Makmur Internasional Tbk. was founded in 1995 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DOID.JK.summary: PT Delta Dunia Makmur Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates as a mining contractor in Indonesia. The company provides coal mining, overburden removal, coal hauling, waste removal, reclamation, and land rehabilitation services, as well as coal transportation and road maintenance services. It also engages in the rental of heavy equipment. PT Delta Dunia Makmur Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DPNS.JK.summary: PT Duta Pertiwi Nusantara Tbk engages in the glue, chemical, and mining businesses in Indonesia. It operates through two divisions, Glue Industry and Coal Mining. The company offers urea formaldehyde, phenol formaldehyde, urea melamine formaldehyde, and particle board glues and hardeners; semi-finished products, including formaldehyde; hardeners for producing plywood; and additives, such as emission bonding agents, etc. It is also involved in mining coal. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Pontianak, Indonesia. PT Duta Pertiwi Nusantara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dutapermana Makmur.

DPUM.JK.long_name: PT Dua Putra Utama Makmur Tbk
DPUM.JK.summary: PT Dua Putra Utama Makmur Tbk engages in the fisheries and trading businesses in Indonesia. Its fish products include Indian mackerel, black pomfret, narrow-barred Spanish mackerel, large-head hairtail, snapper, spotted sardine, moonfish, round scad, short-fin scad, bullet tuna, frigate tuna, skipjack tuna, trevally, barracuda, thread-fin bream, hard-tail scad, leather jacket, tuna, purple-spotted big eye, grouper, conger eel, emperor, parrotfish, lizardfish, banyar fish, hammer croaker, samge, swangi, bloso, lemadang, silago, grouper, pure-bred, deho, salem, splotch, salmon, trevally, badong, tuna, manyung, kuniran, milkfish, jahan, etc. The company also provides shrimp products comprising white, black tiger, sea tiger, pink, flower, and vannamei shrimps; and squids, cuttlefish, and octopus. In addition, it offers processed food, including marugoto, ebi furay, ebi fritter, katsu ball squid and shrimp, nugget shrimp, squid nugget and beef, and shrimp steak and meatballs. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Pati, Indonesia. PT Dua Putra Utama Makmur Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pandawa Putra Investama.

DSFI.JK.long_name: PT Dharma Samudera Fishing Industries Tbk
DSFI.JK.summary: PT Dharma Samudera Fishing Industries Tbk, together with its subsidiary, engages in collecting, processing, marketing, and trading of fishing products in Indonesia. The company provides fish fillet, red snapper, grouper, tuna, king fish, octopus, cuttlefish, barramundi, malabar snapper, squid, and other products. It offers its products under the Daruma, April Spring, Pacific Sun, Indo Gold, Pacific Fresh, Lucky Doll, Malacca, Sumatera, Fantastic, and Magenta brands, as well as exports its products to Japan, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dharma Samudera Fishing Industries Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Marina Berkah Investama.

DSNG.JK.summary: PT Dharma Satya Nusantara Tbk engages in the forestry, agriculture and plantation, transportation, plant construction, service, and trading industries in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Palm Oil, Wood Products, and Others. The company plants, produces, and sells palm oil products, including crude palm oil, palm kernel, and palm kernel oil. It also provides various wood products, such as block boards and plywood, as well as panels and engineered floors. As of December 31, 2019, the company had 112,450 hectares of planted areas of palm oil plantations. It also exports its products to Europe, Central America, Canada, Japan, Asia, and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

DSSA.JK.summary: PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the power generation, trading, coal mining and trading, multimedia, forestry, and infrastructure businesses. It operates through Supply of Steam and Electricity, Fertilizer and Chemicals Trading, Rent, and Coal Mining and Trading segments. The company operates 4 units of captive power plants located in Tangerang, Serang, Karawang-1, and Karawang-2 with a total capacity of 600 megawatts. It also offers research and development, and management consulting services; trades in chemicals, pesticides, and fertilizers; and engages in the pulp and wood chip mill activities. In addition, the company provides pay TV and Internet service provider services; and venture capital and management services. It also operates in Indonesia, China, India, Korea, Spain, Thailand, Cambodia, and Dubai. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Tunggal.

DSX.SG.summary: PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the power generation, trading, coal mining and trading, multimedia, forestry, and infrastructure businesses. It operates through Supply of Steam and Electricity, Fertilizer and Chemicals Trading, Rent, and Coal Mining and Trading segments. The company operates 4 units of captive power plants located in Tangerang, Serang, Karawang-1, and Karawang-2 with a total capacity of 600 megawatts. It also offers research and development, and management consulting services; trades in chemicals, pesticides, and fertilizers; and engages in the pulp and wood chip mill activities. In addition, the company provides pay TV and Internet service provider services; and venture capital and management services. It also operates in Indonesia, China, India, Korea, Spain, Thailand, Cambodia, and Dubai. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Tunggal.

DUCK.JK.summary: PT Jaya Bersama Indo Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates various Chinese restaurants in Indonesia. It operates 31 restaurant outlets primarily under the brand names of The Duck King Group, Fook Yew, and Panda Bowl. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Jaya Bersama Indo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Asia Kuliner Sejahtera.

DUTI.JK.summary: PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk primarily engages in the real estate business in Indonesia. The company operates through Real Estate, Property, Hotel, and Information Technology segments. It offers houses, shop houses, condominiums, apartments, office buildings, shopping centers, and other buildings, as well as land; and rents real estate properties. It also operates hotels and a recreation arena; and provides information technology services. PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bumi Serpong Damai Tbk.

DVLA.JK.summary: PT Darya-Varia Laboratoria Tbk engages in the manufacture and trading of pharmaceutical products and cosmetics in Indonesia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Prescription Drugs, Consumer Health Products, and Export and Toll Manufacturing Services. It provides various prescription and consumer health products in antibiotic, antiparasit, antiseptic, anti-fungal, cough and cold, cardiology, central nervous system, gastro-hepatology, somatic, vitamin and food supplement, women healthcare, ear healthcare, and derma medic areas. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Darya-Varia Laboratoria Tbk is a subsidiary of Blue Sphere Singapore Pte. Ltd.

DWGL.JK.summary: PT Dwi Guna Laksana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining and trading activities in Indonesia. It also offers port, crushing, loading, and barging services. The company has a concession area of 412.8 hectares located in the Jilatan Village, district of Batu Ampar, Regency of Tanah Laut, South Kalimantan. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Banjarmasin, Indonesia. PT Dwi Guna Laksana Tbk is a subsidiary of Hawthorn-Capital Investment Pte. Ltd.

DYAN.JK.summary: PT Dyandra Media International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides event solutions in Indonesia. The company organizes events and exhibitions; and provides supporting events. It also operates venues and halls, including convention and exhibition halls; and hotels. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dyandra Media International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Teletransmedia.

E5F.F.summary: PT XL Axiata Tbk provides telecommunication, telecommunications network, and multimedia services for consumers and businesses in Indonesia. The company offers cellular mobile and closed fixed network, Internet service provider, voice over Internet protocol, content provider, money remitter service, e-money issuance services, and Internet interconnection services. It also provides leased line, VPN MPLS, corporate Internet, and voice over Internet protocol services; mobile data and home broadband services; data center and cloud services; mobile communication services; and mobile advertising and big data services, such as messaging services, display services, and digital rewards, as well as Internet of Things based solutions. The company was formerly known as PT Excelcomindo Pratama Tbk. and changed its name to PT XL Axiata Tbk in 2009. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT XL Axiata Tbk is a subsidiary of Axiata Investments (Indonesia) Sdn. Bhd.

EAST.JK.summary: PT Eastparc Hotel Tbk owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. It operates Eastparc Hotel, a 5 star hotel with 189 guestrooms located in Yogyakarta. PT Eastparc Hotel Tbk is based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia.

ECII.JK.summary: PT Electronic City Indonesia Tbk engages in the trade of electronic goods in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Sales of Branded Electronic Goods, Rents, and Others. The company offers products in the categories of home appliances, audio and video, IT and mobile devices, and camera and office equipment. It sells its products through online stores. The company is also involved in the property business. PT Electronic City Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

EDGE.JK.summary: PT. Indointernet Tbk, a digital solutions company, provides information and communication technology infrastructure services in Indonesia. It offers connectivity, network managed, IT managed, data center, and cloud services. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia.

EKAD.JK.summary: PT Ekadharma International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets self-adhesive tapes in Indonesia and Malaysia. The company offers aluminum foil, anti-slip, cloth, double foam, double side, Kraft, masking, metalizing, OPP, OPP printing, PVC electrical insulation, and stationery tapes; stretch films; epoxy, water, and white glues; and glue sticks under the DAIMARU, SUPERFIX, and EKATAPE brands. It is also involved in the trading of carton sealers and stretch wrappers. The company was formerly known as PT Ekadharma Widya Grafika and changed its name to PT Ekadharma International Tbk in 2006. PT Ekadharma International Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Ekadharma International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Ekadharma Inti Perkasa.

ELSA.JK.summary: PT Elnusa Tbk provides oil and gas services in Indonesia. The company operates through Integrated Upstream Oil and Gas Services; Oil and Gas Support Services; and Energy Distribution and Logistics Services segments. It offers geophysical/seismic data measurement services, such as seismic and non-seismic data acquisition, and seismic data processing; and drilling and oilfield services, including drilling, hydraulic workover, coiled tubing, cementing and pumping, drilling fluid, drilling evaluation, electric wireline logging, surface well testing and drill stem testing, mud logging and H2S, slick line, artificial lift, operation and maintenance, enhance oil recovery, and well plug and abandonment. The company also provides data licensing solutions, data access services, and integrated data management solutions; and integrated storage system, online helpdesk, mobile storage services, delivery, health safety security environment system, and electrical power backup services. In addition, it offers threading services; logistic and marine support services for field operation, such as tug boat, crew boat, and accommodation work barges, as well as rents multipurpose barges; and services for mining and general businesses. Further, PT Elnusa Tbk engages in transportation, depot, and trading business; operates fuel and LPG filling stations; and distributes and trades in oil, gas, and chemicals. The company was formerly known as PT Electronika Nusantara and changed its name to PT Elnusa Tbk in September 1969. PT Elnusa Tbk was founded in 1969 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Elnusa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina (Persero).

ELTY.JK.summary: PT Bakrieland Development Tbk. operates as an integrated property company in Indonesia. The company develops and sells land, housing, apartment/condominium, and office spaces; rents and manages office, spaces, and courts; manages the shopping centers and theme park; and operates hotels. It is also involved in the construction, trading, investment, and refinancing businesses; and the management of recreation and tourism areas, a sport center, buildings, apartments, and residential areas. In addition, the company provides food and beverage services. The company was formerly known as PT Elang Realty Tbk. and changed its name to PT Bakrieland Development Tbk. in April 1997. PT Bakrieland Development Tbk. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

EMDE.JK.summary: PT Megapolitan Developments Tbk operates as a property development company in Indonesia. It develops shopping centers, housing estates, commercial districts, and business centers. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Megapolitan Developments Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Cosmopolitan Persada Developments.

EMTK.JK.summary: PT Elang Mahkota Teknologi Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides media, information technology, connectivity, and other services in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Media, Solutions, and Others. The Media segment is involved in free-to-air television broadcasting business through 3 television channels, including PT Indosiar Visual Mandiri, PT Surya Citra Televisi, and PT Omni Intivision, as well as film, video production, megaportal website, and digital publishing businesses. The Solutions segment provides a range of infrastructure solutions and services that include telecommunications and networking, banking software and hardware, integrated very small aperture terminal solutions, and telecommunication's retail distribution solutions. The Others segment offers connectivity services, such as internet, DVBT pay TV, and wireless broadband services; and medical service, as well as engages in fintech and other businesses. The company is also involved in trading of medical equipment, leasing of broadcasting and film studios, trading of multimedia film and content, content management and production, ad based video-on demand and subscription video-on demand, and online media businesses; and provision of tower lease, management, information technology, tourism, artist management, and outdoor media advertising services. PT Elang Mahkota Teknologi Tbk was founded in 1983 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ENRG.JK.summary: PT Energi Mega Persada Tbk, an upstream oil and gas company, engages in the exploration, development, production, and trading of crude oil and natural gas in Indonesia and Mozambique. It has interests in oil and gas properties located in Kangean Island, East Java province, Riau, North Sumatra, and East Kalimantan provinces. PT Energi Mega Persada Tbk was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ENZO.JK.summary: PT Morenzo Abadi Perkasa engages in the processing and export of seafood to various countries. It offers a range of products from pasteurized crabmeat to frozen seafood, such as squid, shrimp, soft shell crab, octopus, cuttlefish, etc. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Demak, Indonesia.

EPAC.JK.summary: PT Megalestari Epack Sentosaraya Tbk engages in plastic packaging business in Indonesia. The company is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Megalestari Epack Sentosaraya Tbk is a subsidiary of ePac Flexibles Asia Pte. Ltd.

EPMT.JK.summary: PT Enseval Putera Megatrading Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution and supply of pharmaceutical products in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Pharmaceutical, Consumer Products, and Others. It also trades in medical and laboratory equipment and supplies; operates health care clinics; and offers dental and other equipment, as well as calibration services. In addition, the company engages in the trading of raw materials for pharmaceutical products; consumable products for hemodialysis therapy; and food and beverages. Further, it offers warehousing services, including chiller, cool, and ambient rooms, as well as container chiller as facilities. The company was formerly known as PT Arya Gupta Cempaka and changed its name to PT Enseval Putera Megatrading Tbk in August 1993. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Enseval Putera Megatrading Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kalbe Farma Tbk.

ERAA.JK.summary: PT Erajaya Swasembada Tbk imports, distributes, and retails mobile telecommunication products in Indonesia. The company offers mobile phones and tablets, subscriber identity module cards, prepaid mobile vouchers, accessories, Internet of Things devices, and Google Play gift cards; computers and other electronic devices; and trades in medical equipment, as well as provides value added services, including mobile phones protection and cellphone leasing services. It also engages in information technology system; management consulting; outsourcing; and property businesses. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Erajaya Swasembada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Eralink International.

ERTX.JK.summary: PT Eratex Djaja Tbk manufactures and sells garments in Indonesia and internationally. It is involved in spinning, weaving, dyeing, finishing, printing, false twisting, and knitting. The company's products include jeans, casual dress pants, denims, and Italian twills. It is also involved in the general trading business. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Eratex Djaja Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Buana Indah Garment.

ESIP.JK.summary: PT Sinergi Inti Plastindo Tbk provides plastic packaging products in Indonesia and internationally. It offers low and high density polyethylene products, such as T-shirt bags, soft loop handle bags, poly draw bags, and patch handle bags. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sinergi Inti Plastindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tanindo Omega Pasifik.

ESSA.JK.summary: PT Surya Esa Perkasa Tbk engages in purification and processing of natural gas in Indonesia. The company operates through LPG Refinery, Ammonia, and Others segments. It offers LPG primarily for use as a kitchen appliance fuel for homes, shopping centers, and hotels; and motor vehicle fuel, as well as for construction industries such as steel workshop as welding fuel. The company also provides propane; condensate for use as a raw material for thinner, glue, and vehicle tires applications, as well as light naphtha, which is a cracker material for the manufacture of polyethylene; and ammonia that is used as a raw material for fertilizer production, pharmaceutical, food and beverage, textile, industrial and household cleaning, water and wastewater treatment, metallurgical processes, pulp and paper, leather, rubber, and other applications.In addition, it offers management and business consulting services; operates an ammonia plant; and sells raw feed gas through pipelines. PT Surya Esa Perkasa Tbk was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ESTA.JK.summary: PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk owns and operates a hotel under the Hotel 88 name in Indonesia. The company's Hotel 88 operates a total of 70 rooms located in Bekasi City. It also engages in the rental of shops, as well as rental and trade of passenger cars. The company was formerly known as PT Esta Asri Propertindo and changed its name to PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk in September 2019. PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in South Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Esta Multi Usaha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Esta Utama Corpora.

ESTI.JK.summary: PT Ever Shine Tex Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells synthetic yarns and fabrics in Indonesia. The company's Yarn division offers nylon filament, draw textured, air textured, micro, high stretch, dope dyed, and melange and special yarns, as well as polyester high stretch and air textured yarns under the PRS brand for use in various industries, such as circular and warp knitting, elastic, embroidery, fancy yarn, fashion garments, gloves, labels, lingerie, ribbons, sewing threads, socks and hosiery, and sweater. Its Fabric division provides nylon, polyester, and nylon/polyester blended woven fabrics, as well as warp knitting fabrics for garment and lifestyle industries. It also produces special applications fabrics for use in automotive, home furnishings, and outdoor industries, including decorations, furniture, outdoor tents, sleeping bags, car seat covers, and others. The company offers its products under the APL 10000, APOLLO, HUT 1080, DECOTEX, LININGTEX, and PRO-COTTON brand names. It also exports its products. PT Ever Shine Tex Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Ever Shine Tex Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Cahaya Interkontinental.

EXCL.JK.summary: PT XL Axiata Tbk provides telecommunication, telecommunications network, and multimedia services for consumers and businesses in Indonesia. The company offers cellular mobile and closed fixed network, Internet service provider, voice over Internet protocol, content provider, money remitter service, e-money issuance services, and Internet interconnection services. It also provides leased line, VPN MPLS, corporate Internet, and voice over Internet protocol services; mobile data and home broadband services; data center and cloud services; mobile communication services; and mobile advertising and big data services, such as messaging services, display services, and digital rewards, as well as Internet of Things based solutions. The company was formerly known as PT Excelcomindo Pratama Tbk. and changed its name to PT XL Axiata Tbk in 2009. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT XL Axiata Tbk is a subsidiary of Axiata Investments (Indonesia) Sdn. Bhd.

FAPA.JK.summary: PT FAP Agri Tbk operates as an agricultural producing company in Indonesia. It processes and produces palm oil and other related products. The company is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

FAST.JK.summary: PT Fast Food Indonesia Tbk engages in the food and restaurant activities in Indonesia. The company holds the rights to establish and operate Kentucky Fried Chicken (KFC) outlets. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 748 restaurant outlets. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

FILM.JK.summary: PT MD Pictures Tbk produces and distributes films and videos in Indonesia. It is also involved in the studio rental and shooting equipment rental activities. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT MD Pictures Tbk is a subsidiary of PT MD Graha Utama.

FIMP.JK.summary: PT Fimperkasa Utama Tbk engages in the construction service business in Indonesia. Its portfolio of services cover building and residential construction comprising residential homes, estates, apartments, mini buildings, sport centers, and school buildings; commercial and industrial constructions, such as shophouses and offices, buildings and facilities, factories, warehouses, facilities and infrastructure, and industrial area; and civil and infrastructure constructions, including land preparation, highways, bridges and flyovers, parking areas, and dams/reservoirs. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

FIRE.JK.summary: PT Alfa Energi Investama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining and trading business in Indonesia. The company holds interests in a concession with approximately 2,089 hectares located in Kutai Kartanegara, East Kalimantan; and a concession with approximately 6,000 hectares located in West Kutai, East Kalimantan. It also provides coal mining management services. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

FISH.JK.summary: PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, supplies food and feed ingredients in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Trading and Distribution, Manufacturing, and Logistic. The company engages in the wholesale trading of various goods, which includes canola seed, millet, and canary seed; food and beverages consisting rice flour, tapioca flour, caramel, shrimp crackers, pet food, and animal feed; and agriculture yields, as well as rice, corn, un-hulled rice, wheat, secondary crops, and other cereals; and other agricultural products and live animals. It also offers fishery products, such as fish, shrimp, crabs, oysters, pearls, clams, seaweed, sponges and frogs, and fish seeds; vegetable oils and fats; pharmaceuticals; and fish meal and oil products. In addition, the company provides business advisory services; purchases, sells, leases, and operates properties, such as apartment, residential, and non-residential buildings; warehousing and storage services; and cold storage services. Further, it provides fermented and non-fermented soybean products; oilseed meals include soybean meals and rapeseed meals; grain milling co-products, consisting dried distiller's grains soluble, wheat bran, and corn gluten meal and feed products; and logistics services, including port logistics, warehouse management, transport, and distribution services, as well as bulk handling and product packaging services. Additionally, the company involved in the development and management of industrial zones; and provision of loading and unloading services. It serves aquaculture and animal feed industries, and food processors. The company was formerly known as PT Fishindo Kusuma Sejahtera Tbk and changed its name to PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk in June 2006. PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk is a subsidiary of PT FKS Corporindo Indonesia.

FITT.JK.summary: PT Hotel Fitra International Tbk owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. The company operates Fitra Hotel, a three-star hotel with 113 rooms located in Majalengka. It also provides travel and tourism services. The company is based in Majalengka, Indonesia.

FMII.JK.summary: PT Fortune Mate Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides real estate development and construction services primarily in Indonesia. Its project portfolio includes office, industrial, and residential properties, as well as land. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

FOOD.JK.summary: PT Sentra Food Indonesia Tbk engages in selling and processing of fresh meat and food and beverages products in Indonesia. The company operates through Fresh Meat, Processed Meat, and Others divisions. It offers sausages, burgers, meatballs, delicatessen, kebabs, dried beef, mayonnaise, and thousand island. The company was formerly known as PT Sentra Darmaga and changed its name to PT Sentra Food Indonesia Tbk in August 2018. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Sentra Food Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Super Capital Indonesia.

FORU.JK.summary: PT Fortune Indonesia Tbk operates as an advertising agency in Indonesia. It operates through five segments: Media, Advertising, Activation, Digital, and Public Relations. The Media segment offers consulting services for planning and implementation of the media advertising shopping, which includes electronic, digital, and print, as well as outdoor media, and media monitoring and analysis services. The Advertising segment provides management consulting services, and marketing and production communication strategies comprising graphic design that includes creative concepts, logos, corporate identities, brands and products, packaging and advertising, and community services. The Activation segment offers consulting services for planning and implementing promotions, exhibitions, and interactive audio visual services, including multi-media and event management services. The Digital segment provides consulting services and implementing virtual communications, which consist communication in cyberspace and social media, as well as site and account development and management, and analysis services. The Public Relations segment offers communications services; crisis management, investor, media, and government relations; corporate, investigation, and supervision marketing; and marketing intelligence and analysis services. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Fortune Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Karya Citra Prima.

FORZ.JK.summary: PT Forza Land Indonesia Tbk engages in the property development business in Indonesia. It primarily develops industrial estates, apartment buildings, condominiums, offices, and shops and facilities, as well as other residential projects. The company was formerly known as PT Megah Satu Properti and changed its name to PT Forza Land Indonesia Tbk in 2016. PT Forza Land Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2012 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

FPNI.JK.summary: PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes polyethylene products in Indonesia. It produces high density polyethylene, low density polyethylene, and linear low density polyethylene products; and polypropylene homopolymers, and polypropylene random and impact copolymers, as well as imports BOPP films. The company is also involved in the wholesale trade of polyethylene and polypropylene. The company was formerly known as P.T. Titan Kimia Nusantara Tbk and changed its name to PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk in April 2013. PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk is a subsidiary of Lotte Chemical Titan International Sdn. Bhd.

FREN.JK.summary: PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication services in Indonesia. The company develops, builds, owns, operates, leases, and maintains facilities and network to operate telecommunications network and services, as well as information and convergence technology services; imports, trades in, distributes, and sells telecommunication goods, equipment, and/or products; and provides after sales services for telecommunication goods, equipment, and/or products. It also offers multimedia products and related services, including voice services, data/image, and other mobile commercial services; electronic money services; and payment services, and/or domestic and international money remittance services. The company was formerly known as PT Mobile-8 Telecom Tbk and changed its name to PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk in March 2011. PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

FUJI.JK.summary: PT Fuji Finance Indonesia Tbk operates as a finance company in Indonesia. It offers investment finance for various industrial machineries and equipment; working capital finance; multipurpose finance for procurement of goods or services; invoice factoring services; bridging finance; and finance for green energy projects, such as solar power system. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

GAMA.JK.summary: PT Aksara Global Development Tbk develops real estate properties in Indonesia. The company operates through Apartments and Houses segments. Its property portfolio includes land, apartments, shop houses, houses, and other properties. The company also constructs buildings, bridges, roads, docks, housing buildings, schools, recreational parks, market or modern markets, hospitals, and other buildings; and offers consultation service in the areas of business and management, property, architecture, landscape, design and interior, civil, property agent, and others. In addition, it is involved in export and import, and wholesale trading activities; and the manufacture of building materials and construction tools. PT Aksara Global Development Tbk serves middle-class income families in second-tier cities and urban areas. The company was formerly known as PT Gading Development Tbk. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

GDST.JK.summary: PT Gunawan Dianjaya Steel Tbk produces and sells hot rolled steel plates in Indonesia. It offers steel plates for general use, such as low carbon structural steel plates and high strength low alloy structural steel plates; steel plates for boilers and pressure vessels; and steel plates for ship building, including mild steels and high tensile steels. The company also exports its products. PT Gunawan Dianjaya Steel Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

GDYR.JK.summary: PT Goodyear Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells tires for automobiles, airplanes, and related components in Indonesia and internationally. The company also imports, exports, and distributes tires, inner tubes, flaps, and other rubber derivative products. As of December 31, 2019, it owned 47 Autocare outlets. The company was formerly known as NV The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company Limited and changed its name to PT Goodyear Indonesia Tbk in July 1978. PT Goodyear Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1917 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Goodyear Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

GEMA.JK.summary: PT Gema Grahasarana Tbk operates as an interior contractor and furniture manufacturer in Indonesia and internationally.
