It offers a range of products and services, such as interior fit-outs, furniture and panel manufacturing, mechanical and electrical installation, maintenance, and logistics. The company also manufactures and sells customized, modular, home and office, and hospitality furniture. In addition, the company is involved in trading laminated material interior and furniture; house, and office furniture and equipment; and interior and furniture components. It serves banking and financial institutions; oil, gas, and mining, as well as retail and hospitality industries; and multinational company and others. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Gema Grahasarana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Virucci Indogriya Sarana.

GGG.F.summary: PT Gudang Garam Tbk produces and sells cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Cigarettes, Paperboards, and Others segments. It offers hand-rolled, machine-made, and klobot clove cigarettes. The company markets its products under the Gudang Garam Family, Surya Family, and GG Family brand names. It is also involved in trading activities. In addition, the company provides non-scheduled air transportation and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as PT Perusahaan Rokok Tjap ÂGudang GaramÂ Kediri. PT Gudang Garam Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Kediri, Indonesia. PT Gudang Garam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Suryaduta Investama.

GGNPF.summary: PT Gudang Garam Tbk produces and sells cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Cigarettes, Paperboards, and Others segments. It offers hand-rolled, machine-made, and klobot clove cigarettes. The company markets its products under the Gudang Garam Family, Surya Family, and GG Family brand names. It is also involved in trading activities. In addition, the company provides non-scheduled air transportation and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as PT Perusahaan Rokok Tjap ÂGudang GaramÂ Kediri. PT Gudang Garam Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Kediri, Indonesia. PT Gudang Garam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Suryaduta Investama.

GGRM.JK.summary: PT Gudang Garam Tbk produces and sells cigarettes in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Cigarettes, Paperboards, and Others segments. It offers hand-rolled, machine-made, and klobot clove cigarettes. The company markets its products under the Gudang Garam Family, Surya Family, and GG Family brand names. It is also involved in trading activities. In addition, the company provides non-scheduled air transportation and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as PT Perusahaan Rokok Tjap ÂGudang GaramÂ Kediri. PT Gudang Garam Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Kediri, Indonesia. PT Gudang Garam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Suryaduta Investama.

GGRP.JK.summary: PT Gunung Raja Paksi Tbk produces and sells steel products in Indonesia and internationally. The company offers slabs, blooms, beam blanks, and billets; coil plates and derivatives; and steel profiles and derivatives, as well as hot steel coils and steel plates. It serves bridge, building, and other projects. The company was formerly known as PT Gunung Naga Mas and changed its name to PT Gunung Raja Paksi Tbk in 1991. PT Gunung Raja Paksi Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Gunung Raja Paksi Tbk is a subsidiary of Orientstar Pte. Ltd.

GH8.F.summary: PT. Gajah Tunggal Tbk produces and distributes tires for passenger cars, SUVs, commercial vehicles, off-the-road vehicles, industrial vehicles, and motorcycles. It also manufactures and sells other rubber related products, such as synthetic rubber, tire cords, inner tube, flap, o-ring, and other products, as well as nylon filament yarn, polyester chips as raw materials for nylon cord, and fishing net yarn. In addition, the company engages in general trading activities. It markets its products in Indonesia, the United States, Asia, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Australia, and Oceania. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

GHON.JK.summary: PT Gihon Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk provides telecommunications support services in Indonesia. The company engages in the engineering, design, construction, installation, and network integration of telecommunication towers. It also provides leasing, operation, and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

GIAA.JK.summary: PT. Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk provides airline services in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Flight Operation, Aircraft Maintenance Services, and Other Operations segments. The company undertakes the scheduled and non-scheduled commercial air transportation of domestic or international passengers, cargoes, and mails; and provides aircraft repair, maintenance, and overhaul services. It also distributes computerized reservation systems; and provides travel agency, ticketing, aircraft rental, catering, hotel management, cargo, information technology, and ground handling services. The company operates through a fleet of 142 aircraft. PT. Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

GJTL.JK.summary: PT. Gajah Tunggal Tbk produces and distributes tires for passenger cars, SUVs, commercial vehicles, off-the-road vehicles, industrial vehicles, and motorcycles. It also manufactures and sells other rubber related products, such as synthetic rubber, tire cords, inner tube, flap, o-ring, and other products, as well as nylon filament yarn, polyester chips as raw materials for nylon cord, and fishing net yarn. In addition, the company engages in general trading activities. It markets its products in Indonesia, the United States, Asia, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Australia, and Oceania. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

GLOB.JK.summary: PT Global Teleshop Tbk engages in the retail and distribution of cellular phones and operator products in Indonesia. It operates through Cellular Phones, Reload vouchers, Content, and Other segments. The company offers smart phones, tablets, computers, audio products, wearable devices, gadget accessories, and lifestyle and travel products, and fashion and accessories. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 43 Global Teleshop outlets and service centers. The company was formerly known as PT Pro Empower Perkasa. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Global Teleshop Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Trikomsel Oke Tbk.

GLVA.JK.summary: PT Galva Technologies Tbk supplies electronic products in Indonesia. The company operates through Business Solutions, IT Distribution, and Printing Solutions segments. It primarily sells computers, printers, displays, and audio-video equipment. The company also sells broadcasting products, audio visual and media products, PA and communication products, professional audio and lighting products, digital signage products, security systems, projectors, and accessories. In addition, it offers system integration, design, installation, integration, maintenance, and engineering support services; and a range of hardware and business process solutions, including scanning, archiving, document management, and managed print services, as well as distributes software. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Galva Technologies Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Elsiscom Prima Karya.

GMFI.JK.long_name: PT Garuda Maintenance Facility Aero Asia Tbk
GMFI.JK.summary: PT Garuda Maintenance Facility Aero Asia Tbk provides various aircraft maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) services for aircraft, engines, and components in Africa, Asia, Australia, America, Europe, and Oceania. The company operates through three segments: Repairs and Overhauls, Line Maintenance, and Other Operations. Its MRO services include line maintenance, base maintenance, airframe, component, engineering, material and logistics, cabin maintenance, engine and APU maintenance, learning center, power, and aircraft support, as well as technical ground handling. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Garuda Maintenance Facility Aero Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.

GMTD.JK.long_name: PT Gowa Makassar Tourism Development Tbk
GMTD.JK.summary: PT Gowa Makassar Tourism Development Tbk engages in the real estate and urban development activities in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Real Estate and Supporting. The company develops residential and commercial buildings, hotels, recreational facilities, and non-commercial supporting facilities; and planned areas, facilities, and infrastructure. It also provides ready-to-build land for consumers; and services related to township management, as well as manages built facilities and infrastructure. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Makassar, Indonesia.

GOLD.JK.summary: PT Visi Telekomunikasi Infrastruktur Tbk provides telecommunication infrastructure services in Indonesia. It offers general telecommunication; telecommunication equipment maintenance; multimedia and utilization; procurement of telecommunication human resources; tower and telecommunication equipment leasing; transportation; and base transceiver station tower leasing and management services, as well as consultation services for the telecommunication and electrical sectors. The company also provides leasing and management services for buildings, office and retail spaces, apartment rooms, and condominiums; and consultation services for management, administration business, business development, and investment strategy, as well as for the construction sector. In addition, it invests in other companies. The company was formerly known as PT Golden Retailindo Tbk and changed its name to PT Visi Telekomunikasi Infrastruktur Tbk in August 2016. PT Visi Telekomunikasi Infrastruktur Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Visi Telekomunikasi Infrastruktur Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tower Bersama Infrastruktur Tbk.

GOOD.JK.long_name: PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk
GOOD.JK.summary: PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk provides snacks and beverages in Indonesia. The company operates through Snack Foods, Beverages, and Others segments. It offers biscuits, peanuts, bread, chocolates, ready-to-drink drinks, confectioneries, and milk processing products; and snacks, such as atomic, salted, sukro, and crunchy peanuts, as well as foods made from soybeans and other nuts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tudung Putra Putri Jaya.

GPRA.JK.summary: PT Perdana Gapuraprima Tbk develops real estate properties in Indonesia. The company develops shopping centers, offices, apartments, hotels, condotels, houses, commercial, and mixed used projects. It also engages in planning and supervising housing and building development activities, as well as purchasing and selling of buildings and land rights. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Perdana Gapuraprima Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Citraabadi Kotapersada.

GSMF.JK.summary: PT Equity Development Investment Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides insurance products and services in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Insurance; Financing; Securities and Stock Administration; and Equity Participation, Travel Services, and Venture Capital. It offers general insurance products, such as fire, motor vehicles, accident, marine hull, engineering, and marine cargo; and life insurance products, including whole life, term insurance, health assurance, unitized pensions, unit link, pure endowment pensions, mortgage reduction term allowance, and combined endowments, as well as provides reinsurance services. The company also provides financial lease, consumer financing, and factoring services, as well as health insurance and pension fund; operates as an underwriter, broker, investment manager, and advisor; and offers venture capital services. In addition, it offers travel services; insurance brokerage services; share registrar services; mutual funds; and administration and health services. The company was formerly known as PT Gajah Surya Arta Leasing. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Equity Development Investment Tbk is a subsidiary of Equity Global International Limited.

GWSA.JK.summary: PT Greenwood Sejahtera Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops real estate properties in Indonesia. It is also involved in the sale and rental of apartments, shopping centers, and offices; and operation of a hotel. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Greenwood Sejahtera Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Prima Permata Sejahtera.

GZCO.JK.summary: PT Gozco Plantations Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, develops and operates oil palm plantations. It is also involved in the processing of crude palm oil and palm kernel; and production of fruit bunches for distribution in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Surya Gemilang Sentosa and changed its name to PT Gozco Plantations Tbk in December 2007. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

HADE.JK.summary: PT Himalaya Energi Perkasa Tbk provides financial advisory services. The company offers offline and online trading services; underwriting services; and financial advisory services, such as corporate actions, including merger and acquisition, limited public offering, restructuring, and financing transaction. It also provides trade and debt syndication, and sector financing services. In addition, the company engages in the debt origination, underwriting, securitization, and trading of asset backed securities activities, such as the securitization of housing loans, commercial property, automobile, and credit card; and provision of marketing and distribution services for the products selling, government, corporate, sukuk, and Repo bonds for institutional investor clients, such as banks, pension funds, insurance companies, government agencies, cooperative employees, and financial institutions. Further, it provides liquefied petroleum gas refueling services. The company was formerly known as PT HD Capital Tbk. PT Himalaya Energi Perkasa Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

HDFA.JK.summary: PT Radana Bhaskara Finance Tbk primarily engages in consumer financing activities in Indonesia. The company provides financing services for new and second-hand motor vehicles. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 41 branch offices located in Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi, West Java, Central Java, East Java, North Sumatera, Riau, and South Sumatera. The company was formerly known as PT HD Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT Radana Bhaskara Finance Tbk in June 2014. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. As of November 25, 2019, PT Radana Bhaskara Finance Tbk operates as a prior subsidiary of PT Tiara Marga Trakindo.

HDIT.JK.summary: PT Hensel Davest Indonesia Tbk engages in the financial technology and e-commerce business in Indonesia. It offers mobile bill payment application under the DavestPay brand, as well as a payment point service for business owners; operates an e-commerce platform to facilitate business owners to have their own e-commerce marketplace; and provides integrated financial services, such as money transfer, multifinance, lending, and payment gateway. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

HEAL.JK.summary: PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk operates a network of general hospitals in Indonesia. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 37 hospitals comprising 8 type B hospitals and 29 type C hospitals. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

HELI.JK.summary: PT Jaya Trishindo Tbk provides business and private helicopter charter services in Indonesia. The company is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

HERO.JK.summary: PT Hero Supermarket Tbk engages in the retail business primarily in Indonesia. It operates through Food and Non Food segments. The company operates supermarket, hypermarket, and specialty stores, including pharmacy, drugs stores, health and beauty stores, home furnishing stores, etc. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 22 Hero supermarkets, 100 Giant stores comprising Giant Ekspres and Giant Ekstra, 293 Guardian stores, and 2 IKEA stores. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in South Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Hero Supermarket Tbk is a subsidiary of Mulgrave Corporation B.V.

HEXA.JK.summary: PT Hexindo Adiperkasa Tbk engages in the trading and rental of heavy equipment and related spare parts in Indonesia. It offers excavators, loading shovels, wheel loaders, rigid frame trucks, articulated dump trucks, used equipment, and consolidated solutions for construction sites; and a range of equipment to suit various industry solutions, such as mining, quarrying, general construction, demolition, recycling, and forestry. The company also provides various parts, such as lubricants, filters, undercarriages, O-ring kits for control valves, ground engaging tools, seal kits, and remanufactured components; and support services. It offers Hitachi, John Deere, Krupp, and Bell branded products. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Hexindo Adiperkasa Tbk is a subsidiary of Hitachi Construction Machinery Co. Ltd.

HITS.JK.summary: PT Humpuss Intermoda Transportasi Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sea transportation and other related activities in Indonesia. The company operates through Chartered Vessels Services; and Crews and Vessel Management Services and Other Services divisions. It transports liquefied natural gas, crude and fuel oil, chemicals, containers, coal, and other sea cargoes. The company also provides vessel crews and management services to vessel owners, as well as charters vessels; and offshore support vessel, marine support, dredging, and human capital and development services. In addition, it engages in the energy distribution, crew training, and trading activities. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

HKMU.JK.summary: PT HK Metals Utama Tbk manufactures and trades in building and household materials in Indonesia. It offers stainless steel accessories, aluminum coated steel and coil machineries and spare parts, PVC pipes, light steel products, toilet and sanitary wares, and other household materials. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT HK Metals Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hyamn Sukses Abadi.

HMSP.JK.summary: PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. The company engages in the general trading, property development, and expedition and warehousing businesses; e-commerce and agency activities; and the provision of leisure and golf services. It sells its products under the Dji Sam Soe, Sampoerna A, Sampoerna Kretek, and Sampoerna U brand names. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Philip Morris Indonesia.

HOKI.JK.summary: PT Buyung Poetra Sembada Tbk produces and distributes rice in Indonesia. It supplies rice to supermarkets, hypermarkets, and other retail networks under the LIMAS, HOKI, Topi Koki, BPS, and Belida brand names; and broken rice to vermicelli plants. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Buyung Poetra Sembada Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Buyung Investama Gemilang.

HOMI.JK.summary: PT Grand House Mulia Tbk engages in operating residential and commercial properties in Indonesia. It also offers property development consulting service. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.

HOTL.JK.summary: PT. Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk operates in the field of hospitality in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Hotel and Property. It operates hotels, condotels, and resorts. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Saraswati Griya Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Tiara Realty.

HQP.SG.summary: PT Kimia Farma (Persero) Tbk produces and sells medicines, herbal medicines, iodine, salts, quinine and their derivative products, and vegetable oils in Indonesia, rest of Asia, Europe, Australia, Africa, and New Zealand. The company operates through Manufacturing, Distribution, Retail, and Other Services segments. It also manufactures and markets chemical, betalactam and non betalactam, antiretroviral, narcotic, hormone contraceptive, powder, oil castor, edible oil, cosmetic, over the counter, personal, and beauty care products, as well as food supplements, active pharmaceutical ingredients, and medical devices. In addition, the company manufactures, markets, distributes, and trades in pharmaceutical products; and operates drug materials plants. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,278 retail pharmacy outlets, 451 health clinic outlets, 75 clinical laboratories, 10 optics, 3 beauty clinics, and 24 international retail outlets. The company sells its products to pharmacies, drug stores, hospitals, and free traders through pharmaceutical wholesalers. The company was founded in 1817 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

HRME.JK.summary: PT Menteng Heritage Realty Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. The company owns The Hermitage, a hotel located in Menteng, Central Jakarta. It is also involved in mining; general trading and services; and sea and domestic transportation businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Citra Prestasi Abadi and changed its name to PT Menteng Heritage Realty Tbk in October 2007. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Menteng Heritage Realty Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Wisesa Realty.

HRTA.JK.summary: PT Hartadinata Abadi Tbk manufactures and sells gold jewelry products in Indonesia. The company offers necklaces, rings, pendants, earrings, and bracelets. It sells its products through its retail and online stores. The company also provides franchising opportunities for its stores. As of 31, December, 2019 the company operated 26 stores under the Aurum Colection Center (ACC) name, 3 outlets under the Claudia Perfect Jewelery name, and 3 outlets under the Celine Jewelery name. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia. PT Hartadinata Abadi Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Terang Anugrah Abadi.

HRUM.JK.summary: PT Harum Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining and logistics activities in Indonesia. It operates through Coal Mining Sectors, Shipping Services, and Others Sectors divisions. The Coal Mining Sectors division is involved in the general survey, exploration, exploitation, transportation, processing, and sale of coal. The Shipping Services division engages in the transportation and rental of tugboats and barges. The Others Sectors division invests in coal mining, trading, and services businesses. The company also exports its products to China, South Korea, Japan, Taiwan, Hong Kong, India, Bangladesh, Thailand, the Philippines, Singapore, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Asia Antrasit and changed its name to PT Harum Energy Tbk in November 2007. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Harum Energy Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Karunia Bara Perkasa.

HSZ.F.summary: PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. The company engages in the general trading, property development, and expedition and warehousing businesses; e-commerce and agency activities; and the provision of leisure and golf services. It sells its products under the Dji Sam Soe, Sampoerna A, Sampoerna Kretek, and Sampoerna U brand names. The company was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Hanjaya Mandala Sampoerna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Philip Morris Indonesia.

HX1A.F.summary: PT Hexindo Adiperkasa Tbk engages in the trading and rental of heavy equipment and related spare parts in Indonesia. It offers excavators, loading shovels, wheel loaders, rigid frame trucks, articulated dump trucks, used equipment, and consolidated solutions for construction sites; and a range of equipment to suit various industry solutions, such as mining, quarrying, general construction, demolition, recycling, and forestry. The company also provides various parts, such as lubricants, filters, undercarriages, O-ring kits for control valves, ground engaging tools, seal kits, and remanufactured components; and support services. It offers Hitachi, John Deere, Krupp, and Bell branded products. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Hexindo Adiperkasa Tbk is a subsidiary of Hitachi Construction Machinery Co. Ltd.

HX9.F.summary: PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides banking and financial products and services for consumers, small medium enterprises, and commercial and corporate customers in Indonesia. It operates through Retail and Wholesale segments. The company offers savings, checking, and current accounts; time and Sharia deposits; and credit and debit cards. It also provides unsecured personal loans, secured property mortgages, Sharia housing loans, and automotive and business financing services; Sharia leasing; employee cooperative, working capital, investment, trade, mortgage, and financial supply chain financing; and cash management services comprising collection, payment, and liquidity management services. In addition, the company offers foreign exchange, interest rate swap and cross currency swap, marketable securities, money market, and repo/reverse repo products and services; Shariah business and personal; e-banking; personal, investment related, health, and general insurance products and services; investment products, such as mutual funds, investment plans, bonds, and foreign exchanges; and other solutions. As December 31, 2020, the company had 44 conventional main branches; 384 conventional sub-branches, cash branches, and functional branches; and 11 Sharia branches and sub-branches. It also operates a network of approximately 1,487 automated teller machines and 70 cash deposit machines. The company was formerly known as Bank Kopra Indonesia and changed its name to PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk in 1976. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Danamon Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of MUFG Bank, Ltd.

IATA.JK.summary: PT Indonesia Transport & Infrastructure Tbk provides commercial flight and air transport services in Indonesia and South East Asia. The company operates various types of fixed wing aircraft and helicopters. It offers aviation services, such as aircraft and helicopter chartering, air cargo, repair shop, and maintenance and other related services. The company also provides aero medical evacuation, geophysical, and survey aerial photography, as well as air services for the development of tourism industry. It serves onshore and offshore oil, gas, and mining companies. The company was formerly known as PT Indonesia Air Transport Tbk. and changed its name to PT Indonesia Transport & Infrastructure Tbk in April 2014. PT Indonesia Transport & Infrastructure Tbk was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

IBFN.JK.summary: PT Intan Baruprana Finance Tbk operates as a finance company in Indonesia. The company provides finance leasing, consumer financing, and factoring services. It offers financing for new and second-hand capital goods, including heavy equipment, transport equipment and commercial vehicles, shipping equipment, industrial machines, medical equipment, and other supporting facilities. The company also engages in the sale and leaseback financing activities. It provides financing to plantation, infrastructure, mining, transportation, gas and oil, forestry, aquaculture, health, hospitality, and other sectors. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Intan Baruprana Finance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Intraco Penta Tbk.

IBST.JK.summary: PT Inti Bangun Sejahtera Tbk provides telecommunication network services in the Republic of Indonesia. It rents and maintains telecommunication towers. The company's products include Build to Suit (B2S), a rental space from the operator base to build the tower; co-location, a basic rental space; telecommunication infrastructure in the form of BTS Hotel; and microcell pole with fiber optic network. Its products also comprise Metro-E, a data network solution, which can be used to serve the bandwidth requirements of telecom operators; and Cluster Based, an integrated indoor and outdoor coverage service solution for wireless mobile service in clustered area with indoor and outdoor distributed antenna systems. PT Inti Bangun Sejahtera Tbk was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

ICBP.JK.long_name: PT Indofood CBP Sukses Makmur Tbk
ICBP.JK.summary: PT Indofood CBP Sukses Makmur Tbk produces and sells consumers products in Indonesia and internationally. It offers noodles, sauces, and instant seasonings under the Indomie, Supermi, Sarimi, Pop Mie, Sakura, and Mi Telur Cap 3 Ayam brands. The company also provides sweetened condensed milk; UHT, sterilized bottled, and pasteurized liquid milk; powdered milk; ice cream; and butter under the Indomilk, Cap Enaak, Tiga Sapi, Kremer, Orchid Butter, Indoeskrim, Good To Go, and Milkuat brands. In addition, it offers chips and non-chips snacks under the Chitato, Qtela, Lays, Chiki, Cheetos, Jetz, Trenz, Wonderland, Dueto, Doritos brands; and food seasonings, including powdered and liquid seasonings, condiments, and syrups under the Sambal Indofood, Bumbu Special Indofood, Bumbu Racik, Indofood Freiss, Kecap Indofood, and Kecap Piring Lombok brands. Further, the company provides nutrition and special foods, such as baby cereals, follow-on cereals, noodle soups, and baby biscuits, as well as fortified milk for expectant and lactating mothers under the Promina, Sun, Govit, and Gowell brands. Additionally, it offers beverages comprising non-alcoholic beverage products, including tea, packaged water and fruit-flavored drinks, under the brands of Ichi Ocha, Club, and Fruitamin. The company also manufactures packaging materials; provides management consulting, general trading, and transportation services; processes oil and fats; markets and distributes paper diapers; and manages restaurants. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indofood CBP Sukses Makmur Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk.

ICON.JK.summary: PT Island Concepts Indonesia Tbk engages in the catering and maintenance services in Indonesia. The company also provides accommodation services. In addition, it engages in the sale of house, and lot and condotel; and property development activities. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Kuta, Indonesia.

IDO1.F.summary: PT Indosat Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication services in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Cellular; Fixed Telecommunications (Fixed); and Multimedia, Data Communications and Internet (MIDI). The Cellular segment offers postpaid and prepaid products that include various data and mobile voice solutions on 2G, 3G, and 4G broadband cellular networks. This segment markets its products under the IM3 Ooredoo brand. The Fixed segment provides international direct dial, international roaming, and fixed line services. The MIDI segment offers internet and data communication services, such as high-speed point-to-point international and domestic leased circuits with broadband and narrowband capacity, internet protocol-virtual private network, and multiprotocol label switching-based services. This segment also provides satellite-based services, such as transponder leasing and VSAT services, as well as various types of IT services comprising disaster recovery center and data center services, and infrastructure-as-a-service solutions. It provides services under the Indosat Ooredoo brand name. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indosat Tbk is a subsidiary of Ooredoo Asia Pte. Ltd.

IDPR.JK.summary: PT Indonesia Pondasi Raya Tbk engages in piling, retaining wall, and ground improvement activities in Indonesia. The company delivers foundation construction services for various building and infrastructure projects, including housings, house of worships, hospitals, skyscrapers, roads, bridges, and underpasses. Its services also include pile testing services comprising comprehensive, tension, integrity, and lateral tests; and other foundation construction services, such as soil nailing and shotcrete, slurry wall, ground anchor, kingpost, bar coupler, dewatering, and excavation services, as well as concrete batching plant. In addition, the company manufactures precast and pre-stressed piles; and machineries and equipment for the use in piling, retaining walls, ground improvement, pile testing, and other foundation construction activities. PT Indonesia Pondasi Raya Tbk was founded in 1977 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

IDSA.SG.summary: PT Indomobil Sukses Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the integrated automotive business in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Automotive, Financial Services, Rental and Services, and Others. The company distributes vehicles and spare parts, as well as fuel; assembles vehicle; manufactures automotive parts/component; and provides after sales services, vehicle financing, car rental, used cars trading, logistics, non-formal education services, and other related supporting services, as well as acts as a trademark license holder. Its products include two-wheel and four-wheel vehicles, buses, trucks, and heavy equipment. The company offers products of Audi, Bandit, Datsun, HIAB, Hino, John Deere, Kalmar, KIA, Manitou, Nissan, Renault Trucks, SDLG, Suzuki, Volkswagen, Volvo Bus, Volvo Construction Equipment, and Volvo Trucks brands. In addition, it is involved in the rental and building management activities; operation of gas stations; mining, plantation, and forestry contracting business; industrial plantations management; and transportation and logistics businesses. Further, the company provides e-learning, manpower, and data processing services; and automotive services, such as dealership, workshop, and financing. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indomobil Sukses Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of Gallant Venture Ltd.

IFII.JK.summary: PT Indonesia Fibreboard Industry Tbk manufactures and sells wood products in Indonesia, the Middle East, Japan, Southeast Asia, Korea, China, and Taiwan. Its products include high, medium, and low density fiberboards; high moisture resistance wood products; plywood and plywood medium density fiberboard (MDF) products; MDF laminate paper; and veneer wood products. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Indonesia Fibreboard Industry Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Adrindo Intiperkasa.

IFSH.JK.summary: PT Ifishdeco Tbk engages in the exploration and development of nickel ore properties. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

IGAR.JK.summary: PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, supplies, and sells flexible packaging products in Indonesia. It offers various plastic products for the pharmaceutical, food, and cosmetic industries. The company was formerly known as PT Kageo Igar Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk in October 2010. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kingsford Holdings.

IGEX.summary: Indo Global Exchange(s) Pte, Ltd. focuses on providing financial market access to customers worldwide. Its platform provides financial market access to approximately 30 equity exchanges for trading in securities and contract for differences. The company is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

IKAI.JK.summary: PT Intikeramik Alamasri Industri Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells porcelain tiles in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Ceramic Industry and Hotel Industry. It also engages in the hospitality business. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

IKAN.JK.summary: PT Era Mandiri Cemerlang Tbk operates in the processing and trade sectors of fishery products in Indonesia and internationally. The company produces and supplies seafood products. It offers mahi-mahi, tuna, swordfish, oilfish, red snapper, grouper, and octopus products. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Era Mandiri Cemerlang Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Berkah Delapan Samudera.

IKBI.JK.summary: PT Sumi Indo Kabel Tbk manufactures and sells conductors, power and control cables, and automobile and telecommunication cables in Indonesia. The company provides bare conductor cables, fire resistance and flame retardant cables, armored and non-armored cables, and low and medium voltage cables of copper and aluminum. It also offers special products, including laminated aluminum polyethylene polyamid, low temperature, solar, bonding, and rolling stock cables; and low-voltage wires for batteries, earth bond low voltage wires, and vinyl insulated low voltage wires for automobiles, as well as steel wire amour cables for underground. The company was formerly known as PT IKI Indah Kabel Indonesia and changed its name to PT Sumi Indo Kabel Tbk in 1999. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Sumi Indo Kabel Tbk is a subsidiary of Sumitomo Electric Industries, Ltd.

IKP.F.long_name: PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk
IKP.F.summary: PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk operates in the paper packaging industry in Indonesia, Asia, North and South America, Australia, Africa, and Europe. The company offers white grade papers, brown grade papers, and carton boxes, as well as offset printing services. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Serang, Indonesia. PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Purinusa Ekapersada.

IMAS.JK.summary: PT Indomobil Sukses Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the integrated automotive business in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Automotive, Financial Services, Rental and Services, and Others. The company distributes vehicles and spare parts, as well as fuel; assembles vehicle; manufactures automotive parts/component; and provides after sales services, vehicle financing, car rental, used cars trading, logistics, non-formal education services, and other related supporting services, as well as acts as a trademark license holder. Its products include two-wheel and four-wheel vehicles, buses, trucks, and heavy equipment. The company offers products of Audi, Bandit, Datsun, HIAB, Hino, John Deere, Kalmar, KIA, Manitou, Nissan, Renault Trucks, SDLG, Suzuki, Volkswagen, Volvo Bus, Volvo Construction Equipment, and Volvo Trucks brands. In addition, it is involved in the rental and building management activities; operation of gas stations; mining, plantation, and forestry contracting business; industrial plantations management; and transportation and logistics businesses. Further, the company provides e-learning, manpower, and data processing services; and automotive services, such as dealership, workshop, and financing. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indomobil Sukses Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of Gallant Venture Ltd.

IMJS.JK.summary: PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial, and car rental and related services in Indonesia. The company offers various financing services; and vehicle rental, trucking, driver, and inspection services. It also sells fuel. The company was formerly known as PT Multi Tambang Abadi and changed its name to PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk in February 2013. PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indomobil Sukses Internasional Tbk.

IMPC.JK.summary: PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes building materials and plastic products in Indonesia and internationally. The company provides various roofing products, including polycarbonate, vinyl and vinyl composite, uPVC, and fiber reinforced polyester products; aluminum composite panels; sealants and adhesives; packaging products comprising corrugated PP sheet under the Impraboard brand name; and polymer resins, as well as rigid PVC compounds under the POLYVIC and CRYSTAL brands for use in blow molding, extrusion, and film and injection applications. It also develops and rents a business park in the Altira area. In addition, the company distributes plastic products, and adhesives materials or glue; and provides engineering, procurement, and construction services. PT Impack Pratama Industri Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INAF.JK.summary: PT Indofarma (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets pharmaceutical products in Indonesia. The company manufactures, trades in, and distributes medicine and medical devices; extracts and herbals; and operates laboratory. It also provides devices and health services for prevention, control, and treatment of COVID-19. The company also exports its products. PT Indofarma (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Indofarma (Persero) Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bio Farma.

INAI.JK.summary: PT Indal Aluminium Industry Tbk manufactures and distributes aluminium products in Indonesia. The company operates through four divisions: Aluminium Industry, Construction Services, Software Services, and General Trading and Investments. It offers architectural products, such as curtain walls, doors, windows, and aluminium composite panels; electronic and precision parts, including heat sinks and precision parts; and ladder products comprising household, tradesmen, heavy duty industrial, and level arc ladders, as well as planks. The company also provides other commodities, which include stainless steel water tanks; aluminium profiles for various parts of transportation, such as body frames and window frames of vans, trucks and other commercial vehicles; and aluminium-extruded products for office room partitions, as well as fabricates aluminium frames for showcases, picture frames, signage profiles, customized chairs, and tables, as well as aluminium solar frames and mounting systems. In addition, it offers constructing services for faÃ§ade design, supply, and installation; sells, maintains, and repairs ERP software; invests in aluminium and coating industries; and manufactures paints. The company also exports its products to Japan, Hong Kong, Thailand, Singapore, Australia, the United States, and other countries in Asia. PT Indal Aluminium Industry Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

INCF.JK.summary: PT Indo Komoditi Korpora Tbk engages rubber, dry jelutung, and maklon service businesses. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INCI.JK.summary: PT Intanwijaya Internasional Tbk manufactures and sells formaldehyde and formaldehyde resin products primarily in Indonesia. The company offers formalin, urea formaldehyde resin, melamine urea formaldehyde resin, phenol formaldehyde resin, urea formaldehyde powder, hardener, catcher, and other products primarily for plywood, block board, and particle board industries. It is also involved in real estate business. The company exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Intan Wijaya Chemical Industry and changed its name to PT Intanwijaya Internasional Tbk in June 2000. PT Intanwijaya Internasional Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

INCO.JK.summary: PT Vale Indonesia Tbk engages in the exploration and mining, processing, storage, transportation, and marketing of nickel and related mineral products in Indonesia, Canada, and Japan. It operates a concession area of 118,017 hectares located in central, south, and southeast Sulawesi. The company explores for iron ore and pellets, nickel, manganese and ferroalloys, coal, and copper deposits. It also provides railroad, port and terminal, and shipping logistics services; operates three hydroelectric plants; and transmits and distributes energy, as well as engages in steelmaking activities. The company was formerly known as PT International Nickel Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Vale Indonesia Tbk in September 2011. PT Vale Indonesia Tbk was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INDF.JK.summary: PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk produces and sells various food products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through four segments: Consumer Branded Products Business Group, Bogasari Business Group, Agribusiness Group, and Distribution Business Group. The Consumer Branded Products Business Group segment offers noodles; dairy products, including sweetened condensed, temperature, sterilized bottled, pasteurized liquid, multi-cereal, and powdered milk, as well as butter, ice cream, and creamer; snack foods, such as potato, cassava, soybean, sweet potato, and various extruded snacks, as well as biscuits; culinary products and syrups; nutrition and special foods; and ready-to-drink tea, packaged water, and fruit-flavored drinks. The Bogasari Business Group segment produces flour and pasta. The Agribusiness Group segment produces palm oil, rubber, sugar cane, timber, cocoa, and tea; and manufactures and markets cooking oils, margarines, shortenings, and other by-products. The Distribution Business Group segment distributes third-party products. It is also involved in the shipping, investment, trade export agency, industrial estate, and restaurant chain management activities; ownership and management of buildings; and provision of management consulting, flour blending and trading, and research management and technical services, as well as packaging materials and fertilizers. In addition, it manufactures coffee; extracts and processes coconut oil; operates bulking station; provides transportation services; and markets and distributes paper diapers and packaged drinking water. The company was formerly known as PT Panganjaya Intikusuma and changed its name to PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk in 1994. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk is a subsidiary of First Pacific Investment Management Limited.

INDO.JK.summary: PT Royalindo Investa Wijaya, through its subsidiaries, operates boarding facilities in Indonesia. The company operates two boarding facilities, including the PJ Mansion boarding house and Puri Cempaka 04 boarding house located in Central Jakarta. PT Royalindo Investa Wijaya was founded in 2005 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

INDO.summary: Indonesia Energy Corporation Limited, through its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration and production company in Indonesia. It holds interests in the Kruh Block, a producing block covering an area of 258 square kilometers with net crude oil proved reserves of 2.63 million barrels located to the northwest of Pendopo, Pali, and South Sumatra; and the Citarum Block, an exploration block covering an area of 3,924.67 square kilometers located onshore in West Java. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. Indonesia Energy Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Maderic Holdings Limited.

INDR.JK.summary: PT. Indo-Rama Synthetics Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells polyester, spun yarns, and fabrics in Indonesia, the rest of Asia, Europe, North America, South America, and internationally. It offers spun yarns, sewing threads, polyester filament yarns, polyester staple fiber, chips, pet resins, grey and finished polyester fabrics, nitrogen and phosphate fertilizers, polyethylene, polypropylene, polyester, textiles, cotton fiber, medical gloves, and polyester feedstocks. The company engages in trading, investment, and other activities; and management of office and school buildings. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Indo-Rama Synthetics Tbk is a subsidiary of Indorama Corporation Pte. Ltd.

INDS.JK.summary: PT Indospring Tbk manufactures and sells leaf and coil springs to the automotive industry in South East Asia. It offers parabolic, trailing, and yoko-oki leaf springs; and tension, compression, valve, and hot coil springs, as well as wire rings and stabilizer bars. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Gresik, Indonesia. PT Indospring Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indoprima Gemilang.

INDX.JK.summary: PT Tanah Laut Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides sea transport and trans loading services in Indonesia. The company also offers business management consultancy services, which includes planning and designing the development of business management in the areas of shipping, marine transport and logistics, harbor, mining, energy resources, and other consultation services. In addition, it provides ports and terminal development and services; marine transportation and logistics services; and trading services. The company was formerly known as PT IndoExchange Tbk and changed its name to PT Tanah Laut Tbk in June 2011. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tanah Laut Tbk is a subsidiary of Equatorex Sdn. Bhd.

INDY.JK.summary: PT. Indika Energy Tbk operates as an integrated energy company in Indonesia. The company operates through Energy Resources, Energy Services, Energy Infrastructure, and Other Portfolio Holdings segments. The Energy Resources segment produces coal. This segment undertakes surface coal mining at a 50,921 hectares concession in Paser Regency, East Kalimantan, Indonesia. The Energy Services segment provides mining, engineering, procurement, construction, and offshore supply base services in the coal, and oil and gas sectors; and operation, maintenance, and logistics services. The Energy Infrastructure segment operates 660 megawatt coal-fired power plant in Cirebon, West Java. It also provides sea logistics and transportation solutions for bulk materials and natural resources; and offshore supply logistics services for oil and gas companies. In addition, this segment engages in the port operations; and provision of logistics, integrated operation, management, and maintenance services. The company is also involved in the investment, general trading, marketing, financing, coal and mineral trading, contracting, development, construction, industrial, agriculture, printing, workshop, and transportation activities; and provision of consultancy services for construction, industry, and infrastructure, as well as waste management services. In addition, the company provides transportation management, business and management consultancy, gold mining, real estate and trading, shipping, warehousing, and other services. Further, it offers information and communication, professional, scientific and technical manpower, travelling agent, insurance, vehicle repair maintenance, and retail and rental and lease services, as well as digital technology services. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INKP.JK.long_name: PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk
INKP.JK.summary: PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk operates in the paper packaging industry in Indonesia, Asia, North and South America, Australia, Africa, and Europe. The company offers white grade papers, brown grade papers, and carton boxes, as well as offset printing services. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Serang, Indonesia. PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Purinusa Ekapersada.

INOV.JK.summary: PT Inocycle Technology Group Tbk engages in the production and sale of recycle polyester staple fiber in Indonesia, the United States, Japan, the Philippines, India, Saudi Arabia, Morocco, Germany, Spain, Italy, and Australia. The company provides hollow conjugated, solid, and special function fiber. It also offers homeware products, such as pillows, bolsters, mattresses, blankets, carpets, mattress protectors, and bed cover sets; and geotextile non-woven products used in various industries, such as mining, construction, agriculture, manufacturing, and infrastructure. The Company was formerly known as PT Hilon Felt. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Inocycle Technology Group Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hilon Indonesia.

INPC.JK.long_name: PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk
INPC.JK.summary: PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Productive, Consumer, Treasury, and Others. The company offers deposits; and productive, consumer, and other loans. It also provides treasury services; and e-banking services that include mobile banking, retail Internet banking, corporate Internet banking, accounting and billing system, and payroll services, as well as safe deposit boxes. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Inter-Pacific Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk in July 2005. PT Bank Artha Graha Internasional Tbk was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

INPP.JK.summary: PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk develops, owns, and operates hotels and resorts in Indonesia. The company also engages in the real estate, general trading, and development businesses, as well as in the ownership of shopping centers, office buildings, and apartments. The company was formerly known as PT Penta Karsa Lubrindo and changed its name to PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk in 2004. PT Indonesian Paradise Property Tbk was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INPS.JK.summary: PT Indah Prakasa Sentosa Tbk. engages in integrated logistics, transportation, distribution, and retail business in fuel, lubricant, chemical, gasses, and FMCG in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Agents of Fuel, Lubricant and Gas; SPPBE; and Transportation and Logistic. Its services include land transportation, warehousing, container depot, and forwarding. The company provides services for industrial and marine fuels, industrial lubricants, and industrial and retail LPG. PT Indah Prakasa Sentosa Tbk. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INRU.JK.summary: PT. Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk produces and sells pulp in Indonesia, China, Bangladesh, Thailand, and India. The company was formerly known as PT Inti Indorayon Utama Tbk and changed its name to PT. Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk in August 2001. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Medan, Indonesia. PT. Toba Pulp Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of Pinnacle Company Pte. Ltd.

INTA.JK.summary: PT Intraco Penta Tbk operates as a heavy equipment trading company in Indonesia. The company also provides mining contracting solutions, which include application and maintenance of mining equipment; and financing services for heavy equipment and other capital goods. It offers transportation and construction equipment; and provides fabrication and infrastructure support services for various sectors, including the mining, industrial, oil and gas, marine, and logistics, as well as operates a steam power plant. PT Intraco Penta Tbk was founded in 1970 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INTD.JK.summary: PT Inter Delta Tbk engages in the general trading of film equipment, micro films, chemicals for photography, and electronic equipment in Indonesia. Its products include photo printing papers, films and cameras, photo and paper processing chemicals, and others. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Inter Delta Tbk is a subsidiary of Peak Aim Development Ltd.

INTP.JK.summary: PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk manufactures and sells cement and ready mix concrete products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Cement, Ready-Mix Concrete, and Aggregates Quarries. The company offers Portland composite, ordinary Portland, Portland Pozzolan, oil well, white, and TR30 white mortar cement products under the Tiga Roda, Rajawali, and Duracem brands. It also involved in the aggregate and trass quarrying; and shipping activities, as well as provides labor supply services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk is a subsidiary of Birchwood Omnia Limited.

IPCC.JK.summary: PT Indonesia Kendaraan Terminal Tbk provides vehicle terminal services in Indonesia. The company offers car terminal services, including stevedoring, cargodoring, receiving, and delivery services, as well as repairing, painting, engine repair, accessories installation, washing, spare part management, marking and labeling, pre-delivery inspection, pre-port stock, and port to dear services. It also provides sea toll services. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indonesia Kendaraan Terminal Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pelabuhan Indonesia II.

IPCM.JK.summary: PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk provides pilotage and towage services primarily in Indonesia. It offers mooring, sea transportation, river and lake transportation, ship operation, freight, warehousing and storage, cargo handling, and fleet management services. The company also provides vessel rental and agency, vessel repair and maintenance, and refueling and clean water services. It serves public port, private terminal, inland warterway, and ship to ship offshore terminal markets. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Jasa Armada Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Pelabuhan Indonesia II.

IPOL.JK.summary: PT Indopoly Swakarsa Industry Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a flexible-packaging manufacturing company in Indonesia, China, Singapore, and the United States. It operates through three segments: Cigarette Packaging, Food Packaging, and Specialty Films. The company manufactures and sells biaxially oriented polypropylene films for cigarette and food packaging, labeling, graphic media, custom overwrap/custom purpose, and green packaging segments; and biaxially oriented polyester films for food packaging, custom overwrap/custom purpose, and graphic media film segments. It is also involved in the investment business. The company markets its products under the Ilene brand name. PT Indopoly Swakarsa Industry Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

IPTV.JK.summary: PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides program retransmission, TV advertising, direct-to-home satellite, high speed broadband, IP TV, and digital and other services in Indonesia. It also engages in content production activities; and operates Vision+, an over the top based video streaming platform. The company was formerly known as PT. Sky Vision Networs and changed its name to PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk in February 2018. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT MNC Vision Networks Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Global Mediacom Tbk.

IRRA.JK.summary: PT Itama Ranoraya Tbk distributes medical devices in Indonesia. The company offers Oneject auto disable syringe products, Abbott diagnostics products, Terumo BCT products, Ortho-clinical diagnostics, etc. It is also involved in building and office space rental business. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Itama Ranoraya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Global Dinamika Kencana.

ISAT.JK.summary: PT Indosat Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides telecommunication services in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Cellular; Fixed Telecommunications (Fixed); and Multimedia, Data Communications and Internet (MIDI). The Cellular segment offers postpaid and prepaid products that include various data and mobile voice solutions on 2G, 3G, and 4G broadband cellular networks. This segment markets its products under the IM3 Ooredoo brand. The Fixed segment provides international direct dial, international roaming, and fixed line services. The MIDI segment offers internet and data communication services, such as high-speed point-to-point international and domestic leased circuits with broadband and narrowband capacity, internet protocol-virtual private network, and multiprotocol label switching-based services. This segment also provides satellite-based services, such as transponder leasing and VSAT services, as well as various types of IT services comprising disaster recovery center and data center services, and infrastructure-as-a-service solutions. It provides services under the Indosat Ooredoo brand name. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indosat Tbk is a subsidiary of Ooredoo Asia Pte. Ltd.

ISM.F.summary: PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk produces and sells various food products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through four segments: Consumer Branded Products Business Group, Bogasari Business Group, Agribusiness Group, and Distribution Business Group. The Consumer Branded Products Business Group segment offers noodles; dairy products, including sweetened condensed, temperature, sterilized bottled, pasteurized liquid, multi-cereal, and powdered milk, as well as butter, ice cream, and creamer; snack foods, such as potato, cassava, soybean, sweet potato, and various extruded snacks, as well as biscuits; culinary products and syrups; nutrition and special foods; and ready-to-drink tea, packaged water, and fruit-flavored drinks. The Bogasari Business Group segment produces flour and pasta. The Agribusiness Group segment produces palm oil, rubber, sugar cane, timber, cocoa, and tea; and manufactures and markets cooking oils, margarines, shortenings, and other by-products. The Distribution Business Group segment distributes third-party products. It is also involved in the shipping, investment, trade export agency, industrial estate, and restaurant chain management activities; ownership and management of buildings; and provision of management consulting, flour blending and trading, and research management and technical services, as well as packaging materials and fertilizers. In addition, it manufactures coffee; extracts and processes coconut oil; operates bulking station; provides transportation services; and markets and distributes paper diapers and packaged drinking water. The company was formerly known as PT Panganjaya Intikusuma and changed its name to PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk in 1994. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk is a subsidiary of First Pacific Investment Management Limited.

ISSP.JK.long_name: PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk
ISSP.JK.summary: PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells steel pipes/tubes and other related products in Indonesia. The company operates through Steel Pipe Mill, Spiral Steel Pipe Mill, Strips and Plate, and Services and Others segments. It provides structural pipes, such as ERW steel pipes for bridge and construction projects, as well as building envelope structural applications; and SAW steel pipes for use in various structural applications, such as foundation work and on piers, bridges, and construction of project buildings. The company also offers water and oil and gas pipes; stainless steel pipes, including ornamental tubes and industrial pipes; galvanized pipes; and steel poles comprising telephone, electric, and lighting poles, as well as mechanical tubes for use in furniture materials, bus frame structures, bicycle frames, and automotive parts. PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Cakra Bhakti Para Putra.

ITIC.JK.summary: PT Indonesian Tobacco Tbk manufactures and sells cigarettes and tobacco in Indonesia. The company processes tobacco leaves into finished products in the form of self-rolled tobacco or tobacco shags. It also exports its products to Singapore, Malaysia, and Japan. The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Malang, Indonesia.

ITMA.JK.summary: PT Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk provides trading, import and export, consulting, and contract services to the mining and energy sectors. The company was formerly known as PT Itamaraya Tbk and changed its name to PT Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk in June 2010. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk is a subsidiary of Trust Energy Resources Pte. Ltd.

ITMG.JK.summary: PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining activities. The company operates seven mining concessions in the island of Kalimantan covering East, Central, and South Kalimantan. It also owns and operates the Bontang Coal Terminal/BoCT, three loading ports, and Bontang power plant. In addition, the company provides mining support, coal and fuel trading, coal transportation, and alternative energy marketing and support services, as well as engages in electricity generation activity. It primarily sells its coal in Indonesia, India, Pakistan, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Korea, Japan, Europe, Australia, and other parts of Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indo Tambangraya Megah Tbk is a subsidiary of Banpu Minerals (Singapore) Pte. Ltd.

ITP.F.summary: PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk manufactures and sells cement and ready mix concrete products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates in three segments: Cement, Ready-Mix Concrete, and Aggregates Quarries. The company offers Portland composite, ordinary Portland, Portland Pozzolan, oil well, white, and TR30 white mortar cement products under the Tiga Roda, Rajawali, and Duracem brands. It also involved in the aggregate and trass quarrying; and shipping activities, as well as provides labor supply services. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk is a subsidiary of Birchwood Omnia Limited.

IUD.SG.summary: PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, supplies, and sells flexible packaging products in Indonesia. It offers various plastic products for the pharmaceutical, food, and cosmetic industries. The company was formerly known as PT Kageo Igar Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk in October 2010. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Champion Pacific Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kingsford Holdings.

J5R.SG.short_name: J Resources Asia Pasifik Tbk Re
J5R.SG.long_name: PT J Resources Asia Pasifik Tbk
J5R.SG.summary: PT J Resources Asia Pasifik Tbk operates in gold mining sector primarily in Indonesia. The company is involved in the mining and sale of gold and silver. It also provides general trading services. The company was formerly known as PT Pelita Sejahtera Abadi and changed its name to PT J Resources Asia Pasifik Tbk in January 2012. PT J Resources Asia Pasifik Tbk was founded in 2002 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

J7K.F.long_name: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk
J7K.F.summary: PT Citra Marga Nusaphala Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, constructs and operates toll roads in Indonesia. It engages in implementing and providing consultancy services in the field of management, investment, information technology and telecommunications, transportation, project development, property management, and real estate; as well as sells product components of highway construction. The company operates the Simpang Susun Waru - Juanda toll road in Surabaya; Depok - Antasari toll road in Jakarta; Soreang - Pasir Koja toll road; Cileunyi - Sumedang - Dawuan Toll Road, and Sumedang Dawuan toll road. It also provides trading, development, procurement, contract, industry, land management, and other services. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

JAK1.MU.long_name: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk
JAK1.MU.summary: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property businesses in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Hotel, Real Estate, Telecommunication Services, and Hotel Management Services. The Hotel segment owns and operates two hotels under the Hotel Borobudur Jakarta and Ritz-Carlton Pacific Place names. The Real Estate segment engages in the real estate development business and services, including the construction of office buildings, shopping malls, and trade centers, as well as their supporting facilities; leasing of office buildings and rooms, and shopping mall complex units, as well as their supporting facilities; provision of infrastructures and facilities for integrated commercial centers construction, commercialization, and development; and provision of general services with the exception of legal and financial services. The Telecommunication Services segment offers telecommunication service management, closed fixed network, Internet service provider and its feature, and data center and managed services. The Hotel Management Services segment manages and operates Hotel Borobudur Jakarta, Discovery Kartika Plaza Hotel, Discovery Hotel & Convention Ancol, and Palace Hotel Cipanas. The company also engages in the tourism and related activities; and apartment development and trading businesses. PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

JAST.JK.summary: PT. Jasnita Telekomindo Tbk provides telecommunications, communications, and networking services in Indonesia. The company offers digital contact center and managed ICT services to banking and financial institutions; voice and communication API services; and smart city and 112 emergency hotline services to the government. It also provides BlazeID, an Internet service; Jascloud that offers telecommunications and IP based solutions; Jasconnect, a call center; and Jasgrid, an IT as a service. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Jasnita Telekomindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Persada Inti Sejahtera.

JAWA.JK.summary: PT Jaya Agra Wattie Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the cultivation, processing, logistics, and marketing of agricultural products in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Rubber, Palm Oil, and Others. It produces and sells rubber, coffee, tea, cocoa, palm oil, and other agricultural products. The company was formerly known as Handel Maatschappij J.A. Wattie and Company Limited and changed its name to PT Jaya Agra Wattie Tbk in 1987. PT Jaya Agra Wattie Tbk was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Jaya Agra Wattie Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sarana Agro Investama.

JAYA.JK.summary: PT Armada Berjaya Trans Tbk engages in the transportation business in Indonesia. It offers land transportation services, such as loose cargo and container transportation; and export and import customs clearance for cargoes. The company also provides multi-modal transport services, including freight forwarding and load consolidation, as well as storage and warehousing services. It operates a fleet of 135 vehicles. The company was formerly known as PT Armada Beton. PT Armada Berjaya Trans Tbk was founded in 2012 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

JECC.JK.summary: PT Jembo Cable Company Tbk manufactures and sells various wires and cables in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through Power Cable, Telephone Cable, and Others segments. The company offers low and medium voltage copper and aluminum, fire resistant, fiber optic, telecommunication, lead sheathed, instrumentation, airfield, marine, overhead, and metal corrugated armored cables. It also operates an electrical power plant; and manufactures, assembles, supplies, installs, and sells solar panels and light emitting diodes. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Jembo Cable Company Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Monaspermata Persada.

JIHD.JK.long_name: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk
JIHD.JK.summary: PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property businesses in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Hotel, Real Estate, Telecommunication Services, and Hotel Management Services. The Hotel segment owns and operates two hotels under the Hotel Borobudur Jakarta and Ritz-Carlton Pacific Place names. The Real Estate segment engages in the real estate development business and services, including the construction of office buildings, shopping malls, and trade centers, as well as their supporting facilities; leasing of office buildings and rooms, and shopping mall complex units, as well as their supporting facilities; provision of infrastructures and facilities for integrated commercial centers construction, commercialization, and development; and provision of general services with the exception of legal and financial services. The Telecommunication Services segment offers telecommunication service management, closed fixed network, Internet service provider and its feature, and data center and managed services. The Hotel Management Services segment manages and operates Hotel Borobudur Jakarta, Discovery Kartika Plaza Hotel, Discovery Hotel & Convention Ancol, and Palace Hotel Cipanas. The company also engages in the tourism and related activities; and apartment development and trading businesses. PT Jakarta International Hotels & Development Tbk was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

JKON.JK.long_name: PT Jaya Konstruksi Manggala Pratama Tbk
JKON.JK.summary: PT Jaya Konstruksi Manggala Pratama Tbk engages in the construction business in Indonesia. The company is also involved in precast concrete manufacturing, trading, mechanical electrical, contractor, gas and asphalt dealer, station LPG and bulk transportation, asphalt trading, mining, and vehicle chartering activities. In addition, it owns or leases real estate properties; and trades in materials and chemical goods. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Jaya Konstruksi Manggala Pratama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pembangunan Jaya Ancol Tbk.

JMAS.JK.long_name: PT Asuransi Jiwa Syariah Jasa Mitra Abadi Tbk
JMAS.JK.summary: PT Asuransi Jiwa Syariah Jasa Mitra Abadi Tbk operates as a sharia life insurance company in Indonesia. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

JPFA.JK.summary: PT Japfa Comfeed Indonesia Tbk operates as an agri-food company. The company operates through seven segments: Animal Feed, Poultry Breeding, Commercial Farm, Poultry Processing and Consumer Products, Aquaculture, Beef, and Trading and Others. It provides poultry feed, day old chick broilers/layers and pullets, commercial live broiler birds, and processed chicken products; and feed for fresh, brackish, and marine water fishes and shrimps. The company also operates cold storage and processing plants, as well as fish farming, and shrimp farming and hatcheries. In addition, it engages in commercial farming, and beef processing and cattle slaughtering activities. Further, it provides woven plastic bags, copra pelletizing, animal vaccines, veterinary medicines and vitamins, and livestock equipment, as well as operates retail meat store. Additionally, it is involved in the real estate, plantation, general trading, marine transportation, and investment activities. The company markets its products in Indonesia, Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Japfa Comfeed Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Japfa Ltd.

JRPT.JK.summary: PT Jaya Real Property, Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, develops residential areas and manages commercial properties in Indonesia. It operates through Sale of Land and Buildings, and Rental and Other Services segments. The Sale of Land and Buildings segment engages in the real estate and urban development activities; and release/purchase, processing, maturation, and development of facilities and infrastructure. The Rental and Other Services segment is involved in leasing of shopping centers and areas of the city, and the water management business. It also provides general trading and construction, building management, and transportation services, as well as operates hotels. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Jaya Real Property, Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Pembangunan Jaya.

JSKY.JK.summary: PT Sky Energy Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells solar modules for homes, and commercial and government sectors worldwide. The company offers polycrystalline, monocrystalline, and flexible solar panels, as well as portable solar kits and accessories; light-emitting diode bulbs, lamps, and lights; solar mounting systems; solar inverters and monitoring solutions; and energy storage solutions. It is also involved in the technical design, installation, and maintenance of solar power plants. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Bogor, Indonesia.

JSMR.JK.summary: PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk develops, constructs, operates, manages, and maintains toll roads in Indonesia. The company also offers toll road service, such as transaction services, traffic services, and road construction services. It operates 11 toll roads. PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

JSPT.JK.summary: PT Jakarta Setiabudi Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospitality and property businesses in Indonesia. It operates through Hotel, Real Estate, Rental of Office Space, and Rental of Retail Center segments. It offers hotel guestroom and restaurant services; sells land and/or buildings, and apartment units; and rents office space and retail centers. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Jakarta Setiabudi Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Jan Darmadi Investindo.
