JTPE.JK.summary: PT Jasuindo Tiga Perkasa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the printing industry in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Security Products and Non-Security Products. The company offers payment products, including checks, bank cards, and other payment products; brand protection products comprising stamp duty and labels; commercial printing products, such as promo plus, game plus, pin mailers, reel printing, insurance policy, bills, and delivery orders; and identity documents consisting of passports, identity cards, and certificate/diploma documents. It also provides information technology solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.

KAEF.JK.summary: PT Kimia Farma (Persero) Tbk produces and sells medicines, herbal medicines, iodine, salts, quinine and their derivative products, and vegetable oils in Indonesia, rest of Asia, Europe, Australia, Africa, and New Zealand. The company operates through Manufacturing, Distribution, Retail, and Other Services segments. It also manufactures and markets chemical, betalactam and non betalactam, antiretroviral, narcotic, hormone contraceptive, powder, oil castor, edible oil, cosmetic, over the counter, personal, and beauty care products, as well as food supplements, active pharmaceutical ingredients, and medical devices. In addition, the company manufactures, markets, distributes, and trades in pharmaceutical products; and operates drug materials plants. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 1,278 retail pharmacy outlets, 451 health clinic outlets, 75 clinical laboratories, 10 optics, 3 beauty clinics, and 24 international retail outlets. The company sells its products to pharmacies, drug stores, hospitals, and free traders through pharmaceutical wholesalers. The company was founded in 1817 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KALG.summary: KAL Energy, Inc. engages in the exploration, extraction, and distribution of coal. It holds interests in two coal concessions situated near the Mahakam River in north eastern Kalimantan, Indonesia. The company was formerly known as Patriarch, Inc. and changed its name to KAL Energy, Inc. in November 2006. KAL Energy, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KARW.JK.summary: PT ICTSI Jasa Prima Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, construction, and operation of maritime logistics infrastructure facilities and related services in Indonesia. The company offers services on maintenance, upkeep, operation, and utilization of maritime facilities and infrastructure, including concession of berths and terminals, and container yards; and upkeep, maintenance and repair, and operation of technical, mechanical, and electronic equipment/aids, as well as machinery and special scales. It also provides computer software and hardware related to facilities and infrastructure of maritime logistics; and stevedoring services. In addition, the company engages in the facilities and infrastructures development for maritime logistics; trading of various goods related to maritime logistics facilities and infrastructure; and freight forwarding and warehousing, and marine and water transportation of goods. Further, it is involved in the workshop, installation and sales, and supply or rental of heavy equipment/light appliance and spare parts related to maritime logistics facilities and infrastructures. Additionally, the company offers management, business, and administration consulting related to maritime logistics facilities and infrastructures; and supply and services related to terminal and other maritime logistic facility management, dredging service of port, quay basin, channel, or supply and management of other maritime logistic infrastructure and facilities, as well as strait and shipping passage and other related supporting service. It is also involved in the development, trading, industrial, agribusiness, land transportation, repair shop, and other activities. The company was formerly known as PT Maharlika Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT ICTSI Jasa Prima Tbk in August 2012. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is based in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT ICTSI Jasa Prima Tbk is a subsidiary of ICTSI Far East Pte. Ltd.

KAYU.JK.summary: PT Darmi Bersaudara Tbk primarily engages in the trading of processed wood products in Indonesia. It offers raw wood, as well as various types of processed wood, such as Merbau, Bengkirai, Kampoor, Keruing, and Meranti for use in decking, E2E, T&G, flooring, door jamb, post beam, finger joint, and window jamb applications. The company also exports its products to China, Nepal, India, Australia, and Europe. PT Darmi Bersaudara Tbk was founded in 1998 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

KBAG.JK.summary: PT Karya Bersama Anugerah Tbk engages in the real estate development business. It constructs Rusunami dwellings, landed houses, and shop-houses. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Balikpapan, Indonesia. PT Karya Bersama Anugerah Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Visi Kota Indonesia.

KBLI.JK.long_name: PT KMI Wire and Cable Tbk
KBLI.JK.summary: PT KMI Wire and Cable Tbk manufactures and sells various power cables in Indonesia. The company offers aluminum, copper, and ground bare conductors; low voltage power cables comprising aluminum, copper, control, flexible, and instrument cables; medium voltage power cables consisting of aluminum and copper cables; high voltage power cables; outdoor and indoor telecom cables; special purpose cables, including fire resistant, flame retardant, lead and nylon sheathed, and thermocouple cables; and aluminum and copper rods, and rod products. It supplies power cables to the state owned electricity company; and cables to private and industrial sectors comprising oil and gas, mining, industrial, and other sectors. The company sells its products directly, as well as through a chain of distributors and resellers. It also exports its products internationally. PT KMI Wire and Cable Tbk was founded in 1972 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KBLM.JK.summary: PT Kabelindo Murni Tbk manufactures cables and other related products for telecommunication industries and for the distribution of electricity in Indonesia. It offers bare conductors and twisted cables; low voltage power cables, such as building, control, and instrument cables; medium voltage power cables; and flexible cables. The company also provides special cables for industrial installation, such as power stations, oil and petrochemical plants, high-rise buildings, mass transit underground passenger systems, and control connection networks. In addition, it provides construction services. The company was formerly known as PT Kabel Indonesia and changed its name to PT Kabelindo Murni Tbk in 1979. PT Kabelindo Murni Tbk was founded in 1972 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KBLV.JK.summary: PT First Media Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the technology, media, and telecommunication businesses in Indonesia. The company provides internet services provider; internet interconnection services; telecommunication infrastructure and in-building solutions; subscription television through satellite; and news content, as well as operates as a production house for advertisement and television content. It also offers film and video recording, calling card, and e-commerce services, as well as engages in the trading business; publishes newspapers; and provides radio broadcasting services. The company was formerly known as PT Broadband Multimedia Tbk and changed its name to PT First Media Tbk in 2007. PT First Media Tbk was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KDSI.JK.summary: PT Kedawung Setia Industrial Tbk, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and sells enamel products in Indonesia. The company offers enamel houseware, corrugated carton boxes, and egg tray boxes. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Kedawung Setia Industrial Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kitasubur Utama.

KEBA.F.summary: Kencana Agri Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a plantation company in Indonesia, Malaysia, and internationally. It engages in the cultivation of oil palms; processing of fresh fruit bunches into crude palm oil (CPO), crude palm kernel oil, and palm kernel cake; and provision of bulking, and logistics services. It has oil palm plantations in Sumatra, Kalimantan, and Sulawesi regions of Indonesia. The company is also involved in the wholesale of electricity-related products and plantation-related products; provision of support storage facilities; and transportation of palm oil products. It markets and sells its products to trading companies, refineries, and oleochemical companies. As of December 31, 2019, the company had a total land bank of 115,737 hectares. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Kencana Agri Limited is a subsidiary of Kencana Holdings Pte. Ltd.

KEEN.JK.summary: PT. Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable energy company in Indonesia. It owns and operates 3x6 MW hydroelectric power plant in Pakkat, North Sumatera; 3x7 MW hydroelectric power plant in Air Putih, Bengkulu; and 2x5 MW hydroelectric power plant in Madong, South Sulawesi. The company serves industries and homes. PT. Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

KEJU.JK.summary: PT Mulia Boga Raya Tbk manufactures and sells cheese and mayonnaise for salad dressing under the Prochiz brand name in Indonesia. The company offers block and sliced cheese, and other products. It sells its products through its own marketing force and third-party distributors. The company also exports its products. PT Mulia Boga Raya Tbk was founded in 2006 and is based in Bekasi, Indonesia. As of October 14, 2020, PT Mulia Boga Raya Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk.

KIAS.JK.summary: PT Keramika Indonesia Assosiasi Tbk produces and sells various ceramic wall, roof, granite, and floor tiles in Indonesia, Asia, Europe, and the United States. It provides its products under the KIA, IMPRESSO, and SPECTRA brands. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Keramika Indonesia Assosiasi Tbk is a subsidiary of SCG Building Materials Co., Ltd.

KICI.JK.summary: PT Kedaung Indah Can Tbk manufactures and sells enamel-on-steel cookware and can/tin products in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Enamelware and Can. It offers various stock pots, steamer cooker sets, ovens, deep stock pot gradations, pasta cooker sets, deep stock pots, and stock pots with steamer; roasters comprising lasagna pans, oval roasters, and fry pans; cookware sets; and storage bowls, such as soup bowls, salad bowls, mixing bowl sets, deep bowl sets, basins, serving bowls, preparation bowl sets, and fancy bowl sets. The company also provides tableware products, including plates and colanders; tea kettles; and lunch carriers, trays, canister sets, cookie tins, kerosene stoves, mugs, and milk pans. In addition, the company provides metal printing services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

KIJA.JK.summary: PT Kawasan Industri Jababeka Tbk engages in the real estate development activities in Indonesia and the Netherlands. It operates through five segments: Real Estate, Golf, Service and Maintenance, Power Plant, and Tourism. The Real Estate segment develops and sells industrial estates, and related facilities and services, including residential estates, apartments, office buildings, and shopping centers; and develops and installs water treatment plant, waste water treatment, telephone, electricity, and other facilities to support the industrial estates, such as sports and recreational facilities. It also exports and imports goods for businesses related to the development and management of the industrial estates. The Golf segment develops and manages golf course, club house, recreation, and sports facilities, as well as supporting facilities. The Service and Maintenance segment engages in the development and infrastructure management of industrial estates, hotels, and residential estates; and development and management of public infrastructure. The Power Plant segment develops and manages power plants; supplies and distributes energy; and provides energy management services to third parties. The Tourism segment is involved in the tourism object, tourism hotel, tourism estate, and education and tourism training center activities. The company also generates and distributes electricity; and provides residential condominium, financing, general trading, transportation, building management, real estate construction, and other services. PT Kawasan Industri Jababeka Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia.

KINO.JK.summary: PT Kino Indonesia Tbk manufactures and markets personal care products, beverages, foods, and pharmaceutical products in Indonesia and internationally. The company offers various personal care products, including haircare products under the Ellips, Sasha, and Samantha; skin care products under the Ovale brand; fragrances under the Eskulin brand; feminine hygiene products under the Resik V and Absolute brand names; kids personal care products under the B&B Kids, Eskulin Kids, and Master Kids brands; baby care products under the Sleek Baby brand; men's grooming products under the Master brand; toiletries under Sasha brand; air freshener under the Evergreen brand; beauty product under the Ristra and trustee brand name; and decorative under the Abstract brand. It also provides various beverages, such as remedy drinks under the Cap Kaki Tiga and Sejuk Segar brand; herbal drinks under the Cap Panda brand name; energy drinks under the Panther brand; and juice under the Malee brand name. In addition, the company offers food and confectionary products comprising candies under the Kino Candy and Chew Chew Ball brand names; snacks under the Snack It brand; and powdered drink under the Segar Sari brand. Further, it provides pharmaceutical products, such as balm, headache medicine, and honey cough syrup under the Cap Kaki Tiga brand; and herbal products under the Dua Putri Dewi brand, as well as pet products ProBalance brand. The company was formerly known as PT Kinocare Era Kosmetindo. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Kino Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kino Investindo.

KIOS.JK.summary: PT Kioson Komersial Indonesia Tbk, a technology company, provides telecommunications infrastructure services in Indonesia. It offers payment counters, credit sales, data packages, and sales of insurance products and financial services. The company engages in the trading, development, industrial printing, transportation, workshop, and agriculture business; and trade of telecommunications equipment, computers and spare parts, and mobile phone topup vouchers, as well as acts as distributor, agent, and as representative of agencies or engineering companies. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

KJEN.JK.summary: PT Krida Jaringan Nusantara Tbk provides courier services to banking, telecommunications, package shipment, and other sectors in Indonesia and internationally. It offers freight forwarding; collection, processing, transportation, and delivery services. The company also engages in the goods collection, courier agency, and warehousing and storage businesses; and sending of goods through rail, land, sea, and air transportation, as well as packaging of goods. In addition, it provides cargo consolidation, cargo space, and customs management. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Krida Jaringan Nusantara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Grafindo Karya Nusantara.

KKGI.JK.summary: PT Resource Alam Indonesia Tbk engages in coal and methane mining in Indonesia. It also manufactures and sells high pressure laminate and melamine laminated particle boards; and provides harbor management and electricity supply services. In addition, the company engages in hydropower plant industry, real estate, and trading activities. The company was formerly known as PT Kurnia Kapuas Utama Tbk and changed its name to PT Resource Alam Indonesia Tbk in November 2003. PT Resource Alam Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

KLBF.JK.summary: PT Kalbe Farma Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and trades in pharmaceutical products in Indonesia. It operates in four divisions: Prescription Pharmaceuticals, Consumer Health, Nutritionals, and Distribution and Logistic. The company offers generic, branded, and licensed drugs, including Brainact, Cefspan, Mycoral, Cernevit, Cravit, Neuralgin, Broadced, Neurotam, Hemapo, and CPG that are distributed to hospitals, pharmacies, and drug stores. It also provides over-the-counter drugs; energy drinks, ready-to-drink products, supplements, and other preventive products; and nutritional products for infants, toddlers, children, pre-teenagers, adults, pregnant and lactating women, and elders, as well as for consumers with special medical needs. In addition, the company operates Mitrasana Clinics, a health care service; contract services, including clinical study management, bioavailability/bioequivalence studies, and contract analysis to pharmaceutical companies; and animal health products. Further, it offers health screening services; operates as an agent and representative for biotechnology products; distributes consumer products, medical equipment, cosmetics, and other trading products; and trades in medical and laboratory equipment and supplies, raw materials for pharmaceutical products, and consumable products for hemodialysis therapy, as well as provides advertising services. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Kalbe Farma Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Gira Sole Prima.

KM6.F.summary: PT Adhi Karya (Persero) Tbk primarily engages in the construction business in Indonesia. The company undertakes various projects, such as buildings, roads, bridges, water works, airports, seaports, and landmarks. It also involved in the engineering, procurement, and construction activities; development of high rise buildings, such as apartments, hotels, condotels, and office towers; real estate activities; and infrastructure investment business. In addition, the company engages in general trading; information technology; goods procurement; precast concrete; and hotel service businesses, as well as implements railway infrastructure. The company was formerly known as PN Adhi Karya and changed its name to PT Adhi Karya (Persero) Tbk in 1974. PT Adhi Karya (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KMDS.JK.summary: PT Kurniamitra Duta Sentosa, Tbk operates as a food and beverage industry in Indonesia. It imports and sells syrups, fruit mixes, frappe products, and gourmet sauces; coffee products; almond milk, soy milk, coconut milk, dairy milk, and free lactose milk products; and coffee makers. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia.

KMTR.JK.summary: PT Kirana Megatara Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces crumb rubber in Indonesia. The company produces SIR 10, SIR 20, and SIR 20 CV type crumb rubber. Its SIR products are exported to tire manufacturers worldwide. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Kirana Megatara Tbk operates as a subsidiary of HSF (S) Pte. Ltd.

KOBX.JK.summary: PT Kobexindo Tractors Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the distribution and servicing of heavy equipment in Indonesia. It offers excavators, articulated dump trucks, wheel loaders, and hydraulic breakers; diesel-powered forklifts; rigid dump trucks; heavy duty trucks; fork lift trucks; farm tractors; compact forklifts; and spare parts. The company also provides maintenance and rental services for heavy equipment; and engages in the rental of office building. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Kobexindo Tractors Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kobexindo Investama.

KOIN.JK.summary: PT Kokoh Inti Arebama, Tbk trades in building materials. It distributes ceramic products, roof tiles, granites, sanitary ware, paints, gypsum, leak-proof coatings, and instant cement. The company offers products under the KIA, Impresso, and Laurenza brand names. Its marketing and distribution network comprises 19 branches in various cities in Indonesia, including Medan, Pekan Baru, Jambi, Palembang, Bandar Lampung, Jakarta, Bekasi, Bogor, Tangerang, Bandung, Cirebon, Yogyakarta, Semarang, Surabaya, Malang, Denpasar, Banjarmasin, Samarinda, and Makassar. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Kokoh Inti Arebama, Tbk is a subsidiary of SCG Distribution Company Limited.

KONI.JK.summary: PT Perdana Bangun Pusaka Tbk sells and distributes photographic products. The company's photographic products include photographic paper, chemical supplies, films, vinyl/flex banners, frames, and other finished goods, as well as color papers, inkjet papers, dye sub printers, photo printers, minilabs, and DNP media printers. It also provides auto processors, cassettes, grids, hangers, screens, chemical products, X-ray films, and USG papers for conventional medical uses; and CR and DR systems, digital media products, LED viewers, and scanners for medical digital imaging uses, as well as hard disk drives. In addition, the company leases office spaces. It operates through retail stores or representative offices that are located in 15 geographic areas in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Konica Cemerlang and changed its name to PT Perdana Bangun Pusaka Tbk in April 1988. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Perdana Bangun Pusaka Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dasabina Adityasarana.

KOPI.JK.summary: PT Mitra Energi Persada Tbk engages in the gas trading and distribution business in Indonesia. The company trades in and distributes gas through a network of downstream pipelines in South Sumatra region. It is also involved in the power plant, coal mining, and other related businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Korpora Persada Investama, Tbk and changed its name to PT Mitra Energi Persada Tbk in January 2008. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Mitra Energi Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mulya Tara Mandiri.

KOTA.JK.summary: PT DMS Propertindo Tbk PT operates as a property development and hospitality management company in Indonesia. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

KPAL.JK.summary: PT Steadfast Marine Tbk designs and manufactures ships in Indonesia. The company offers anchor handling tugs, crew boats, tug boats, diving support vessels, dredgers, motor cepats, landing craft tanks, and propelled oil barges. It serves harbor and terminal, offshore oil and gas, public transport, and defense and security markets. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

KPAS.JK.summary: PT Cottonindo Ariesta Tbk manufactures and sells cotton products in Indonesia. The company offers facial cotton pads and cotton buds; cosmetic and medical cotton products, including cotton rolls, dental cotton, mini cotton balls, and cotton ball in various sizes; and industrial cotton products comprising cotton sliver, spunlace cotton pads, bleached cotton, and cotton rolls. It also provides cotton bud manufacturing machines. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Subang, Indonesia.

KPAY.summary: KinerjaPay Corp. operates an e-commerce platform in Indonesia. The company's platform, KinerjaPay IP, an e-wallet service for bill transfers and online shopping; and allows top-up phone credit for users. It also provides KMALL, a virtual marketplace for B2B and B2C online transactions; and KGAMES that develops games. The company was formerly known as Solarflex Corp and changed its name to KinerjaPay Corp on February 2016. KinerjaPay Corp. was founded in 2010 and is based in Medan, Indonesia.

KPIG.JK.summary: PT MNC Land Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, rents office spaces and provides securities and other property services in Indonesia. The company also develops and operates real estate properties, such as hotels and resorts, golf courses, conventions, and theme parks. In addition, it offers property services, including building security, housekeeping, technical, and property management services; and manpower supply services. Further, PT MNC Land Tbk engages in the food and beverage business, and investment activities. The company was formerly known as PT Global Land Development Tbk and changed its name to PT MNC Land Tbk in 2012. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT MNC Land Tbk is a subsidiary of PT MNC Investama Tbk.

KRAS.JK.summary: PT Krakatau Steel (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and trading of iron and steel products in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through five segments: Steel Products, Real Estate and Hotels, Engineering and Construction, Port Services Provider, and Other Services. The Steel Products segment is primarily involved in production and sale of steel products, such as sponge iron, slabs, billets, hot rolled coils, cold rolled coils, and wire rods; and steel pipes, reinforcing bars, and steel wires, as well as services related to steel, including coating and tolling services. The Real Estate and Hotels segment develops and sells industrial estates with the infrastructure, and hotels and sport facilities. The Engineering and Construction segment is involved in the construction, industrial engineering, planning, and contracting of various types of buildings; export and import of goods; and provision of services and software related to the aforementioned activities. The Port Services Provider segment offers pier services for berthing, loading, and unloading goods and containers; and sea port support, warehousing, and transportation services. The Other Services segment provides information technology, medical, electricity, and water distribution services for industrial and residence needs. It also engages in the production of reinforcing bars, and deformed and plain bars; and coal and mining business. PT Krakatau Steel (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Cilegon, Indonesia.

KREN.JK.summary: PT Kresna Graha Investama Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in financial and investment, and technology and digital sectors in Indonesia. The company's Financial and Investment segment offers mutual funds and fixed income; and financial advisory, asset management, brokerage, investment management, and securities underwriting services, as well as operates stock trading platform. Its Technology and Digital segment provides integrated digital products and services comprising financial technology, digital retail and marketing, artificial intelligence, and enterprise solutions, as well as media, and entertainment and lifestyle. The company also engages in the development of human resources platform; trading, online media, and outsourcing activities; digital cloud advertising business; sale of electric vouchers; and provision of communication-platform-as-a-service. The company was formerly known as PT Kresna Graha Sekurindo and changed its name to PT Kresna Graha Investama Tbk in July 2015. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Kresna Graha Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kresna Prima Invest.

LAND.JK.summary: PT Trimitra Propertindo Tbk, a property investment and development company, develops residential and commercial projects in Indonesia. The company engages in the construction of buildings, bridges, roads, installations, pipelines, residential areas, housing apartments, and hotel infrastructure. It also acts as a general contractor; and provides property trading and agency services. In addition, the company offers consulting services in the field of architecture, landscape, design and interior, and civil construction, as well as building and apartment engineering and maintenance services. Further, it operates three stars hotel. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in South Tangerang, Indonesia.

LCKM.JK.summary: PT LCK Global Kedaton Tbk operates in the telecommunication and engineering industries in Indonesia. The company undertakes site investigation survey, base transceiver station construction, mechanical and electrical installation, telecommunication network installation, electric supply connection, and commission tower installation works. It also procures and trades in telecommunication equipment, heavy equipment, and vehicles. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT LCK Global Kedaton Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Lck Investama Prima Indonesia.

LCW.SG.summary: PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate and industrial estate projects in Indonesia. The company operates through Real Estate and Support Services segments. It is also involved in the provision of supporting services, including estate management, public transport, and recreation services. In addition, the company engages in construction, purchase, sale, lease, and operation of exhibition spaces, storage facilities, private buildings, malls, shopping centers, hospitals, conference halls, houses of worship, hotels, sports centers, golf courses, clubs, restaurants, entertainment venues, medical, laboratories, pharmacies, office buildings, and parking lots. Further, it offers clean and waste water management services; trading, development, and other services; and transportation, waste management, and recycling services. Additionally, the company is involved in the professional, scientific, and technical activities; and remediation, manpower and business support, and other business activities. PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kemuning Satiatama.

LEAD.JK.summary: PT Logindo Samudramakmur Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated maritime services to support upstream oil and gas industries in Indonesia. It provides offshore support vessel services, including anchor handling tugs and anchor handling supply vessels, platform supply vessels, diving support and utility vessels, crew boats, patrol boats, landing craft tanks, tug boats, barges, and accommodation work barges. The company operates a fleet of 45 vessels. PT Logindo Samudramakmur Tbk. was founded in 1995 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

LF9.F.summary: PT SLJ Global Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the timber manufacturing, power, and logging businesses in the United States, Indonesia, East Asia, Europe, Australia, and Southeast Asia. It operates through Timber manufacturing, and power plant and logging segments. It manages six natural forest concessions of 770,455 hectares. The company also engages in the industrial plywood and medium density fibre board, as well as mining businesses. In addition, it operates a power plant with a total capacity of 22.5 megawatts. The company was formerly known as PT Sumalindo Lestari Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT SLJ Global Tbk in December 2012. PT SLJ Global Tbk was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

LF9.MU.summary: PT SLJ Global Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the timber manufacturing, power, and logging businesses in the United States, Indonesia, East Asia, Europe, Australia, and Southeast Asia. It operates through Timber manufacturing, and power plant and logging segments. It manages six natural forest concessions of 770,455 hectares. The company also engages in the industrial plywood and medium density fibre board, as well as mining businesses. In addition, it operates a power plant with a total capacity of 22.5 megawatts. The company was formerly known as PT Sumalindo Lestari Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT SLJ Global Tbk in December 2012. PT SLJ Global Tbk was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

LFLO.JK.summary: PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk operates furniture, fixtures, and equipment showrooms in Indonesia, South East Asia, and the Asia Pacific. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

LFU2.F.summary: PT Bakrie & Brothers Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in general trading, construction, agriculture, coal mining, telecommunication, and oil and gas businesses in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Infrastructure and Manufacturing; and Trading, Services, and Investment. It offers automotive components for vehicles and heavy duty equipment; building materials, such as fiber cement roofing, ceiling, conduit pipes for general use; steel pipes for use in oil and gas, and general purposes; and fabrication services. The company also engages in the trading, distribution, and construction of building products, including gypsum, roofing, and autoclaved aerated concrete products, as well as electrical lightings and prefab bathrooms; the development of infrastructure assets; and steel construction, investment, laboratory, oil and gas trading, management consultation, and energy and electrical power businesses. In addition, it provides non-organic fertilizers and industries-organic chlor chemicals; and trades in ammonium nitrate and olein. Further, the company offers information technology, telecommunication, integration system, and multimedia and network services. PT Bakrie & Brothers Tbk was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

LIFE.JK.long_name: PT Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas MSIG Tbk
LIFE.JK.summary: PT Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas MSIG Tbk provides life insurance products in Indonesia. It offers multi invest, personal accident, medical, hospital protection, and kid insurance; unit link insurance; and Sharia insurance. The company also provides bancassurance products; group insurance products; and online insurance services. It serves individual and group customers through 46 service and marketing offices. The company was formerly known as PT Asuransi Jiwa Eka Life and changed its name to PT Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas MSIG in 2007. PT Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas MSIG Tbk was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asuransi Jiwa Sinarmas MSIG Tbk is a subsidiary Mitsui Sumitomo Insurance Co., Ltd.

LINK.JK.summary: PT Link Net Tbk distributes television programs and high-speed Internet through its broadband communication network in Indonesia. The company offers Internet broadband services under the FastNet brand name; interactive Pay TV services under the HomeCable brand, which include educational programs, entertainment, news, music, lifestyle, box office, sports, kids, and house channels; and B2B corporate solutions and data services, data transfer, disaster recovery, storage area network, peering, inter-branch connection, and video streaming services under the DataComm brand. It also provides FirstMediaX, a TV anywhere over-the-top application; and communication system, network access point, telephony value added, trading, management consultancy, call center, and other multimedia services. It serves customers in the Jakarta, Bogor, Tangerang, Bekasi, Surabaya, Bali, Bandung, Medan, Batam, Solo, Semarang, Serang, and Cilegon areas of Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Seruling Indah Permai and changed its name to PT Link Net Tbk in March 2000. PT Link Net Tbk was founded in 1996 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

LION.JK.summary: PT Lion Metal Works Tbk manufactures and sells office equipment and steel fabricated products in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Office Equipment, Building Material, and Other segments. It offers office equipment and file storage equipment systems, such as filing cabinets, horizontal file cabinet, modular units, office desks, mobile files, office chairs, lockers, cupboard, office panels, workstations, and other office equipment; and safe and security equipment, including safes, fireproof safes, hotel bedroom safes, and safe deposit boxes. The company also provides warehouse equipment comprising utility racks, archive shelving racks, multitier racks, pallet racks, drive-in racks, and shuttle racks; building and construction materials consisting of cable support systems, steel doors, fire proof doors, and steel roof structures for buildings; C-channel and related products; and hospital equipment. It sells its products through distributors, dealers, and suppliers, as well as through online store. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

LMAS.JK.summary: PT Limas Indonesia Makmur Tbk provides stock information and news services, and value added telephone services primarily in Indonesia. It is also involved in the trading of hardware and software; and provision of supporting facility and information technology consultancy services. The company was formerly known as PT Limas Centric Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Limas Indonesia Makmur Tbk in August 2014. PT Limas Indonesia Makmur Tbk was founded in 1996 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

LMPI.JK.summary: PT Langgeng Makmur Industri Tbk manufactures and sells aluminum cookware, plastic houseware and others, and PVC pipes, fittings, and profiles in Indonesia. It offers plastic houseware products, such as bathroom, basket, children item, food container, household, industrial, kitchenware, storage, tableware, and other products under the Global Eagle brand name. The company also provides nonstick cookware and bakeware products, including diamante, smeraldo classic and nobel, rubina, zaffiro, and drago series products; aluminum kitchenware products comprising aldize, kettle, magic roaster, pot, rice boiler and cooker, rice container, food carrier, and other products under the Global Eagle brand name; and plastic woven bags. It exports its products to Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and Europe. The company was formerly known as PT Langgeng Makmur Plastic Industry Ltd. and changed its name to PT Langgeng Makmur Industri Tbk in July 1997. PT Langgeng Makmur Industri Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.

LMSH.JK.summary: PT Lionmesh Prima Tbk engages in the manufacture of various welded wire mesh products in Indonesia. It offers wire mesh fences, gabions, practice columns, and other related products. The company was formerly known as PT Lion Weldmesh Prima. PT Lionmesh Prima Tbk was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

LPCK.JK.summary: PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate and industrial estate projects in Indonesia. The company operates through Real Estate and Support Services segments. It is also involved in the provision of supporting services, including estate management, public transport, and recreation services. In addition, the company engages in construction, purchase, sale, lease, and operation of exhibition spaces, storage facilities, private buildings, malls, shopping centers, hospitals, conference halls, houses of worship, hotels, sports centers, golf courses, clubs, restaurants, entertainment venues, medical, laboratories, pharmacies, office buildings, and parking lots. Further, it offers clean and waste water management services; trading, development, and other services; and transportation, waste management, and recycling services. Additionally, the company is involved in the professional, scientific, and technical activities; and remediation, manpower and business support, and other business activities. PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Lippo Cikarang Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kemuning Satiatama.

LPGI.JK.summary: PT Lippo General Insurance Tbk offers various insurance products in Indonesia. The company offers fire, motor vehicle, marine cargo, health, life and death, and other insurance products. It operates through branches and marketing offices located in Karawaci, Medan, Surabaya, Palembang, Bandung, Semarang, Solo, Pekanbaru, Cikarang, Makassar, Jakarta Kota, Balikpapan, and Bali. The company was formerly known as PT Asuransi Marga Pusaka and changed its name to PT Lippo General Insurance Tbk in July 1991. PT Lippo General Insurance Tbk was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

LPIN.JK.summary: PT Multi Prima Sejahtera Tbk produces, manufactures, distributes, and sells spark plugs in Indonesia. It also offers automobile and motorcycle spark plugs; machinery, equipment, and paraphernalia; automobile accessories parts; technical activities; and agricultural activities and plant breeding. The company was formerly known as Lippo Enterprises Tbk and changed its name to PT Multi Prima Sejahtera Tbk in 2001. PT Multi Prima Sejahtera Tbk was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.

LPKR.JK.summary: PT Lippo Karawaci Tbk provides property development services in Indonesia. It operates in three segments: Real Estate Development, Real Estate Management & Services, and Fund Management/Investments. The Real Estate Development segment is involved in the real estate activities, including urban development; development of facilities and its infrastructure; and other investments, as well as large scale integrated development projects and its infrastructure development that include residential condominiums, commercial and entertainment areas, office towers, healthcare facilities, and education facilities. The Real Estate Management & Services segment manages retail malls, hotels, restaurants, and recreation centers; and provides health, town management, water and sewage treatment, transportation, firefighting, and maintenance services. The Fund Management/Investments segment engages in provision of management services and other activities. It also provides trading, printing, agriculture, mining, workshop, home care, installation, construction, gardening, bowling, golf, recreational, building construction and management, clean water and waste management, marketing, clinic and policlinic, and other related services, as well as healthcare and hospital services. In addition, the company engages in the plantation, forestry, electrical, mechanical, engineering, computer programming, trust, financing and financial entity, management consulting, cafe and catering, and tourism activities, as well as management of leased and strata-titled malls. As of December 31, 2019, it managed 41 leased malls and 10 strata-titled malls; 37 hospitals; and 17 food and beverage outlets. The company was formerly known as PT Tunggal Reksakencana. PT Lippo Karawaci Tbk was founded in 1990 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.

LPLI.JK.summary: PT Star Pacific Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the investment and media businesses in Indonesia. It publishes newspapers and magazines; and offers advertising agency, mass media, general trading, and radio broadcasting services. The company was formerly known as PT Lippo ENet Tbk and changed its name to PT Star Pacific Tbk in November 2008. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Star Pacific Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Inti Anugerah Pratama.

LPPF.JK.summary: PT Matahari Department Store Tbk engages in the retail business in Indonesia. Its stores offer clothes, accessories, bags, shoes, cosmetics, homeware, and household appliances for men, women, and children. The company also provides management consulting services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 169 stores. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.

LPPS.JK.summary: PT Lenox Pasifik Investama Tbk provides investment management services in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Lippo Securities Tbk and changed its name to PT Lenox Pasifik Investama Tbk in September 2020. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Lippo Securities Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Inti Anugrah Pratama.

LPS1.F.summary: PT Lenox Pasifik Investama Tbk provides investment management services in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Lippo Securities Tbk and changed its name to PT Lenox Pasifik Investama Tbk in September 2020. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Lippo Securities Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Inti Anugrah Pratama.

LRNA.JK.long_name: PT Eka Sari Lorena Transport Tbk
LRNA.JK.summary: PT Eka Sari Lorena Transport Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides transportation services in Indonesia. It offers land and air transportation services; document, package, and cargo delivery services; and land transportation rental services, as well as engages in palm oil agribusiness. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Eka Sari Lorena Transport Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Lorena Karina.

LSIP.JK.long_name: PT Perusahaan Perkebunan London Sumatra Indonesia Tbk
LSIP.JK.summary: PT Perusahaan Perkebunan London Sumatra Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the plantation business in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Oil Palm Products, Rubber, Seeds, and Others. The company offers crude palm oil and rubber, as well as cocoa, tea, and oil palm seeds. It also develops plantations on behalf of local smallholders. As of December 31, 2019, the company had a total planted area of 115,665 hectares comprising 95,637 hectares of palm oil; 15,945 hectares of rubber; and 4,083 hectares of cocoa, tea, and other crops in North Sumatra, South Sumatra, East Kalimantan, North Sulawesi, South Sulawesi, and Java. In addition, it is involved in the research, processing, trading, marketing, industrial, and agency/representative activities; and invests in agricultural technology and cultivation, as well as agriculture, forestry, and fishery businesses. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Perusahaan Perkebunan London Sumatra Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Salim Ivomas Pratama Tbk.

LTLS.JK.summary: PT Lautan Luas Tbk manufactures and distributes basic and specialty chemicals for industrial end-users primarily in Indonesia and the Asia-Pacific region. It operates through three segments: Distribution, Manufacturing, and Services. The company provides laboratory services and solutions for textile, paper, electroplating, leather, and water treatment industries, as well as offers integrated logistics and supply chain, waste water treatment, and information technology solutions. It serves the agriculture, animal feed, coating, electroplating, food and beverages, glass and ceramic, leather, mining and smelter, oil field, packaging, personal and home care, plastic and rubber, pulp and paper, sugar, textile, and water treatment industries. The company was formerly known as Perusahaan Andil Maskapai Dagang dan Industri Lim Teck Lee and changed its name to PT Lautan Luas Tbk in 1965. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Lautan Luas Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Caturkarsa Megatunggal.

LUCK.JK.summary: PT Sentral Mitra Informatika Tbk provides hardware, software solutions, and services in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Trading and Rentals. It sells electronic items; and provides printer rental, click, and other services. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

MAGP.JK.long_name: PT Multi Agro Gemilang Plantation Tbk
MAGP.JK.summary: PT Multi Agro Gemilang Plantation Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the oil palm plantation business in Indonesia. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multi Agro Gemilang Plantation Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Santika Griya Persada.

MAIN.JK.summary: PT Malindo Feedmill Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the animal feed, breeding and broiler farm, and food processing businesses in Indonesia. It offers broiler, layer, duck, and other livestock feed products; and parent stock and day old chicken final stock. The company also produces broiler chickens; and provides consumer products, such as chicken nuggets, chicken tempura, chicken sticks, chicken wings, tulip wings, chicken karaage, chicken drumstick, chicken sausage, and combined variant packs under the SunnyGold and Ciki Wiki brands. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Malindo Feedmill Tbk is a subsidiary of Dragon Amity Pte. Ltd.

MAMI.JK.summary: PT Mas Murni Indonesia, Tbk owns, operates, and manages the Garden Palace Hotel located in Surabaya, Indonesia. It operates through Hospitality Services; Office Space Rental Services; and Catering, Laundry and Recreation Services segments. The company also owns the Crystal Garden, an apartment block and shopping center. It also engages in the restaurant, club, fitness center, advertising, entertainment, fisheries, aquaculture, livestock, and general trading activities, as well as provision of laundry service business; construction and development of residential and real estate properties; and trading of food and beverages. The company was formerly known as PT Rantai Mas Murni and changed its name to PT Mas Murni Indonesia, Tbk in October 1971. PT Mas Murni Indonesia, Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

MAPA.JK.summary: PT Map Aktif Adiperkasa Tbk operates as a sporting goods retailer in Indonesia. It operates sports, leisure footwear, and kid's stores that sell athletic shoes, apparel, sports equipment, leisure footwear, apparel, accessories, kids wear, toys, and early education tools. The company's brand portfolio includes Planet Sports, Sports Station, Royal Sporting House, Golf House, OGAAN, Kidz Station, and Planet Sports Kids. It sells its products through approximately 1,173 retail stores in 76 cities, as well as through 6 digital stores. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Map Aktif Adiperkasa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mitra Adiperkasa Tbk.

MAPB.JK.summary: PT. Map Boga Adiperkasa Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates cafÃ©s and restaurants in Indonesia. The company operates 566 retail stores across 33 Indonesian cities with a portfolio of Starbucks, Pizza Express/Pizza Marzano, Krispy Kreme, Cold Stone Creamery, Godiva, Genki Sushi, and Paul Bakery brands. The company was formerly known as PT. Creasi Aksesoris Indonesia. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Map Boga Adiperkasa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Mitra Adiperkasa Tbk.

MAPI.JK.summary: PT. Mitra Adiperkasa Tbk engages in the retail trade of clothing, shoes, toys, accessories, bags, and sports equipment. The company operates through Retail Sales, Department Stores, CafÃ© and Restaurant, and Others segments. It operates sports, fashion, department, kids, food and beverage, and lifestyle product stores under approximately 150 retail brands. The company is also involved in the operation of cafÃ© and restaurant business; and property, investment, book store, manufacturing, and handicraft trading activities, as well as offers cellular phones, tablets, computers, and accessories. It operates approximately 2,500 retail stores and outlets in Jakarta, Bandung, Surabaya, Bali, Medan, Makassar, Batam, Manado, and other cities in Indonesia. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Mitra Adiperkasa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Satya Mulia Gema Gemilang.

MARI.JK.summary: PT Mahaka Radio Integra Tbk engages in the radio broadcasting business in Indonesia. The company owns radio stations for commercial radio broadcasting. It owns and operates 8 radio stations, including JAK 101 fm, GEN 98.7 fm, GEN 103.1 fm, HOT 93.2 fm, KIS 95.1 fm, MUSTANG 88.0 fm, MOST RADIO 105.8 fm, and NOICE. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

MARK.JK.summary: PT Mark Dynamics Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells porcelain formers. The company offers nitrile and latex examination, surgical, household, custom made, and industrial formers, as well as sanitary wares in the form of toilets, lavatories, bath tubes, yellow and white moulds, tablewares, and porcelain clays. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Deli Serdang, Indonesia. PT Mark Dynamics Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Tecable (HK) Co. Limited.

MAYA.JK.summary: PT Bank Mayapada Internasional Tbk provides commercial banking products and services in Indonesia. Its products include savings and current accounts, time deposits, and certificates of deposit. The company also provides auto and home loans; investment and bancassurance products; e-banking services; safe box, payroll, and payment services; and clearing, LLG and RTGS, and foreign exchange transaction services. As of December 31, 2019, it had a network of 39 branches, 91 supporting branches, 83 functional offices, and 3 cash offices, as well as 143 automatic teller machines. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

MBAP.JK.summary: PT Mitrabara Adiperdana Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in coal mining, trading, and industrial businesses. It holds interests in coal mines, which cover a total area of 2,960 hectares located in Malinau Regency, North Kalimantan. The company also operates biomass power plants; and provides plantation and forestry services. It sells its products in South Korea, China, the Philippines, Indonesia, Malaysia, New Zealand, Vietnam, Hongkong, Japan, and internationally. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Mitrabara Adiperdana Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wahana Sentosa Cemerlang.

MBSS.JK.summary: PT Mitrabahtera Segara Sejati Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides sea logistics and transportation services in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Tugboat and Barge, Floating Crane, and Consultancy. The company offers direct barging services for the transportation of bulk mining materials, primarily coal. It owns and operates 76 barges. The company also has a fleet of 4 floating cranes consisting of single and double cranes, as well as 2 floating loading facilities with conveyor belt system and metal detector. Further, it provides material handling services covering barge loading activities; and marine consultancy service. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Mitrabahtera Segara Sejati Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indika Energy Infrastructure.

MBTO.JK.summary: PT Martina Berto Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells herbal medicines and cosmetic products in Indonesia and internationally. It is also involved in marketing and trading cosmetics, beauty care products, and herbal medicines. In addition, the company engages in contract manufacturing of private labels for dry cosmetics, semi solid cosmetics, liquid cosmetics, and aerosols. PT Martina Berto Tbk markets its products through online stores, chain stores, and supermarkets, as well as through wholesalers, cosmetic retailers, beauty salons, and spas. It sells its products under the Cempaka, Martina, Pesona, Biokos Martha Tilaar, Caring Colours Martha Tilaar, and Belia Martha Tilaar. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Martina Berto Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Marthana Megahayu Inti.

MCAS.JK.summary: PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk operates as a digital distribution company in Indonesia. It provides digital kiosk, a self-service kiosk in modern and traditional retails; cashier, which offers digital products at modern retail; and digital products to traditional retails, as well as apps/chat bots. The company also offers information technology management consulting services. PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk was founded in 2010 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

MCOR.JK.long_name: PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk
MCOR.JK.summary: PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Loans, Treasury, Trade Finance, and Unallocated. The company offers various deposit products comprising savings and current accounts, and time deposits; auto and mortgage loans, and commercial express credit products; and safe deposits boxes, and treasury and international banking services. It operates through a network of 21 branch offices, 50 sub-branch offices, and 31 cash offices located in Java, Bali, Sumatra, Kepulauan Riau, West Kalimantan, South Sulawesi, Bangka Belitung, and West Nusa Tenggara. The company was formerly known as PT Bank Windu Kentjana International Tbk and changed its name to PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk in December 2016. PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Bank China Construction Bank Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of China Construction Bank Corporation.

MDIA.JK.summary: PT Intermedia Capital Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides television broadcasting services in Indonesia. It operates ANTV, a free-to-air television channel. The company offers content that are focused on families, children, and entertainment. It is also involved in the provision of communication and management consultancy services; and production house activities. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Intermedia Capital Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Visi Media Asia Tbk.

MDKA.JK.summary: PT Merdeka Copper Gold Tbk engages in the mining business in Indonesia. It explores for gold, silver, copper, and other related minerals, as well as provides mining services. The company holds interests in the Tujuh Bukit Copper/Gold Project; Pani Joint Venture Project; Wetar / Morowali Acid Iron Metal; Tujuh Bukit Gold Production project; and Wetar Copper Production Project. It also offers processing and trading services. The company was formerly known as PT Merdeka Sera and changed its name to PT Merdeka Copper Gold Tbk in December 2014. PT Merdeka Copper Gold Tbk was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

MDKI.JK.summary: PT Emdeki Utama Tbk produces and sells calcium carbide in Indonesia and India. The company also produces air conditioners. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Gresik, Indonesia. PT Emdeki Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Emde Industri Investama.

MDRN.JK.summary: PT Modern Internasional Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the trading business in Indonesia. The company is involved in the operation of department stores and supermarkets; general trading, import/export trading, and food products and beverages trading activities; and provision of document solutions. It also engages in trading and servicing photography/cinematography equipment, home appliances/electronic equipment, engineering equipment, mechanical equipment, electronics, and photocopy machines and its spare parts. The company was formerly known as PT Modern Photo Tbk and changed its name to PT Modern Internasional Tbk in June 2007. PT Modern Internasional Tbk was founded in 1971 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

MEDC.JK.summary: PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk, an energy and natural resources company, explores and produces oil and gas. The company operates 11 exploration and production blocks in Sumatra, Kalimantan, Java, and Sulawesi in Indonesia; and holds oil and gas assets in the Vietnam, Thailand, Oman, Libya, Yemen, Malaysia, Mexico, and Tanzania. It also engages in the power business; copper and gold mining operations in Sumbawa Island and Nusa Tenggara; and the operation of compression station with 3 gas compressors and 10 pipeline facilities in Gunung Megang and South Sumatra. The company was formerly known as PT Medco Energi Corporation and changed its name to PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk in 2000. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Medco Daya Abadi Lestari.

MEF.F.summary: PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk, an energy and natural resources company, explores and produces oil and gas. The company operates 11 exploration and production blocks in Sumatra, Kalimantan, Java, and Sulawesi in Indonesia; and holds oil and gas assets in the Vietnam, Thailand, Oman, Libya, Yemen, Malaysia, Mexico, and Tanzania. It also engages in the power business; copper and gold mining operations in Sumbawa Island and Nusa Tenggara; and the operation of compression station with 3 gas compressors and 10 pipeline facilities in Gunung Megang and South Sumatra. The company was formerly known as PT Medco Energi Corporation and changed its name to PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk in 2000. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Medco Energi Internasional Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Medco Daya Abadi Lestari.

MEGA.JK.summary: PT Bank Mega Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. It offers saving accounts, current accounts, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit; and debit cards. The company also provides corporate, commercial, SME and consumer, cash, housing, working capital, and investment loans; supplier and inventory financing; financing for the purchase of motor vehicles and assets; credit cards; and various credit facilities. In addition, it offers investment products, such as mutual funds and bonds; bancassurance products comprising term life and unit link products; and monitoring agent services for issuance of medium terms notes and guarantor agent services. Further, the company provides funds remittance, funds transfer, intercity clearing, cash management, safe deposit box, custody, trustee, treasury, and trade financing services; international banking services; and electronic banking service, including ATM, internet banking, and mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 54 branches, 283 sub-branches, and 40 cash offices. The company was formerly known as PT. Karman bank and changed its name to PT Bank Mega Tbk in 1992. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bank Mega Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mega Corpora.

MERK.JK.summary: PT Merck Tbk manufactures and sells pharmaceutical products in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Biopharma, Consumer Health, and Others. The company operates in the healthcare, life science, and performance materials sectors. It offers health care products in the areas of allergies, endocrinology, fertility, general medicine, neuro degenerative diseases, and oncology. The company also engages in discovery, development, manufacturing, and diagnostics of drugs. In addition, it offers liquid crystals and OLED materials for displays, materials for integrated circuits, pigments for coatings or colour cosmetics, and functional materials for energy solutions. The company was formerly known as PT Merck Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Merck Tbk in June 2002. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Merck Tbk is a subsidiary of Merck Holding GmbH.

META.JK.summary: PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates and manages toll roads in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: Toll Road, Water Supply, Energy, and Port. The company also provides trade and construction, port management, clean water supply and waste management, and telecommunication services. In addition, it engages in the renewable energy business. The company was formerly known as PT Metamedia Technologies Tbk and changed its name to PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk in June 2006. PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Nusantara Infrastructure Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Metro Pacific Tollways Indonesia.

MFIN.JK.summary: PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk engages in consumer financing activities in Java, Sumatera, Sulawesi, and Kalimantan in Indonesia. It offers motorcycle financing services based on conventional and sharia financing, as well as electronic and furniture, and car financing services. The company was formerly known as PT Gracia Dinamika Multifinance and changed its name to PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk in March 1997. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Mandala Multifinance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Jayamandiri Gemasejati.

MFMI.JK.summary: PT Multifiling Mitra Indonesia Tbk provides record management services in Indonesia. The company's record management services include sorting documents, data entry, maintaining archives, and document destruction. It also offers computer data management services, including backup of data stored on tapes, DVDs, and cartridge. In addition, the company provides valuable document management services, such as sorting, file storage, and retrieval; electronic document management services; and facility management services. Further, it offers application development, security waste and data management, archival related works, and other related data storage services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Multifiling Mitra Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Surya Cipta Investama.

MGRO.JK.summary: PT Mahkota Group Tbk engages in the palm oil processing and its derivatives businesses in Indonesia. The company produces crude palm oil, palm kernel, and other derivative products. It also offers logistic services; and engages in palm oil plantation activities. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Medan, Indonesia. PT Mahkota Group Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Mahkota Global Investama.

MICE.JK.summary: PT Multi Indocitra Tbk produces and trades in baby and health care products, and cosmetics in Indonesia. The company offers baby products and healthcare products, including bottle, nipple, breast feeding accs, feeding accs, nursing accs, healthcare accs, teether, pacifier, breast pads and pumps, baby wipes, baby and kids toiletries, and baby skin care products; personal care products, such as face and compact powder, two way cake, facial foam, and moisturizer; and cosmetics, which includes body lotions, hand gels, lip care, lipstiks, eyes shadows, and make up. It also provides skincare products consists of shower cream and bubble foam shower; hotwheels, barbie, thomas & friends, fisher price, and mega bloks; shaver and refill cartridges; adult and baby diapers; gummy vitamin for kids, adult, beauty, and expectant mom; air fresheners; kitchen cleaners; floor cleaners; cleaner for all surfaces and glasses; ready to drink soya milk; lampu LEDs, daylight and warmwhite bulbs, and flood lights; and viva face tonic, milk cleansers, scin foods, air mawar, eye brow pencils, and liquid foundations. In addition, the company offers food and beverage products, including lexus, oat crunch, samudra, crackers, topmix, and funmixed munchy's; ota moruku, crack potato, miaowmiaow, omypop, and mini rice crack potatoes; waisun, southern, marshmallow, and lot sour 100 candies; and d'best birdness, guava, tea, soya starway, dolphin, and wanfa drink beverages. It sells its brands under the Pigeon and Lock&Lock brands name. The company offers its products through its own distribution centers, as well as third party suppliers and sub-distributors. PT Multi Indocitra Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

MIDI.JK.summary: PT Midi Utama Indonesia Tbk engages in the retail of consumer products in Indonesia. The company operates through Food, Fresh Food, and Non-Food segments. It offers grocery, fruits and vegetables, home and personal care products, toys, pre paid vouchers, and stationary products through minimarket network under the Alfamidi name; convenience stores under the Lawson name; and supermarket network under the Alfamidi super name. The company was formerly known as PT Midimart Utama. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Midi Utama Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumber Alfaria Trijaya Tbk.

MIKA.JK.summary: PT Mitra Keluarga Karyasehat Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates hospitals in Indonesia. The company provides healthcare services; and operates a pharmacy. Its hospital network comprises of 16 Mitra Keluarga hospitals and 8 other hospitals located in Jakarta, Bekasi, Cikarang, Depok, Cibubur, Tangerang, Sukabumi, Karawang, Cirebon, Surabaya, Cibinong, Subang, and Tegal. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Mitra Keluarga Karyasehat Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Griyainsani Cakrasadaya.

MINA.JK.summary: PT Sanurhasta Mitra Tbk engages in property development and hospitality business in Indonesia. It primarily develops housing projects; and manages cottages. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

MIRA.JK.summary: PT Mitra International Resources Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides land transportation services in Indonesia. The company offers transportation services to automobile assembling industry; logistics and warehousing services, including handles loading and unloading of goods in warehouses; on shore and offshore support services for energy, oil, and gas sectors; and building management services, as well as industrial support services, as well as operates a mixer truck fleet for carrying out projects in Central Java and East Java. It also provides manufacturing services of various car body products, such as flat truck deck truck, dump truck, box, and wing box. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 518 trucks. The company was formerly known as PT Mitra Rajasa and changed its name to PT Mitra International Resources Tbk in October 2009. PT Mitra International Resources Tbk was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

MKNT.JK.summary: PT Mitra Komunikasi Nusantara Tbk distributes and sells telecommunication products in Indonesia. The company offers smartphones, tablets/pads, prepaid vouchers, SIM cards, and network products. It also sells its products online. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

MKPI.JK.summary: PT Metropolitan Kentjana Tbk develops and manages lands and buildings in Indonesia. The company operates through Shopping Center, Office, Apartment, Real Estate, Air/Water Park, and Hotel segments. It also engages in the rental of space in shopping centers, office buildings, and apartments; and sale of land and buildings. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

MLBI.JK.summary: PT Multi Bintang Indonesia Tbk produces and markets alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages in Indonesia. The company offers beers, sodas, carbonated soft drinks, and ciders under the Heineken, Heineken Light, Bintang, Bintang Radler, Strongbow, Bintang Zero, Fayrouz, and Green Sands brands. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multi Bintang Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Heineken International B.V.

MLIA.JK.summary: PT Mulia Industrindo Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells glass in Indonesia. It offers plain and colored float glass; glass containers, such as bottles, mugs, and cups, as well as transparent and colored container glass used for packaging of food, and beverages and beer; architectural glass blocks for application on wall and floor; automotive safety glass; and ceramic tiles. The company also exports its products to Asia, Australia, Europe, Africa, and the United States. It primarily sells its products to distributors and glass processors. PT Mulia Industrindo Tbk was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

MLPL.JK.summary: PT Multipolar Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in telecommunication, information technology, and general trading businesses in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Retail and Distribution, Information Technology, and Others segments. It operates a chain of retail hypermarkets, SmartClub, Foodmart, Boston Health & Beauty, and FMX, as well as e-commerce business; department stores and Books & Beyond book stores; and family entertainment centers. The company also provides IT services and solutions, including hardware and integration services; application system and implementation services; and IT consulting services. In addition, it operates filing management; offers services for record, computer data, valuable document, electronic document, and facility management services; other auxiliary services; and develops and manages shopping centers, offices, and apartments. Additionally, the company provides a web based platform for procurement of goods and services for business-to-business and business-to-government market segments; and telecommunication and air transportation services. Further, it is involved in import, export, interinsulair, local and retail, property/real estate development and management services, rental space of building, and investment businesses. PT Multipolar Tbk was formerly known as PT Multipolar Corporation Tbk and changed its name to PT Multipolar Tbk in July 2007. PT Multipolar Tbk was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multipolar Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Inti Anugrah Pratama.

MLPT.JK.summary: PT Multipolar Technology Tbk provides information technology (IT) consulting, system integration, and IT systems management services in Indonesia. The company offers IT strategy and planning services, such as digital transformation planning, IT operation and governance, independent validation and verification, IT PMO set up and operation assistance, data center consulting, and data governance; customer experience platform and services, including e-channel, mobility, communication system and collaboration, customer relationship management, and digital marketing; and digital insights solutions comprising big data and analytics, business performance intelligence, and artificial intelligence. It also provides banking, enterprise resource planning, smart office, enterprise project management, and field operation solutions; merchant IT and IT operation managed services; and blockchain, Internet of Things, OS and virtualization, database platform, services oriented architecture, container management, and application program interface management solutions. In addition, the company offers ICT infrastructure, colocation, data center managed, and cloud services, as well as disaster recovery as a service; and security solutions, and managed security service provider/security operation center. It serves financial, telecommunication, government, health care, manufacturing, oil and gas, and retail sectors. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multipolar Technology Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Multipolar Tbk.

MLQ2.F.summary: PT Multipolar Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in telecommunication, information technology, and general trading businesses in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates through Retail and Distribution, Information Technology, and Others segments. It operates a chain of retail hypermarkets, SmartClub, Foodmart, Boston Health & Beauty, and FMX, as well as e-commerce business; department stores and Books & Beyond book stores; and family entertainment centers. The company also provides IT services and solutions, including hardware and integration services; application system and implementation services; and IT consulting services. In addition, it operates filing management; offers services for record, computer data, valuable document, electronic document, and facility management services; other auxiliary services; and develops and manages shopping centers, offices, and apartments. Additionally, the company provides a web based platform for procurement of goods and services for business-to-business and business-to-government market segments; and telecommunication and air transportation services. Further, it is involved in import, export, interinsulair, local and retail, property/real estate development and management services, rental space of building, and investment businesses. PT Multipolar Tbk was formerly known as PT Multipolar Corporation Tbk and changed its name to PT Multipolar Tbk in July 2007. PT Multipolar Tbk was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multipolar Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Inti Anugrah Pratama.

MMLP.JK.summary: PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk provides logistics facilities in Indonesia. It also leases warehouses and office spaces. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Mega Mandiri Properti.

MNCN.JK.summary: PT. Media Nusantara Citra Tbk operates as a media company in Indonesia. It operates through Television, Radio, Print Media, Content, and Advertising Agency segments. The company owns and operates national free-to-air televisions (TV), such as RCTI TV station that offers a range of programs, including drama series, box office movies, sports events, talent search shows, reality shows, music shows, and infotainment programs; MNCTV, which offers family drama series, sports programs, and various shows; GTV that focuses on animation, variety shows, reality shows, game shows, and talent search programs; and iNews TV, which focuses on news, sports, and other factual programs. In addition, it operates RDTI+, an entertainment app; Sindonews.com, an online edition of Koran Sindo, Okezone.com, a general and news portal, iNews.id, a news portal comprising national news and regional portal; and publishes Koran Sindo, a newspaper; and meTube.id, a user generated content platform, as well as ROOV and MNC. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT. Media Nusantara Citra Tbk is a subsidiary of PT. Global Mediacom Tbk.

MOLI.JK.summary: PT. Madusari Murni Indah Tbk, through its subsidiaries, produces, distributes, trades in, and sells food grade ethanol. It also provides carbondioxide gas in liquid and dry forms; and organic and potassium fertilizers. The company sells its products under the Molindo Ethanol, Molindo CO2, and Molindo Fertilizer brands. It serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, cosmetic, cigarette, hospital, furniture, ink, printing, fuel, and welding industries.
