The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Solusi Bangun Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Semen Indonesia Industri Bangunan.

SMDM.JK.summary: PT Suryamas Dutamakmur Tbk engages in the real estate activities in Indonesia. It operates through Real Estate and Property, Golf and Country Club, Estate Management, Hotel, and Investment and Others segments. The company is involved in the sale of land and houses; and operation of the golf courses, country clubs, hotels, and other resort facilities located in Rancamaya, Bogor, West Java. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Suryamas Dutamakmur Tbk is a subsidiary of Top Global Limited.

SMDR.JK.summary: PT Samudera Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides cargo transportation and integrated logistics services in Indonesia and rest of Southeast Asia, the Middle East, India, and internationally. The company operates through Shipping and Agency, Logistics and Terminal, and Others segments. It also offers container shipping services; container storage, repairs, and related services; and stevedoring and warehousing, freight forwarding, land transportation, and container freight station services. In addition, the company provides cargo inland transport, container depot, warehouse and distribution center, third party logistics, and cold chain and project logistics services; and sales and marketing, and traffic and operations services, as well as offers cargo handling services. Further, It offers agency, ship management and other related, and oil and gas transportation services, as well as supporting services for mining oil and gas, and marine transportation services; property development, trading, and industry services; port management and other port services; and mechanical reparation, maintenance, and wholesale trade services, as well as port supporting equipment. Additionally, the company provides terminal, bulk carrier, tanker, offshore support, third-party logistics, packaging, and project logistics services, as well as inland transportation, and container depot services. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Samudera Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Samudera Indonesia Tangguh.

SMGR.JK.summary: PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and distributes cement in Indonesia and internationally. The company is also involved in limestone and clay mining; cement bag and material manufacturing; industrial real estate development and building rental; ready mix concrete production; and mining, trading, transportation, and construction activities. In addition, it engages in the information system, investment, freight forwarding, general trading, stevedoring, sea transportation, and building materials businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Semen Gresik (Persero) Tbk and changed its name to PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk in January 2013. PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

SMKL.JK.summary: PT Satyamitra Kemas Lestari Tbk provides integrated carton packaging solutions in Indonesia. It offers corrugated carton boxes, pre-print, offset, and rigid boxes; and truck rental and logistics services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Satyamitra Kemas Lestari Tbk is a subsidiary of Satyamitra Investindo Pratama.

SMMA.JK.summary: PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk provides various financial services to individual and corporate clients in Indonesia. The company's services include banking, insurance, financing, capital markets, asset management, share administration, security, and information technology. It offers savings accounts; call, time, and demand deposits; foreign exchange; mutual funds; bancassurance; corporate and personal credit cards; bank guarantee; loan products, including micro, working capital, investment, non-collateral, agricultural, and multi-purpose loan; supply chain financing; consumer financing; import and export bill; telegraphic transfer; and mobile and internet banking, as well as automatic teller machine, safe deposit box, payroll, and money transfer services. The company also provides life and general insurance, insurance agency, securities and share registry, asset management, commodity trading, factoring, leasing, investment financing, and fund management services. In addition, it is involved in trading and service, auction house, property, clinic, and workshop activities. The company was formerly known as PT Internas Artha Finance Company and changed its name to PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk in February 1995. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Sinar Mas Multiartha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Cakrawala.

SMMT.JK.summary: PT Golden Eagle Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining business in Indonesia. The company owns interests in a coal concession that covers an area of 3,238 hectares located in Samarinda, East Kalimantan; and three coal concessions covering 2.143 hectares located in Musi Rawas Regency, South Sumatera province. It also offers mining support and coal transportation services. In addition, the company exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Eatertainment International Tbk and changed its name to PT Golden Eagle Energy Tbk in August 2012. PT Golden Eagle Energy Tbk was founded in 1980 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SMNUF.summary: PT Sarana Menara Nusantara Tbk., through its subsidiary, PT Profesional Telekomunikasi Indonesia, owns and operates telecommunication towers for wireless operators in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Tower Rental; Very Small Aperture Terminal (VSAT) Services; and Metropolitan Wireless Fiber Optic and Internet. The company leases space at its multi-tenant tower for wireless operators under long term lease agreements; and acts as a closed fixed network provider with VSAT and fiber optic. It owns and operates approximately 19,319 towers. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Kudus, Indonesia. PT Sarana Menara Nusantara Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Sapta Adhikari Investama.

SMRA.JK.summary: PT Summarecon Agung Tbk engages in the development and management of real estate properties in Indonesia. The company operates through Property Development, Investment Property, Leisure and Hospitality, and Others segments. It develops and sells houses, commercial buildings, apartments, and residential land and commercial shop plots; manages and leases properties; and provides recreational club facilities. The company develops townships; rents shophouses and office buildings; owns leisure and hospitality facilities, such as sports clubs and hotels; and provides health and estate management services. In addition, it manages residential apartments, offices, and other building facilities; and develops infrastructure facilities. Further, the company operates gas stations and hospitals; retails food and beverages; and provides education, as well as trading services. PT Summarecon Agung Tbk was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SMS2.F.summary: PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and distributes cement in Indonesia and internationally. The company is also involved in limestone and clay mining; cement bag and material manufacturing; industrial real estate development and building rental; ready mix concrete production; and mining, trading, transportation, and construction activities. In addition, it engages in the information system, investment, freight forwarding, general trading, stevedoring, sea transportation, and building materials businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Semen Gresik (Persero) Tbk and changed its name to PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk in January 2013. PT Semen Indonesia (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

SMSM.JK.summary: PT Selamat Sempurna Tbk manufactures and sells spare parts and automotive components. It operates through five segments: Filter, Radiator, Body Maker, Trading, and Others. The company offers radiators; hydraulic and automotive components, including body maker, dump truck, tank, box, trailer, and dump hoist; and fuel tank, muffler, oil, cooler, condenser, exhaust system, and brake and fuel pipe products, as well as filters for automotive, commercial, heavy equipment, marine, industrial, construction equipment, and gas turbine applications. It also assembles dump trucks, trailers, mixers, and other special purpose vehicles; and manufactures rubber O-rings, polyurethanes, and plastisol adhesives for automotive industries. The company markets its products under the Sakura Filter brand name. It exports its products to approximately 120 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Selamat Sempurna Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Adrindo Intiperkasa.

SNLK.JK.summary: PT Sunter Lakeside Hotel Tbk operates a 4-star luxury hotel in North Jakarta. Its hotel provides guest rooms and suites, as well as various facilities and amenities, which include Internet, meeting rooms, banquet ballrooms, gym and fitness center, swimming pool, tennis courts, airport shuttle services, and others. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SOCI.JK.summary: PT Soechi Lines Tbk provides shipping and marine transportation services in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Shipping and Shipyard. It charters vessels to the oil and gas, and chemical companies. The company operates a fleet of 35 vessels. It also operates a shipyard, which offers ship maintenance, repair, and overhauling vessels service, as well as new shipbuilding services. In addition, the company provides management and business consulting services; and engages in investment and other business activities. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Soechi Lines Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Soechi Group.

SOFA.JK.summary: PT Boston Furniture Industries Tbk manufactures and sales furniture products for home in Indonesia. The company is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia with additional location in Selatan, Indonesia.

SOHO.JK.summary: PT Soho Global Health Tbk operates as a healthcare company in Indonesia. The company researches, develops, and markets specialty-focused medicines for use in the therapeutic areas of immunomodulator, respiratory, inflammation, and liver diseases; offers nonprescription brand products to treat and prevent diseases; and provides contract manufacturing services for various dosage forms, as well as distribution and logistics services. It also offers body defense, stamina and vitality, brain nutrient, eye health, skin care, weight management, and wellness products; sells and markets medical devices and medical equipment products in the areas of wound care, hospital general care, surgery, orthopedics, and in-vitro diagnostics; and provides product registration, marketing intelligence, sales, and marketing support services. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia.

SONA.JK.long_name: PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk
SONA.JK.summary: PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides travel related services in Indonesia. It operates through three divisions: Tours, Duty Free Shops, and Retail Shops. The company operates duty free shops in Bali and retail shops in Jakarta and Bali. It also sells tours and travel tickets, as well as handles related documents and tours. The company was formerly known as PT Sona Topas and changed its name to PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk in October 1990. PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SOSS.JK.summary: PT Shield on Service Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides outsourcing services in Indonesia. It operates through Security Services, Cleaning Services, Human Resource Provider, Parking Services, and Others segments. The company offers security services comprising security management and guarding, security consultancy, corporate and personnel review, and security personnel training services; and cleaning and maintenance services, including daily, full-package, special, and mobile cleaning, as well as landscape/garden maintenance services. It also provides human resource solutions that include talent development, recruitment assessment, and compensation and benefit services; and parking management services, such as parking, valet, car park management, traffic design consultancy, and parking equipment maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

SOTS.JK.summary: PT Satria Mega Kencana Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates hotels under the Sotis brand in Indonesia. It also owns and leases real estate properties; and offers food and beverages. In addition, the company is involved in the professional, scientific, and technical activities, as well as construction services. Further, it provides spa services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SPMA.JK.summary: PT Suparma Tbk manufactures and sells paper and packaging paper products in Indonesia. The company's paper products include laminated wrapping and brown Kraft, and sandwiched ribbed Kraft recycle papers; white papers; and carton papers. It also provides bathroom, facial, napkin, and carrier tissues; hand, hand roll, industrial and clinical roll, and kitchen towels; and OEM products. In addition, the company exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Supar Inpama and changed its name to PT Suparma Tbk in December 1978. PT Suparma Tbk was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

SPTO.JK.summary: PT Surya Pertiwi Tbk distributes bathroom and kitchen products. The company offers sanitary wares, porcelain, fittings, kitchen products, and household appliances. It also engages in the construction activities. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

SQMI.JK.summary: PT Wilton Makmur indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the gold mining business in Indonesia. The company holds interest in the Ciemas Gold Project that covers a total area of 2,878.5 hectares located in West Java, Indonesia. It is also involved in the coal mining business. The company was formerly known as PT Renuka Coalindo Tbk and changed its name to PT Wilton Makmur indonesia Tbk in October 2019. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Wilton Makmur indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Wolton Resources Holding Pte. Ltd.

SRAJ.JK.summary: PT Sejahteraraya Anugrahjaya Tbk operates private hospitals in Tangerang and South Jakarta, Indonesia. It operates through two segment; In-Patient and Out-Patient services. The company operates its hospitals under the Mayapada Hospital name, offers support facilities. The company was formerly known as PT Sejahtera Raya Anugrah and changed its name to PT Sejahteraraya Anugrahjaya Tbk in December 1992. PT Sejahteraraya Anugrahjaya Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Sejahteraraya Anugrahjaya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Surya Cipta Inti Cemerlang.

SRIL.JK.summary: PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk operates as a textile and garment company in Indonesia. It operates through Spinning, Weaving, Finishing Fabric, and Garment segments. The company provides yarn to textile customers; greige; finished fabric; and military and corporate uniforms. It offers its products in the United States, China, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Brunei Darussalam, Timor Leste, Singapore, Nepal, the Philippines, South Africa, the United Arab Emirates, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Austria, England, Bangladesh, and India. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Surakarta, Indonesia. PT Sri Rejeki Isman Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Huddleston Indonesia.

SRSN.JK.summary: PT Indo Acidatama Tbk produces and sells basic and agro chemicals primarily in Indonesia. The company offers ethanol, acetic acid, and ethyl acetate products; and organic plus bio fertilizers under the POMI and BEKA names. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Sarasa Nugraha Tbk and changed its name to PT Indo Acidatama Tbk in May 2006. PT Indo Acidatama Tbk was founded in 1982 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

SRTG.JK.summary: PT Saratoga Investama Sedaya Tbk is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in early stage, growth stage and special situations investments. It primarily invests in natural resources, energy, infrastructure, telecommunication, shipping, pharmaceutical, retail, food and beverage, and consumer goods sectors. The firm seeks to make investments in Indonesia. It focuses on acquisitions that are six to eight times EBITDA. The firm seeks to hold its investments for a period of three to five years. Saratoga Capital Investment was founded in 1997 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia with an additional office in Singapore, Singapore.

SSIA.JK.summary: PT Surya Semesta Internusa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business. The company operates through five divisions: Construction of Industrial Estates, Real Estate and Rental Buildings, Building Construction, Investment in Other Companies, and Hotels. It engages in the property, development, and management of industrial estates, real estate, buildings, and commercial centers; provision of construction and general contractor services for commercial buildings, mining, and infrastructure; and development and management of hotels and resorts, as well as hospitality and industrial estate development activities. The company owns approximately 10 hotels under the Gran MeliÃ¡ Jakarta and MeliÃ¡ Bali Hotels, Banyan Tree Ungasan Resort, The Plaza Hotel Glodok, and BATIQA Hotels brands. It engages in the rental of office buildings and shopping centers; and trading, development, transportation, agriculture, mining and services, and building construction activities. The company was formerly known as PT Multi Investments Limited and changed its name to PT Surya Semesta Internusa Tbk in 1995. PT Surya Semesta Internusa Tbk was founded in 1971 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SSMS.JK.summary: PT Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of crude palm oil, fresh fruit bunches, palm kernel oil, and palm kernel in Indonesia. The company operates oil palm plantations and a palm oil mill. It is also involved in the provision of consulting and trading services. PT Sawit Sumbermas Sarana Tbk. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Pangkalan Bun, Indonesia.

SSTM.JK.summary: PT Sunson Textile Manufacturer Tbk engages in the manufacturing and selling yarn, fabric, and other textile products in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Spinning, Weaving, and Others. It also provides general trading services. The company also exports its products in rest of Asia, Europe, the Americas, and Africa. PT Sunson Textile Manufacturer Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

STAR.JK.summary: PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk engages in the wholesale trade and export of thread, cotton, and fiber primarily in Indonesia. It also processes synthetic fibers. The company was formerly known as PT Star Petrochem, Tbk and changed its name to PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk in June 2019. PT Buana Artha Anugerah Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

STTP.JK.summary: PT Siantar Top Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells snacks in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Food Processing and Others. The company offers biscuits, rice, coffee, instant and snack noodles, pellets, vermicelli, crackers, wafers, and candies, as well as flour and seasoning products. It also exports its products in Asia and the Middle East. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Siantar Top Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Shindo Tiara Tunggal.

SULI.JK.summary: PT SLJ Global Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the timber manufacturing, power, and logging businesses in the United States, Indonesia, East Asia, Europe, Australia, and Southeast Asia. It operates through Timber manufacturing, and power plant and logging segments. It manages six natural forest concessions of 770,455 hectares. The company also engages in the industrial plywood and medium density fibre board, as well as mining businesses. In addition, it operates a power plant with a total capacity of 22.5 megawatts. The company was formerly known as PT Sumalindo Lestari Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT SLJ Global Tbk in December 2012. PT SLJ Global Tbk was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SUPR.JK.summary: PT Solusi Tunas Pratama Tbk operates as an independent tower company in Indonesia. The company operates and rents base transceiver station (BTS) tower buildings or telecommunications towers, and other related telecommunication infrastructure. It operates greenfield and rooftop telecommunication towers, including four-legged supporting towers, three-legged self-supporting towers, camouflage towers, monopoles, and roof top towers, as well as mobile BTS. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Solusi Tunas Pratama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Kharisma Indah Ekaprima.

SURE.JK.summary: PT Super Energy Tbk, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes oil and gas in Indonesia. The company processes natural gas into condensate, liquefied petroleum gas, lean gas, and compressed natural gas (CNG). It also trades in and distributes fuel and CNG; and offers transportation services for mining and other petroleum products, as well as operates CNG station. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SWAT.JK.summary: PT Sriwahana Adityakarta Tbk manufactures and sells corrugated carton packaging solutions. It offers corrugated carton for use in transport, consumer, non-direct contact food, and non-food packaging applications; paper cones; and paper tubes. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Boyolali, Indonesia. PT Sriwahana Adityakarta Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumber Makmur Lumintu.

SZ31.F.summary: PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates oil palm and rubber plantations, and palm oil mills in South Sumatera, West Kalimantan, Central Kalimantan, and Riau, Indonesia. The company offers crude palm oil, palm kernel, and germinated oil palm seeds, as well as non-palm oil products, such as rubber and sago starch. It is also involved in the utilization of forestry products; provision of management consultation service; and wholesale trade activities. The company produces and sells its oil palm seeds under the DxP Sriwijaya brand; and sago starch under the brand name Prima Starch. As of September 30, 2020, it total planted area included 119,176 hectares of oil palm inti plantations, sago plantations, and rubber plantations. The company was formerly known as PT Selapan Jaya and changed its name to PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk in 2007. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Palembang, Indonesia. PT Sampoerna Agro Tbk is a subsidiary of Sampoerna Agri Resources Pte. Ltd.

T2L.F.summary: PT Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk primarily manufactures and sells vegetable cooking oils in Indonesia. It operates through Plantations and Manufacturing segments. The company offers palm cooking oil, palm kernel oil, crude palm oil, stearine, fatty acid, crude coconut oil, glycerin, margarine, molasses, and sugar, as well as biodiesel, and laundry and cream soaps. It also engages in the plantation of palm oil and sugarcane. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

T9Q.F.summary: PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction and other related services primarily in Indonesia. It operates through Construction, and Rental and Others divisions. The company undertakes construction of education, office and religious buildings, high rise residential buildings, hospitals, shopping centers, hotels, utilities, and industrial projects. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk also provides equipment rental and installation services. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Total Inti Persada.

TA2.SG.summary: PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk provides various banking products and services in Indonesia. The company offers savings and current accounts; demand and time deposits; certificates of deposit; and debit cards. It also provides subsidized and other mortgages; consumer and construction loans; micro and small medium enterprise credits; commercial and institutional funding services; and credit cards. In addition, the company issues debts instruments; buys and sells bills of exchange, promissory notes, commercial papers, treasury bills, government insurance notes, Bank Indonesia certificates, bonds, and other securities instruments; places, borrows, or lends funds from other banks; receives payment from securities bills; acts as a pension fund provider and manager; and conducts Sharia-principle business activities. Further, it offers safekeeping, factoring, trustee, investment banking, treasury, asset management, wealth management, electronic data capture, cash management, branchless banking, bank guarantees, safe deposit box, transfer or remittance, payroll, and other banking services; and electronic banking services, such as automatic teller machine and KiosK, cash deposit machine, internet, virtual account, SMS, and mobile banking services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 103 branches, including 25 Sharia branches; 373 sub-branches comprising 59 Sharia sub-branches; 254 cash offices, including 7 Sharia cash offices; and 3,014 system online payment point/online post offices. The company was formerly known as Bank Tabungan Pos and changed its name to PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk in 1963. PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1897 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TALF.JK.summary: PT Tunas Alfin Tbk manufactures and sells packaging products in Indonesia. The company offers dry and wet, wax, extrusion, and solventless lamination; paper and board metalizing; and printing services, as well as produces release paper and adhesive coating products. It serves cigarette, consumer food, and health and hygiene products manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Tunas Alfin Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Proinvestindo.

TAMA.JK.summary: PT Lancartama Sejati TBK provides construction services in Indonesia. It operates as a general contractor for residential and commercial properties, as well as an infrastructural contractor for agricultural and manufacture companies. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TAMU.JK.summary: PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk operates as an integrated offshore shipping company in Indonesia. The company's services include offshore marine support services, marine equipment chatering, chartering, re-chartering, accommodation work barge, and anchor handling tug supply services. It serves the oil and gas industry. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Andalan Lepas Pantai.

TAPG.JK.summary: PT Triputra Agro Persada engages in the oil palm plantations and palm oil processing businesses in Indonesia. The company produces crude palm oil and palm kernel products. It also engages in rubber plantations business. The company was formerly known as PT. Alam Permata Indah and changed its name to PT Triputra Agro Persada in March 2005. PT Triputra Agro Persada was founded in 2005 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

TARA.JK.summary: PT Sitara Propertindo Tbk primarily engages in the development of properties in Indonesia. The company constructs commercial and residential properties. PT Sitara Propertindo Tbk company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

TAXI.JK.summary: PT Express Transindo Utama Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides land transportation services in Indonesia. The company offers regular taxi services under the Express Taxi Regular and Eagle Taxi brand name; premium taxi services under the Tiara Express brand; and value added transportation business services, including limousine rental services under the Limousine Express brand name and bus rental services under the Eagle High brand name. It operates a fleet of approximately 8,000 licensed taxis in the Greater Jakarta area, as well as in other cities, such as Medan, Surabaya, Semarang, Bandung, Bali, and Lombok. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Express Transindo Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Rajawali Corpora.

TBA.F.summary: PT Bukit Asam Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining activities in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Coal Mining and Other. Its coal mining activities include general surveying, exploration, exploitation, processing, refining, transportation, and trading. It manages special coal port facilities; operates steam power plants; and provides consulting services related to the coal mining industry and production. The company also offers briquette processing, mining services, oil palm plantation and processing, and health services. It also operates in India, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Thailand, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Bukit Asam Persero Tbk and changed its name to PT Bukit Asam Tbk in November 2017. PT Bukit Asam Tbk was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Tanjung Enim Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bukit Asam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium.

TBIG.JK.summary: PT Tower Bersama Infrastructure Tbk provides telecommunication infrastructure solution and services in Indonesia. It leases antenna and other equipment space to Indonesian telecommunications operators for wireless signal transmission related to wireless voice and data transmission. The company also owns and operates distributed antennae system (DAS) networks installed in a building for wireless communications for telecommunications operators in shopping malls and office buildings. As of December 31, 2019, it had 28,740 tenants; and 15,589 telecommunications sites comprising 15,473 telecommunications towers and 116 DAS networks. The company was formerly known as PT Banyan Mas. PT Tower Bersama Infrastructure Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

TBLA.JK.summary: PT Tunas Baru Lampung Tbk primarily manufactures and sells vegetable cooking oils in Indonesia. It operates through Plantations and Manufacturing segments. The company offers palm cooking oil, palm kernel oil, crude palm oil, stearine, fatty acid, crude coconut oil, glycerin, margarine, molasses, and sugar, as well as biodiesel, and laundry and cream soaps. It also engages in the plantation of palm oil and sugarcane. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TBMS.JK.summary: PT Tembaga Mulia Semanan Tbk manufactures, sells, and exports copper and aluminum rods and wires in Indonesia and internationally. The company's Copper Rod and Wire segment engages in the production of copper rods and wires, as well as copper nuggets. Its Aluminum Rod segment produces EC grade rods, alloy rods, and TAL rods. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

TBNGY.summary: PT Bukit Asam Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining activities in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Coal Mining and Other. Its coal mining activities include general surveying, exploration, exploitation, processing, refining, transportation, and trading. It manages special coal port facilities; operates steam power plants; and provides consulting services related to the coal mining industry and production. The company also offers briquette processing, mining services, oil palm plantation and processing, and health services. It also operates in India, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Thailand, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, and Vietnam. The company was formerly known as PT Bukit Asam Persero Tbk and changed its name to PT Bukit Asam Tbk in November 2017. PT Bukit Asam Tbk was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Tanjung Enim Selatan, Indonesia. PT Bukit Asam Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium.

TCID.F.long_name: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk
TCID.F.summary: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk provides telecommunications, informatics, and network services worldwide. The company's Mobile segment offers mobile voice, SMS, and mobile broadband services; and digital services, including financial services, video on demand, music, gaming, IoT, big data analytics, and digital advertising services. Its Consumer segment provides fixed voice and broadband services; and IPTV and related consumer digital services. The company's Enterprise segment offers ICT and digital platform that covers enterprise-grade connectivity services, including satellite, IT services, data center and cloud, and business process outsourcing services, as well as CPE trading and managed, cyber security, financial, big data, digital advertising, e-health, managed ATM, and professional services. Its Wholesale and International Business segment provides wholesale voice, managed, A2P SMS, IP transit and connectivity, data center and cloud, security, and value added and digital services; mobile network operator, mobile virtual network operator, and call center services; and tower and infrastructure services to other licensed operator companies and institutions. The company's Others segment offers digital services, such as digital platform, digital content, and e-commerce; and property management services. The company also provides building management and maintenance services, payment, business management consulting and capital venture, health insurance administration, tourism, directory information, telecommunication construction, and multimedia portal services; acts as a civil consultant and developer; and leases offices. As of December 31, 2020, it had approximately 9.1 million fixed wireline subscribers, including 8.0 million fixed broadband subscribers; and 169.5 million cellular subscribers, including 115.9 million mobile broadband subscribers. The company was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

TCID.JK.summary: PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk manufactures and trades in cosmetics for men and women in Indonesia. It offers hair, face, and body care products, as well as deodorants, fragrances, and air fresheners. The company markets its products under the Johnny Andrean, Tancho, Fresh n Fresh, Lucido~L, Pixy, Pucelle, Glazelle de Pucelle, Miratone, Lovillea, GATSBY, Mandom, Spalding, Axya, Oxxo, and Style Up brands. T. Mandom Indonesia Tbk also exports its products to the United Arab Emirates, Japan, Malaysia, Thailand, the Philippines, India, Singapore, Korea, Vietnam, China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan. The company was formerly known as PT Tancho Indonesia and changed its name to PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk in 2001. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Mandom Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Mandom Corporation.

TCPI.JK.summary: PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk provides sea transport and logistics services in Indonesia. It primarily offers vessel charter and good freight services. The company also provides barging, long hauling, transshipment, oil barge, and agency services, as well as mooring man and oil spill response team services. PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sari Nusantara Gemilang.

TDPM.JK.summary: PT Tridomain Performance Materials Tbk manufactures and sells high performance specialty materials in Indonesia. It offers waterbased resins, solvent-based coating resins, and unsaturated polyester resins, as well as plasticizers and acrylamides. The company's products are used in infrastructure, construction, automotive, environmental, and manufacturing industries. It also operates in the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Australia, and New Zealand. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tridomain Performance Materials Tbk is a subsidiary of DH Corporation Ltd.

TEBE.JK.summary: PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk, a coal logistic company, provides pit to port coal hauling services in Indonesia. The company offers mining infrastructure covering haul roads, provision of stockpile areas, and operation of coal terminals. It also operates a private port for coal loading and blending. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Prima Mineral Utama.

TFAS.JK.summary: PT Telefast Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides human resources and telecommunications solutions in Indonesia. It operates through Telco Products and Nontelco Products segments. The company offers HR-KU, a human resources information system application, which facilitates all human resources activities and offers a management system for human resource management for developing companies. Its HR-KU provide various modules, such as attendance, leaves, reimbursement, TAS, employee database and information, internal bulletin, and digital store modules. The company also offers manpower supply solutions; and BILIK KERJA, an application for job providers to recruit and manage employees. In addition, it engages in the trading, services, and tourism businesses. PT Telefast Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TFCO.JK.summary: PT Tifico Fiber Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells polyester chips, staple fibers, filament yarns, and RCL products in Indonesia. The company also exports its products to Asia, the United States, Australia, and Europe. PT Tifico Fiber Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1973 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.

TGKA.JK.summary: PT Tigaraksa Satria Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale and distribution of various consumer products in Indonesia. It operates through Food and Consumer Products, Gas (LPG) and Other Kitchen Appliances, and Books segments. The company sells and distributes food products and consumer products; and educational products, as well as produces powdered milk. It also manufactures and distributes gas stoves; and distributes blenders and rice cookers, as well as offers gas refill services for households. The company offers its products to wholesalers, agents and sub distributors, general trade, medical outlets, hypermarkets, convenient stores, supermarkets, and minimarkets. PT Tigaraksa Satria Tbk was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

TGRA.JK.summary: PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk focuses on developing, building, and operating renewable energy projects in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Rent, Hydro Power, Solar Power, and Trading segments. It is involved in developing hydro and solar power projects. The company was formerly known as PT. Mitra Megatama Perkasa and changed its name to PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk in 2016. PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

TIFA.JK.summary: PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk engages in the investment financing, working capital financing, and multipurpose financing businesses in Indonesia. It operates in four segments: Finance Lease, Multipurpose Financing, Factoring, and Operating Lease. It also offers sharia financing. The company was formerly known as PT Tifa Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk in September 2020. PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. As of September 8, 2020, PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Korea Development Bank.

TIH1.F.summary: PT TIMAH Tbk engages in tin mining and smelting operations in Indonesia. The company operates through Tin Mining, Industry, Construction, Coal Mining, and Other segments. It offers Banka tin, Mentok tin, Banka low lead, and Kundur tin, as well as tin alloy, solder, and chemical products; and non-tin products, such as coal, aluminum, nickel, gold, and bauxite. The company is also involved in the provision of workshop, construction, shipping dockyard, property, health, transportation, engineering and ship repair, and marketing agency services, as well as in agriculture and trading activities. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangka, Indonesia. As of July 14, 2020, PT TIMAH Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium (Persero).

TINS.JK.summary: PT TIMAH Tbk engages in tin mining and smelting operations in Indonesia. The company operates through Tin Mining, Industry, Construction, Coal Mining, and Other segments. It offers Banka tin, Mentok tin, Banka low lead, and Kundur tin, as well as tin alloy, solder, and chemical products; and non-tin products, such as coal, aluminum, nickel, gold, and bauxite. The company is also involved in the provision of workshop, construction, shipping dockyard, property, health, transportation, engineering and ship repair, and marketing agency services, as well as in agriculture and trading activities. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangka, Indonesia. As of July 14, 2020, PT TIMAH Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium (Persero).

TIRA.JK.summary: PT Tira Austenite Tbk engages in the trading and manufacture of technical products primarily in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Trading and Distribution of Technical Products; Welding and Molding; and Distribution of Industrial Gases. The company sells various steel products, including machinery steel used for the making of shaft, gear, and other machine parts; and stainless and tool steel products, as well as wear resistant steel products for heavy equipment, liner plate, crusher, and other applications. It also provides medical gases, including anaerobic atmosphere mixtures, blood gas mixtures, breathing air, helium, and lung diffusion gas mixtures; and specialty gases, such as analytical instrumentation mixtures, chemical process gases, emission calibration gases, environmental compliance mixtures, gas mixtures, high purity gas products, hydrocarbon calibration standards, laser gas mixtures, rare gases, and ultra-high purity gas products. In addition, the company offers industrial gases, such as argon, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, oxygen, and hydrogen; fuel gases, including acetylene, LPG, and propane; high-pressure cylinder gases; liquid cylinders for gas or liquid service; and shielding gases. Further, it manufactures bronze casting products under the ALPHABRONZE name; welding electrode products under the name of MG and STELEC; and electronic components, as well as trades in steel. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tira Austenite Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Widjajatunggal Sejahtera.

TIRT.JK.summary: PT Tirta Mahakam Resources Tbk manufactures and sells plywood and related wood products in Indonesia. The company offers general and polyester plywood, blockboard polyester, and floorbase products, as well as structured panels and blockboards. It also exports its products to the United States, Japan, and Europe. The company was formerly known as PT Tirta Mahakam Plywood Industry. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tirta Mahakam Resources Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Harita Jayaraya.

TKIM.JK.long_name: PT Pabrik Kertas Tjiwi Kimia Tbk
TKIM.JK.summary: PT Pabrik Kertas Tjiwi Kimia Tbk manufactures and sells paper products in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Cultural Paper Products, and Industrial Paper Products and Other. It provides printing and writing, wood free, photocopy, and carbonless papers; and specialty products, such as greaseproof, kraft, and drawing papers, as well as brief cards. The company also offers converting products, which include stationery products, such as exercise books/saddle stitcheads, pads, loose leaf papers, hard cover books, spirals, and binding books; office products comprising envelopes, register rolls, plotters, and computer forms; and shopping bag and packaging products, as well as drawing books, fancy stationery, continuous forms, file folders, and other products. In addition, it provides carton boxes; and chemical products consisting of sodium hypochlorite, hydrochloride acid, chlorine liquid, caporite, calcium chloride, and caustic soda liquid and flake products for various industrial sectors, including water treatment, soap industry, wastewater treatment, etc. The company also exports its products to other Asian countries, Africa, the Middle East, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Pabrik Kertas Tjiwi Kimia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Purinusa Ekapersada.

TLK.long_name: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk
TLK.summary: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk provides telecommunications, informatics, and network services worldwide. The company's Mobile segment offers mobile voice, SMS, and mobile broadband services; and digital services, including financial services, video on demand, music, gaming, IoT, big data analytics, and digital advertising services. Its Consumer segment provides fixed voice and broadband services; and IPTV and related consumer digital services. The company's Enterprise segment offers ICT and digital platform that covers enterprise-grade connectivity services, including satellite, IT services, data center and cloud, and business process outsourcing services, as well as CPE trading and managed, cyber security, financial, big data, digital advertising, e-health, managed ATM, and professional services. Its Wholesale and International Business segment provides wholesale voice, managed, A2P SMS, IP transit and connectivity, data center and cloud, security, and value added and digital services; mobile network operator, mobile virtual network operator, and call center services; and tower and infrastructure services to other licensed operator companies and institutions. The company's Others segment offers digital services, such as digital platform, digital content, and e-commerce; and property management services. The company also provides building management and maintenance services, payment, business management consulting and capital venture, health insurance administration, tourism, directory information, telecommunication construction, and multimedia portal services; acts as a civil consultant and developer; and leases offices. As of December 31, 2020, it had approximately 9.1 million fixed wireline subscribers, including 8.0 million fixed broadband subscribers; and 169.5 million cellular subscribers, including 115.9 million mobile broadband subscribers. The company was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

TLKM.JK.long_name: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk
TLKM.JK.summary: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk provides telecommunications, informatics, and network services worldwide. The company's Mobile segment offers mobile voice, SMS, and mobile broadband services; and digital services, including financial services, video on demand, music, gaming, IoT, big data analytics, and digital advertising services. Its Consumer segment provides fixed voice and broadband services; and IPTV and related consumer digital services. The company's Enterprise segment offers ICT and digital platform that covers enterprise-grade connectivity services, including satellite, IT services, data center and cloud, and business process outsourcing services, as well as CPE trading and managed, cyber security, financial, big data, digital advertising, e-health, managed ATM, and professional services. Its Wholesale and International Business segment provides wholesale voice, managed, A2P SMS, IP transit and connectivity, data center and cloud, security, and value added and digital services; mobile network operator, mobile virtual network operator, and call center services; and tower and infrastructure services to other licensed operator companies and institutions. The company's Others segment offers digital services, such as digital platform, digital content, and e-commerce; and property management services. The company also provides building management and maintenance services, payment, business management consulting and capital venture, health insurance administration, tourism, directory information, telecommunication construction, and multimedia portal services; acts as a civil consultant and developer; and leases offices. As of December 31, 2020, it had approximately 9.1 million fixed wireline subscribers, including 8.0 million fixed broadband subscribers; and 169.5 million cellular subscribers, including 115.9 million mobile broadband subscribers. The company was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

TLKMF.long_name: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk
TLKMF.summary: Perusahaan Perseroan (Persero) PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia Tbk provides telecommunications, informatics, and network services worldwide. The company's Mobile segment offers mobile voice, SMS, and mobile broadband services; and digital services, including financial services, video on demand, music, gaming, IoT, big data analytics, and digital advertising services. Its Consumer segment provides fixed voice and broadband services; and IPTV and related consumer digital services. The company's Enterprise segment offers ICT and digital platform that covers enterprise-grade connectivity services, including satellite, IT services, data center and cloud, and business process outsourcing services, as well as CPE trading and managed, cyber security, financial, big data, digital advertising, e-health, managed ATM, and professional services. Its Wholesale and International Business segment provides wholesale voice, managed, A2P SMS, IP transit and connectivity, data center and cloud, security, and value added and digital services; mobile network operator, mobile virtual network operator, and call center services; and tower and infrastructure services to other licensed operator companies and institutions. The company's Others segment offers digital services, such as digital platform, digital content, and e-commerce; and property management services. The company also provides building management and maintenance services, payment, business management consulting and capital venture, health insurance administration, tourism, directory information, telecommunication construction, and multimedia portal services; acts as a civil consultant and developer; and leases offices. As of December 31, 2020, it had approximately 9.1 million fixed wireline subscribers, including 8.0 million fixed broadband subscribers; and 169.5 million cellular subscribers, including 115.9 million mobile broadband subscribers. The company was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

TMAS.JK.summary: PT Temas Tbk. provides sea transportation services in Indonesia and internationally. It transports commodities, such as rice, flour, sugar, cement, and other general cargoes. The company also provides shipping agency services for container, break bulk, general cargo, bulk, ro ro, tanker, and other vessels; and shipping management, logistic, and stevedoring services. In addition, it offers container depot management services, such as stuffing and stripping, container repair, container cleaning that has been returned by customer, and rental of the container handling equipment; and leases containers. The company was formerly known as PT Pelayaran Tempuran Emas Tbk and changed its name to PT Temas Tbk. in August 2019. PT Temas Tbk. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

TMPO.JK.summary: PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the publishing business in Indonesia. The company is also involved in event convention organizer; publishing press; paper trading; building and transport management; buying and selling of digital newspaper, magazine, and media; training, data processing, and research and consultancy; education; multimedia and creative house; television broadcasting; and industrial general trading activities. PT Tempo Inti Media Tbk was founded in 1971 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TNCA.JK.summary: PT Trimuda Nuansa Citra Tbk provides air courier services with door to door services under the Garuda Express Delivery brand name in Indonesia. It offers domestic and international courier and cargo services for the delivery of general goods, dangerous goods, medical goods, valuable goods, valuable documents, and shipping using refrigerated trucks. The company also offers freight forwarding and commercial post services, as well as rail, land, sea, and air transportation management services. PT Trimuda Nuansa Citra Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TOBA.JK.summary: PT TBS Energi Utama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining, palm oil plantation, and power generation businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It owns interests in the Adimitra Baratama Nusantara mine covering an area of 2,990 hectares; the Trisensa Mineral Utama that covers an area of 3,414 hectares; and the Indomining mine covering an area of 683 hectares situated in Sangasanga, Kutai Kartanegara, East Kalimantan. The company also trades in coal. In addition, it has palm oil cultivation area totaling 8,633 hectares in Muara Jawa, Sangasanga, and Loa Janan District, Kutai Kartanegara Regency, East Kalimantan; and operates as an independent power producer. The company was formerly known as PT Toba Bara Sejahtra Tbk. PT TBS Energi Utama Tbk was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT TBS Energi Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of Highland Strategic Holdings Pte. Ltd.

TOPS.JK.summary: PT Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk operates as a construction company in Indonesia. The company engages in the construction of apartments, hotels, shopping malls, factories, superblocks, and commercial buildings. It also constructs public vertical housing projects, as well as public facilities, such as schools, religious buildings, toll roads, and bridges; and develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Totalindo Investama Persada.

TOTL.JK.summary: PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction and other related services primarily in Indonesia. It operates through Construction, and Rental and Others divisions. The company undertakes construction of education, office and religious buildings, high rise residential buildings, hospitals, shopping centers, hotels, utilities, and industrial projects. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk also provides equipment rental and installation services. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Total Inti Persada.

TOTO.JK.summary: PT Surya Toto Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells sanitary wares, fittings, kitchen systems, and other related products in Indonesia and internationally. It offers sanitary wares, including neorests, toilets, lavatories, urinals, bidets, bathtubs, sinks, and washlets; bathroom, automatic, shower, and shower spray fittings, as well as bath spouts, and kitchen and single faucets; and accessories, such as robe hooks, soap holders, toilet paper and towel holders, and towel rings, as well as supplementary and other products. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

TOWR.JK.summary: PT Sarana Menara Nusantara Tbk., through its subsidiary, PT Profesional Telekomunikasi Indonesia, owns and operates telecommunication towers for wireless operators in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Tower Rental and Very Small Aperture Terminal (VSAT) and Wireline Services. The company leases space at its multi-tenant tower for wireless operators under long term lease agreements; and acts as a closed fixed network provider with VSAT and fiber optic. It owns and operates approximately 21,381 towers. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Kudus, Indonesia. PT Sarana Menara Nusantara Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Sapta Adhikari Investama.

TOYS.JK.summary: PT Sunindo Adipersada Tbk manufactures and sells toys in Indonesia. The company also exports its products. PT Sunindo Adipersada Tbk was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia.

TPIA.JK.summary: PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated petrochemical company in Indonesia and Singapore. It operates through Olefin; Polyolefin; Styrene Monomer; Butadiene; Methyl Tertiary Butyl Ethe; and Tanks and Jetty Rental segments. The company offers olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, mixed C4, pyrolysis gasoline, and pyrolysis fuel oil. It also provides polyethylene products, including linear low density and high density polyethylene under the Asrene brand name used in films, injection molding, blow molding, pipe, and monofilament, as well as agriculture films and plastic packaging applications; and resin under the Grene brand name for environmental friendly shopping bags, compost bags, disposal bags, bags on roll, etc. In addition, the company offers polypropylene products, which consist of homopolymer, random copolymer, and impact copolymer under Trilene brand name used for use in flexible packaging, household and industrial appliances, yarn, non-woven bags, furniture, automotive, and electronic parts. Further, it provides styrene monomer that produces polystyrene, expanded polystyrene, styrene acrylonitrile, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), styrene butadiene rubber (SBR), styrene butadiene latex (SBL), and unsaturated polyester resin for use in shoe soles, drinking cups, food containers, automotive and electronic parts, building block toys, and helmets; and butadiene for the production of ABS, SBL, SBR, and polybutadiene rubber used in rubber boots, rubber gloves, shoe soles, adhesives, and sealants. The company also exports its products. PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TPMA.JK.summary: PT Trans Power Marine Tbk provides bulk cargo transportation and handling solutions in Indonesia and Southeast Asia. The company transports bulk commodities, such as iron sand, coal, wood pellets, gypsum, woodchips, clinker, sponge rotary kiln, etc. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a fleet of 74 units, including 38 tugboats, 33 barges, and 3 crane barges. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Trans Power Marine Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwitunggal Perkasa Mandiri.

TRIM.JK.summary: PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk engages in the securities brokerage and underwriting, and investment management activities in Indonesia. Its Equity trading division provides equity brokerage services for retail and institutional clients. This division offers equity sales service in the primary market and serves as equity brokerage in the secondary market to institutional investors, such as asset management companies, pension funds, and sub-broking clients. The company's fixed income trading division facilitates government bond transactions, including retail government, retail and saving Sharia government, savings bond retail, and corporate bonds. This division serves insurance companies, fund managers, pension funds, banks, and other securities companies. Its Investment Banking division provides bonds and equity underwriting services, as well as financial advisory services comprising merger and acquisition, divestment, valuation, due diligence, corporate restructuring, and financing. The company also provides equity, balanced, fixed income, and money market funds for corporations, financial institutions, and pension funds, as well as acts as a mutual funds selling agent. In addition, it offers online trading services. The company was formerly known as PT Trimegah Securities Tbk and changed its name to PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk in July 2016. PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TRIN.JK.summary: PT Perintis Triniti Properti Tbk engages in the real estate business in Indonesia. It purchases, sells, rents, and leases real estate, as well as sells land. The company develops and sells apartments, mixed use properties, office buildings, houses, shophouses, and other buildings. It also offers marketing services. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia.

TRIS.JK.summary: PT Trisula International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, designs and manufactures garments in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Garment and Retail. The Garment segment manufactures and markets casual wear, lifestyle clothing, golf clothing, executive office wear, and uniforms; and corporate garments and uniforms for a range of industry sectors, including banks, airlines, retail outlets, hotels, governments, schools, transportation entities, and hospitals. The Retail segment operates retail outlets; and distributes garments to department stores, retail outlets, and designer boutiques. The company markets its products primarily under the JOBB, Jack Nicklaus, Man Club, and G2000 brands. It owns and operates 300 outlets. The company also exports its products primarily to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore. In addition, PT Trisula International Tbk offers its products through jobb.co.id, g2000.co.id, and jacknicklaus.co.id Websites. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Trisula International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Trisula Insan Tiara.

TRJA.JK.summary: PT Transkon Jaya Tbk engages in the rental and lease without option rights for cars, buses, trucks, and others. The company rents light vehicles, light trucks and buses, manhauls, ambulance, service bodies, rescue vehicles, and other specialist vehicles. It also provides special vehicles with double and single cabin modification units for service units, palfinger cranes, heavy duty trays, drop side trays, and rescue units; and various accessories. The company serves mining, oil and gas, and construction industries. It also offers internet network, internet and communications, and IT and computer services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Balikpapan, Indonesia. PT Transkon Jaya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Damai Investa Sukses.

TRST.JK.summary: PT Trias Sentosa Tbk engages in the manufacture and trading of plastic packaging materials in Indonesia Japan, rest of Asia, the United States, Australia, Europe, and internationally. The company manufactures and sells biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) and biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET) films and plastics; and offers solutions of plastic packaging products. Its BOPP and BOPET products include printing and lamination, overwrap, anti-fog, matte, pearlized, white opaque, label, metallized, coated, heat sealable, and thermal film products. The company's products are used for food packaging; tobacco and box overwraps; anti-fog bags for vegetables, fresh fruits, and salad; paper look packaging and paper lamination; clear, white, and metallized label packaging; and ice cream, candy, and soap packaging. It is also involved in the investment, trading, import, export, distribution, and other activities. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.

TRUK.JK.summary: PT Guna Timur Raya Tbk provides land transportation services for customers worldwide. It operates trucks. The company was formerly known as PT Timur Jaya and changed its name to PT Guna Timur Raya Tbk in July 1980. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Guna Timur Raya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Guna Makmur Raya.

TRUS.JK.summary: PT. Trust Finance Indonesia Tbk provides financing services in Indonesia. The company offers investment financing services comprising financing of heavy equipment, trucks, digital printing and printing machines, industrial machineries, and medical devices. The company also provides working capital financing solutions, including sale and lease back, factoring, and business capital facilities. In addition, it offers financing for houses and apartments, cars, motorcycles, education, and tour/travel expenses, as well as for the purchase of household appliances and other consumptive products. The company was formerly known as PT KIA Asia Finance and changed its name to PT. Trust Finance Indonesia Tbk in February 2002. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TSPC.JK.summary: PT Tempo Scan Pacific Tbk engages in the pharmaceuticals, personal care and cosmetics, and distribution services businesses in Indonesia and internationally. It operates through three segments: Pharmaceuticals, Consumer Products and Cosmetics, and Distribution Services. The company is involved in the construction and rental of buildings; provision of warehousing, freight forwarding, advertising and promotion, research and development, computer systems, and distribution and marketing services; medical devices trading; and manufacture of food supplements, food and beverages, and plastic packaging, as well as consumer products, soaps, and household products. It sells its products under Bodrex, Vidoran, Hemaviton, Oskadon, Bodrexin, Neo rheumacyl, Oskadryl, Contrexyn, Zevit Grow, Wybert, Vitonal, Polaris, and Vitamin IPI brands. The company was formerly known as PT Scanchemie. PT Tempo Scan Pacific Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tempo Scan Pacific Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bogamulia Nagadi.

TUGU.JK.long_name: PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk
TUGU.JK.summary: PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk engages in general insurance, reinsurance, and sharia businesses in Indonesia. It operates through four segments: General Insurance, Reinsurance, Rental and Related Businesses, and Others. The company offers onshore and offshore energy, fire and property, marine, satellite and aviation, engineering, and health insurance products; and product, aviation products, grounding, aviation premies, hangar keepers', charterer's, automobile, freight forwarder, professional indemnity, air navigation service provider, ship repairers', port and terminal, and satellite de-orbit third party liability insurances. It also provides credit and suretyship insurance products; bank guarantees, such as bid, performance, advance payment, and maintenance bond insurance; miscellaneous insurance products comprising workmen's compensation, money, burglary/theft, hole in one, fidelity guarantee, kidnap and ransom, neon sign, billboard, and videotron insurances; and Sharia insurance products comprising business interruption, burglary, money insurance, marine cargo, liability suit, engineering, heavy equipment insurance, personal accident insurance, and motor vehicles insurances. In addition, the company invests in stocks and mutual funds; develops, rents, trades in, and services real estate properties; and offers brokerage and reinsurance consultancy services, as well as risk management, survey, and valuation services. The company was formerly known as PT Tugu Pratama Indonesia. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asuransi Tugu Pratama Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina (Persero) Tbk.

TURI.JK.summary: PT Tunas Ridean Tbk engages in the automotive dealership business in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Automotive, Rental Services, and Financial Services. It acts as a dealer for Toyota, BMW, Daihatsu, Isuzu, and Honda brands. The company also rents motor vehicles; and provides driver, cleaning, and auction services. PT Tunas Ridean Tbk was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

UANG.JK.summary: PT Pakuan, Tbk. operates as a property developer in the residential and commercial sectors in Indonesia. It also manages Sawangan golf courses; and hotels and resorts. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Depok, Indonesia. PT Pakuan, Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Pt Sawangan Investasi Indonesia.

UCID.JK.summary: PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk operates in the sanitary napkin industry in Indonesia. It operates in two segments, Diapers and Non Diapers. The company engages in the manufacture and sale of sanitary napkins, night wings, panty liners, and baby diapers. It also offers non-woven and tissue papers. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Uni-Charm Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unicharm Corporation.

UFOE.JK.summary: PT Damai Sejahtera Abadi Tbk operates retail electronics store in Indonesia. It sells LED TVs, LCDs, plasmas, computers, laptops, office supplies, mobile phones, various gadgets, speakers, home theaters, digital cameras, kitchen electronic equipment, and household furniture. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

ULTJ.JK.long_name: PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk
ULTJ.JK.summary: PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the food and beverage industry in Indonesia. The company operates in two segments, Beverages and Foods. It produces various beverages, such as milk, fruit juices, tea, traditional drinks, and health drinks; and sweetened condensed milk, powder milk, and tropical fruit juice concentrates. The company also offers milk products under the Ultra Milk and Ultra Mimi names; tea products under the Teh Kotak name; drinks and other health beverages under the Sari Kacang Ijo and Sari Asem names; and sweetened condensed milk under the Ultra Milk and Cap Sapi names. In addition, it provides freight and other services; and air and water management services, as well as engages in agriculture, dairy farm, and trading activities. Further, the company produces powder milk products through other parties for toll packing services. The company sells its products directly through retail outlets, food and beverages stores, kiosks, and its sales force; and indirectly through agents/distributors, minimarkets, supermarkets, and hypermarkets. It also exports its products. PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.

UNIC.JK.summary: PT Unggul Indah Cahaya Tbk manufactures and sells alkylbenzene chemicals as primary raw material for the production of detergents in Indonesia. The company operates in two segments, Chemicals and Real Estate. It offers linear alkylbenzene and branched alkylbenzene, as well as by-products, such as heavy and light alkylate. The company also manufactures and distributes active detergents of linear alkylbenzene sulfonic acid and sodium lauryl ether sulfate, sodium tripolyphosphate, and phosphate and surfactant. It exports its products to Australia, France, Germany, Japan, Singapore, Vietnam, and the United States. In addition, the company operates as a real estate developer; engages in trading and investment activities; and retails consumer products. PT Unggul Indah Cahaya Tbk was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

UNIQ.JK.summary: PT Ulima Nitra Tbk offers mining services, truck and heavy equipment rental, construction services, and others. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Palembang, Indonesia.

UNLRF.summary: PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of consumer goods in Indonesia. It offers soaps, detergents, dairy based foods, ice creams, cosmetic products, tea based beverages, and fruit juices, as well as leases office space. It offers its products under the Pepsodent, Lux, Lifebuoy, Dove, Sunsilk, Clear, Rexona, Vaseline, Rinso, Molto, Sunlight, Wall's, Royco, Bango, and other brands. The company founded in 1933 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unilever Indonesia Holding B.V.

UNLRY.summary: PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of consumer goods in Indonesia. It offers soaps, detergents, dairy based foods, ice creams, cosmetic products, tea based beverages, and fruit juices, as well as leases office space. It offers its products under the Pepsodent, Lux, Lifebuoy, Dove, Sunsilk, Clear, Rexona, Vaseline, Rinso, Molto, Sunlight, Wall's, Royco, Bango, and other brands. The company founded in 1933 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unilever Indonesia Holding B.V.

UNSP.JK.summary: PT Bakrie Sumatera Plantations Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the plantation, processing, and trading of agricultural and industrial products in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Palm Oil and Derivatives, Rubber, and Oleochemical. The Palm Oil and Derivatives segment processes, markets, and sells palm oil, as well as develops and maintains palm oil. Its palm oil derivative products and palm kernel oil are used in food and non-food industries, including cooking oil, margarine, ice creams, soaps and detergents, animal feeds, cosmetics, industrial lubricants, and bio-fuels. The Rubber segment processes, markets, and sells rubber products for use in footwear, gloves, contraceptives, and other industries, as well as develops and maintains rubber. The Oleochemical segment processes, markets, and sells oleochemicals that are used as raw materials for various fast moving consumer goods. The company also provides financial services for issuing bonds; and industrial estate management services, as well as processes fatty acids and distillate, fatty alcohols, glycerin, and palm stearin and olein. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as United Sumatera Plantations and changed its name to PT Bakrie Sumatera Plantations Tbk in 1991. PT Bakrie Sumatera Plantations Tbk was founded in 1911 and is headquartered in Kisaran, Indonesia.

UNTR.JK.summary: PT United Tractors Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, sells and rents heavy equipment in Indonesia. The company operates through five segments: Construction Machinery, Mining Contracting, Coal Mining, Gold Mining, and Construction Industry. The company distributes heavy equipment and spare-parts under the Komatsu, UD Trucks, Scania, Bomag, and Tadano names to mining, plantation, construction, and forestry sectors, as well as for transportation; and offers services in the areas of non-destructive test, full maintenance contract, UT PAP service, machine inspection program, service call, workshop service, tire management system, pit stop management service, fabrication and remanufacturing cylinder, and UT remanufacturing. It also transports coal through river; and distributes tractors, generators, forklifts, and mini excavators, as well as sells commodity parts, as well as operates mini hydro power plant located in Banjarnegara, Central Java. In addition, the company offers mining services that supports coal companies, such as mining design and implementation, preliminary assessment and feasibility studies, construction of infrastructure and plant, removal of overburden and waste, commercial exploitation, expansion of mine/plant, reclamation and revegetation, and transshipment and marketing, as well as owns interests in various coal mine concessions with total estimated coal reserves of 395 million tons. Further, it engages in the engineering, planning, assembling, and manufacturing components of machinery, tools, parts, and heavy equipment; provision of vessel construction and related repair services; provision of vessel charter and shipping services; construction and concrete product businesses; operating power plants; gold mining business; and fishery business. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT United Tractors Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Astra International Tbk.

UNVR.JK.summary: PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk engages in the manufacture, marketing, and distribution of consumer goods in Indonesia. It offers soaps, detergents, dairy based foods, ice creams, cosmetic products, tea based beverages, and fruit juices, as well as leases office space. It offers its products under the Pepsodent, Lux, Lifebuoy, Dove, Sunsilk, Clear, Rexona, Vaseline, Rinso, Molto, Sunlight, Wall's, Royco, Bango, and other brands. The company founded in 1933 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Unilever Indonesia Holding B.V.

URBN.JK.summary: PT Urban Jakarta Propertindo Tbk engages in the property development activities in Indonesia. It develops and/or manages office areas, shopping centers, and apartments that are integrated directly with mass transportation. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Urban Jakarta Propertindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Nusa Wijaya Propertindo.

UTY.F.summary: PT United Tractors Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, sells and rents heavy equipment in Indonesia. The company operates through five segments: Construction Machinery, Mining Contracting, Coal Mining, Gold Mining, and Construction Industry. The company distributes heavy equipment and spare-parts under the Komatsu, UD Trucks, Scania, Bomag, and Tadano names to mining, plantation, construction, and forestry sectors, as well as for transportation; and offers services in the areas of non-destructive test, full maintenance contract, UT PAP service, machine inspection program, service call, workshop service, tire management system, pit stop management service, fabrication and remanufacturing cylinder, and UT remanufacturing. It also transports coal through river; and distributes tractors, generators, forklifts, and mini excavators, as well as sells commodity parts, as well as operates mini hydro power plant located in Banjarnegara, Central Java.
