In addition, the company offers mining services that supports coal companies, such as mining design and implementation, preliminary assessment and feasibility studies, construction of infrastructure and plant, removal of overburden and waste, commercial exploitation, expansion of mine/plant, reclamation and revegetation, and transshipment and marketing, as well as owns interests in various coal mine concessions with total estimated coal reserves of 395 million tons. Further, it engages in the engineering, planning, assembling, and manufacturing components of machinery, tools, parts, and heavy equipment; provision of vessel construction and related repair services; provision of vessel charter and shipping services; construction and concrete product businesses; operating power plants; gold mining business; and fishery business. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT United Tractors Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Astra International Tbk.

VICI.JK.summary: PT. Victoria Care Indonesia Tbk manufactures cosmetics and toiletries in Indonesia. It offers body care, hair care, skin care, perfume, and hygiene products under the Herborist, Miranda, Victoria, Nu-Face, Iria, CBD, and Sixsence brands. The company exports its products to Japan, China, Korea, Malaysia, Brunei Darussalam, and Hong Kong. PT. Victoria Care Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

VICO.JK.summary: PT Victoria Investama Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides financial services in Indonesia. It offers commercial banking products and services, which includes saving and current accounts, deposits, and investment products; and loan products, which include consumer and production credit. The company also operates as a security broker and underwriter for individual client, and local and foreign business entities; and manages securities and securities products, such as stocks, bonds, and other assets, including property. In addition, it offers general insurance products, such as assurance of property, motorized vehicles, personal accidents, transportation, engineering, money, liability, and boat frame to multi finance companies, banks, local government, state-owned enterprises, private companies, and individuals. Further, the company provides corporate finance and advisory management services, as well as act as a fund arranger. The company was formerly known as PT Victoria Sekuritas and changed its name to PT Victoria Investama Tbk in 2012. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Victoria Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Gratamulia Pratama.

VINS.JK.summary: PT Victoria Insurance Tbk provides general insurance products and services in Indonesia. The company offers fire, motor vehicle, marine transportation, engineering, surety bond, personal accident, health, hull, liability, property, and freight insurance products. It serves finance, banking, state-owned enterprise, and private and individual customers. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Victoria Insurance Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Victoria Investama Tbk.

VIVA.JK.summary: PT Visi Media Asia Tbk operates as an integrated convergent media company in Indonesia. It operates through Advertisement and Non-Advertisement segments. The company operates tvOne, a news and sports television station; ANTV, which provides entertainment and lifestyle content, such as drama, comedy, animation, and other general entertainment programs for families and children; viva.co.id, an online news and entertainment portal; and Viva and tvOneConnect applications to access and engage with tvOne content. It also offers trading and business management consultancy services; office rental, property management, and other services; internet advertising and website services; multimedia and telecommunication services; general private television broadcasting services; television broadcasting industry services; and production house services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Visi Media Asia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bakrie Global Ventura.

VOKS.JK.summary: PT Voksel Electric Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells power, telecommunication, and fiber optic cables in Indonesia. It operates through five segments: Power Cable, Fiber Optic Cable, Copper Wire Cable, Contractor Service, and Trading. The company provides bare copper conductors and bare aluminum conductors; and power and control cables, such as high and medium voltage submarine cables, low voltage cross linked polyethylene insulated cable, polyethylene insulated cables, polyvinyl chloride insulated cables, fire resistance cables, flame retardant cables, control and instrument cables, and sheath halogen free cables. It also offers optical fiber cables, which include all dielectric self supporting cables, aerial and duct cables, armor/buried cables, fibre To The Home (FTTH) and Single Core Per Tube (SCPT) cables, air blowing micro duct cables, submarine fiber optic cables, and optical ground wires, as well as supplies free market cables to contractors and distributors. In addition, the company is involved in the general trading, and development and services business; and operates as a general contractor. Further, it exports its products. PT Voksel Electric Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

VRNA.JK.summary: PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk provides consumer finance and leasing services to individuals and financial institutions in Indonesia. The company offers financing for new and used cars; and investment and working capital financing services, as well as financial leasing for heavy equipment and production machines. It operates through 21 branches in Bandung, Bogor, Cikarang, Jakarta, Makassar, Depok, Malang, Medan, Palembang, Pekanbaru, Samarinda, Semarang, Serang, Surabaya, and Tangerang cities. The company was formerly known as PT. Verena Oto Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk in January 2011. PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT. Verena Multi Finance Tbk is a subsidiary of Mizuho Leasing Company, Limited

W6O.F.summary: PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk supporting services for the offshore transportation for the oil and gas industry in Indonesia, Malaysia, Brunei, Myanmar, Thailand, India, Bangladesh, Papua New Guinea, Micronesia, the Middle East, and Africa. The company operates through three segments: Charter of Own Vessels, Charter of Third Party Vessels, and Other Services. Its fleet includes platform supply vessels, anchor handling tug supply vessels, anchor handling tug vessels, fast utility vessels, fast multi-purpose supply vessels, azimuth stern drive tugs, utility vessels, crew boats, landing crafts, oil barges, heavy load deck barges, and tug boats. The company also offers rig moving and anchor handling, crew change and rig supply, firefighting and emergency rescue, air diving and remotely operated vehicle support, pipe tailing support, seismic survey support services, as well as ship management and other services. It operates a fleet of approximately 48 offshore support vessels. The company was formerly known as PT Swakarya Mulia Shipping and changed its name to PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk in September 2010. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

WAPO.JK.summary: PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk trades in agriculture and marine products in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Sales Agrobisnis Product and Candy. It trades in dried seaweeds, cashew nut, rice, corn, coffee, and soybeans. The company also manufactures and sells candies under various brands. In addition, it engages in the agricultural products, coffee and mining commodities, industrial, transportation, and printing activities; and general contracting business. The company was formerly known as PT Wahana Phonix Mandiri and changed its name to PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk in June 2012. PT Wahana Pronatural Tbk was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

WEGE.JK.long_name: PT Wijaya Karya Bangunan Gedung Tbk.
WEGE.JK.summary: PT Wijaya Karya Bangunan Gedung Tbk provides building construction services in Indonesia. The company offers general civil construction services, such as foundation and structural work, mechanical work, electrical, plumbing, lighting, and architecture, as well as interior and exterior work, including landscape and hardscape work. It also provides precast blocks, precast columns, hollow core slab, and precast concrete faÃ§ade. The company constructs academic facilities, airports, apartments, commercial facilities, hospitals, hotels, offices, and sports facilities. It serves governments and private sectors. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Wijaya Karya Bangunan Gedung Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk.

WEHA.JK.summary: PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides passenger transportation services in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Passenger Transportation Services, Inter-Cities Transportation Services, and Other services. It operates bus rental business under the White Horse Deluxe Coach (WHDC) brand to serve domestic and international corporate customers, school kid's shuttle, employee's shuttle, weddings, and passenger transport for funeral home. The company also provides intercity shuttle services on the Jakarta-Bandung route under the Day Trans brand, and for the Central Java and surrounding areas with the Yogyakarta, Semarang, Solo, Salatiga, and Jepara routes, as well as online booking system. In addition, it offers car rental services; and sightseeing tour services, such as bus and tour guide. The company was formerly known as PT Panorama Transportasi Tbk and changed its name to PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk in June 2015. PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.

WICO.JK.summary: Pt Wicaksana Overseas International Tbk engages in the distribution and trading of food, beverage, and other products in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Distribution and Trading Centre. The company also offers snacks, beverages, milk powder, instant noodles, personal care products, cosmetics, medicine, household products, cooking oil, and plastic and electrical materials, as well as patient, commercial, and regulatory support services. It operates a network of 46 distribution centers. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. Pt Wicaksana Overseas International Tbk is a subsidiary of DKSH Holding AG.

WIFI.JK.summary: PT Solusi Sinergi Digital Tbk engages in the network infrastructure, application and software, out of home advertising media, and digital advertising businesses. The company operates fiber optic infrastructure, point of presence infrastructure, and base transceiver station towers. It also provides mobile apps, software integration, and web applications; and integrated advertising media in out of home environment. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

WIIM.JK.summary: PT Wismilak Inti Makmur Tbk manufactures and trades in cigarettes in Indonesia. It offers hand-rolled and machine-rolled cigarettes, cigars, and filter rods. The company markets and sells its products under the Galan Kretek, Wismilak Spesial, Wismilak Slim, Wismilak Diplomat, Diplomat Mild, Diplomat Mild Menthol, Wismilak Premium Cigars, and Wismilak Premium Seleccion brands. PT Wismilak Inti Makmur Tbk was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.

WIKA.JK.summary: PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk operates as an integrated construction company in Indonesia and internationally. The company's Infrastructure and Building segment provides civil construction services, such as general construction and infrastructure, including roads, bridges, harbors, airports, dams, and irrigation, as well as construction service on toll concession. Its Energy and Industrial Plant segment is involved in energy; engineering, procurement and construction; and field operations and maintenance of the power plants; and construction of oil and gas, petrochemical, cement, power, biofuel, fertilizer, and cooking oil plants. The company's Industry segment produces precast concrete products, such as PC polishing, PC piles, railway sleeper CP, bridge concrete, sheet pile, PC pipes, RC box culvert, marine structure CP, HCS, PC cylinder, and rigid pavement fabricated; steel fabrication by producing steel construction products, aluminum casting, steel frame structure, conveyor, pipe rack, telecommunication tower, electricity transmission tower, steel frame bridge, steel tank, silo, hopper, pressure vessel, welded beam, and other steel plate work and aluminum casting and plastic injection; and offers bitumen, including granular and extraction asphalt. It's Realty and Property segment engages in the real estate, property services, and other services, such as landed house, high-rise building, and industrial estate. PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

WINS.JK.summary: PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk supporting services for the offshore transportation for the oil and gas industry in Indonesia, Malaysia, Brunei, Myanmar, Thailand, India, Bangladesh, Papua New Guinea, Micronesia, the Middle East, and Africa. The company operates through three segments: Charter of Own Vessels, Charter of Third Party Vessels, and Other Services. Its fleet includes platform supply vessels, anchor handling tug supply vessels, anchor handling tug vessels, fast utility vessels, fast multi-purpose supply vessels, azimuth stern drive tugs, utility vessels, crew boats, landing crafts, oil barges, heavy load deck barges, and tug boats. The company also offers rig moving and anchor handling, crew change and rig supply, firefighting and emergency rescue, air diving and remotely operated vehicle support, pipe tailing support, seismic survey support services, as well as ship management and other services. It operates a fleet of approximately 48 offshore support vessels. The company was formerly known as PT Swakarya Mulia Shipping and changed its name to PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk in September 2010. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

WK0.F.summary: PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk manufactures and sells pre-stressed concrete (PC) products in Indonesia. The company offers concrete poles; piles, rounded hollow poles, poles hollow boxes, and cylinder piles; concrete pipe products; PC piles, such as spun, triangle, square hollow, and solid square piles; and railway concrete products, such as railway sleepers, poles, and bridges. It also provides bridge concrete products comprising girder, voided slab, double tee, full depth slab, and half slab concrete products; retaining wall concrete products, such as corrugated, flat prestressed, and flat reinforced concrete sheet piles; maritime concrete products including breakwater and dock components; hydro concrete products; building concrete products, which consists of precast walls, hollow core slabs, concrete slabs, columns, blocks, stairs, beams, and ladders; and ready-mix concrete. In addition, the company engages in the mining and production of split, screen material, etc.; engineering, production, and installation businesses; and provision of patent, inner bore system installation, gantry, and post tensioning services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk.

WMUU.JK.summary: PT Widodo Makmur Unggas Tbk engages in the integrated poultry business. It offers chicken feed, day old chicks, commercial broilers, eggs, and chicken meat. The company was formerly known as PT Pakan Makmur Perkasa and changed its name to PT Widodo Makmur Unggas Tbk in June 2017. PT Widodo Makmur Unggas Tbk was founded in 2015 and is based in East Jakarta, Indonesia.

WOMF.JK.summary: PT Wahana Ottomitra Multiartha Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in consumer financing activities in Indonesia. The company offers investment financing and working capital financing services, such as finance lease, sale and leaseback, factoring, project financing, and infrastructure financing, as well as purchase payment by installments and other financing services. It also provides financing services for new and used two-wheeled and four-wheeled motor vehicles. The company was formerly known as PT Wahana Ometraco Multi Artha and changed its name to PT Wahana Ottomitra Multiartha Tbk in March 2000. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Wahana Ottomitra Multiartha Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bank Maybank Indonesia Tbk.

WOOD.JK.summary: PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk manufactures and sells wooden furniture and other wooden products in Indonesia. The company operates through Manufacturing, Forestry, and Trading segments. It offers indoor, reclaim wood, panel, set up, garden/outdoor, and industrial and natural fiber furniture; building components, door products, and solid and fingerjoint laminated boards; and furniture for hotel, apartment, and school projects. The company also holds forest concession rights. It exports its products to the United States, Asia, Australia, Africa, and Europe. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Sidoarjo, Indonesia. PT Integra Indocabinet Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Integra Indo Lestari.

WOWS.JK.summary: PT Ginting Jaya Energi Tbk, an oil and gas contracting company, engages in supporting oil and gas operations in Indonesia. The company provides drilling well operation, workover, and well services. It also offers rig rental services, as well as sells spare parts. The company is based in Palembang, Indonesia.

WSBP.JK.summary: PT Waskita Beton Precast Tbk manufactures precast, ready mix concrete, and quarry. It operates through three segments: Precast, Ready Mix, and Construction Service. The company provides girders, spun and square piles, concrete barriers, U-gutter, U-ditch, box culverts, diaphragm wall, spider web foundation, CCSP and FCSP, pier head precast, electric pole, railway sleeper, sprigWP, RC pipe, and tetrapod products, as well as full, half, deck, and voided slabs. It also offers supporting services comprising engineering, installation, piling, construction, and post-tensioning services. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT Waskita Beton Precast Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk.

WSKT.JK.summary: PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the engineering, procurement, and construction works in Indonesia. It constructs building projects, transportation facilities, and water resources and energy projects; invests in various toll roads; and operates realty projects. The company is also involved in the hotel management business; building and equipment rental business; and production of precast concrete. In addition, it operates as an independent power producer; and develops real estate properties. PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

WTON.JK.summary: PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk manufactures and sells pre-stressed concrete (PC) products in Indonesia. The company offers concrete poles; piles, rounded hollow poles, poles hollow boxes, and cylinder piles; concrete pipe products; PC piles, such as spun, triangle, square hollow, and solid square piles; and railway concrete products, such as railway sleepers, poles, and bridges. It also provides bridge concrete products comprising girder, voided slab, double tee, full depth slab, and half slab concrete products; retaining wall concrete products, such as corrugated, flat prestressed, and flat reinforced concrete sheet piles; maritime concrete products including breakwater and dock components; hydro concrete products; building concrete products, which consists of precast walls, hollow core slabs, concrete slabs, columns, blocks, stairs, beams, and ladders; and ready-mix concrete. In addition, the company engages in the mining and production of split, screen material, etc.; engineering, production, and installation businesses; and provision of patent, inner bore system installation, gantry, and post tensioning services. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Wijaya Karya Beton Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk.

XT3B.F.summary: PT Vale Indonesia Tbk engages in the exploration and mining, processing, storage, transportation, and marketing of nickel and related mineral products in Indonesia, Canada, and Japan. It operates a concession area of 118,017 hectares located in central, south, and southeast Sulawesi. The company explores for iron ore and pellets, nickel, manganese and ferroalloys, coal, and copper deposits. It also provides railroad, port and terminal, and shipping logistics services; operates three hydroelectric plants; and transmits and distributes energy, as well as engages in steelmaking activities. The company was formerly known as PT International Nickel Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT Vale Indonesia Tbk in September 2011. PT Vale Indonesia Tbk was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

YELO.JK.summary: PT Yelooo Integra Datanet Tbk engages in leasing communication technology equipment in Indonesia. It also provides tour and travel services, as well as trades in communication equipment. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

YPAS.JK.summary: PT Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk manufactures and exports polypropylene (PP) and polyethylene woven bags in Indonesia, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company operates through Plastic Bags, Cement Bags, Roll Sheet and Sandwich Sheet, and Others segments. It provides block-bottom bags for use in packaging cement, resins, and other bulk materials; PP woven bags for bulk material packaging; coated woven PP bags and woven PP bags laminated with kraft paper; and semi-finished products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hastagraha Bumipersada.

YULE.JK.summary: PT Yulie Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk operates as a securities company. The company operates through two divisions, Securities Brokerage Trading and Underwriting. The Securities Brokerage Trading division provides stock sales services in the primary market and intermediary stock traders in the secondary market for retail and institutional clients. The Underwriting division provides stock and bonds underwriting services. The company, formerly known as PT Yulie Sekurindo Tbk, was founded in 1989 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

ZBRA.JK.summary: PT Zebra Nusantara Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides taxi and other related services in Indonesia. It operates through two divisions, Taxi and Gas Fuel services. The company also sells gas fuels. The company was formerly known as PT. Zebra Taksi and changed its name to PT. Zebra Nusantara Tbk in May 1990. PT. Zebra Nusantara Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. As of March 9, 2021, PT Zebra Nusantara Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Trinity Healthcare.

ZINC.JK.summary: PT Kapuas Prima Coal Tbk engages in the mining and trading businesses in Indonesia. The company primarily mines iron ore and galena; and produces zinc, lead, and silver ores. Its mining concession area comprises 5,569 hectares. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Kapuas Prima Coal Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sarana Inti Selaras.

ZONE.JK.summary: PT Mega Perintis Tbk manufactures, retails, and trades in men's fashion products and accessories in Indonesia. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

ZYRX.JK.summary: PT Zyrexindo Mandiri Buana Tbk engages in the production, assembly, and marketing of mobile and computer related products in Indonesia. The company offers IT products, such as desktop and min PCs, and servers, as well as POS, kiosks, and digital signage products; and mobile computing devices, such as laptops, smartphones, feature phones, and tablet PCs. It also retails electronic products. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
